content: Login nightmare, unresponsive, consistently reloads product pages, navigation is ridiculous, nothing is easy or fast, nothing is indicated to users when it's loading, constantly crashes, search engine blows chunks and not even the chunks you asked for. I have a laundry list of improvements to suggest. The website is very much the same. Slow, not much user friendly to find it's just not a good flow. Always login issues 2 step BS every time in every app. OMG break your phone frustration!

Awful for digital music. I used to buy a lot of music though Amazon. Like, a lot. They recently made a change where they don't let you preview tracks anymore (trying to push their music service). This makes checking you're buying the right version of a song hard, yet alone discovering new artists. I've also had some issues where my purchase won't download properly and the customer service team questions my intelligence before admitting there is a glitch sometimes and refunds my money.

Awful drop in Amazon's quality of service! Their previous version worked great. It was fast, intuitive, and never from the bugs this one has. It won't even my home page at Amazon anymore. I've tried everything they recommend to fix it, including uninstalling and reinstalling... No joy. I'm going to try the latter one more time, after... I dunno.

There is always something wrong with this app. The latest problem I've had for over a month an Amazon Tech can't seem to resolve it. I have called and emailed them with all the info they have asked for. It took several emails over several days for them to say they understood my problem but I don't think they ever did understand it. The problem I have is when I try to access the vendor list for used DVDs. Only DVDs no other items. Still not fixed after a month !!!!!

Scaling is all wrong on this version. Use a Galaxy A50 and the scaling is all wrong. In the past, best was clearly on the screen when I scrolled down. Now it's as it the app thinks the screen is 2 or 3 times its actual size. I have to scroll back and forth to see all the search results and get to the next page. I'll update ranking when fixed, but for now, this is what it's worth.

Automatic opens and no way to turn that "feature" off. When on the internet, if I click on any link that goes to Amazon, it DOES NOT open in my browser, it opens in the app. I can see where this might be useful but not as a forced "feature". I should be able to decide if it is the default for any and all Amazon links. The issue is with allowing another person to google something on my phone, they click on a Amazon link and POP they are in MY Amazon account. That isn't ok.

Bad for rural areas. Prioritizes loading recommended products and similar item images over the product I actually want images to load for; Chrome does not do this. Will be loading a page, almost to completion, then give you a picture of a dog and an "oops" or "something went wrong" message. Chrome doesn't do this. Eats my battery! Uses less battery to just browse amazon using Chrome browser. Overall, for maybe the richest company in the world, this is a subpar application. They should be ashamed

This use to be a good app until all the recent updates and so called new look...!!! Now I have large random black and white pixels across the screen, just under the Amazon Logo...!!! Plus the fact it doesn't search what I want, it's very random!!! Why doesn't the filter stay on until I've finished and not go back ever time I select one filter, very frustrating and annoying...!!!!

Please bring back the ability to sort people's wishlists from low to high price! It is not available on the app now and is very frustrating. I'd also love the search criteria to be more accurate. As someone mentioned below, the search results are often filled with items which vaguely relate to the search, making it harder to locate the item you are looking for.

App works almost as well as the desktop version, but the Search engine sucks on both, more so in the app. At least on the desktop version I can select multiple filters at once, whereas the app kicks you back to the list of results after each filter, even when you want to specify a sub-category. And it still shows tons of items completely unrelated to any of the words searched. AND FOR THE LOVE OF ALL THAT IS HOLY, LET ME SEE ONLY ITEMS SHIPPED FROM USA unless I decide I'm willing to wait.

Fairly well coded. However, the search results (in particular, sponsored products) will be displayed and mixed totally randomly. Really annoying and not customer-friendly at all. For example: searching for sugar free articles (sponsored products will be the opposite or include kitchen roll / sanitary pads, etc.). Ridiculous combinations indeed. This, in turn, reduces my time searching for anything using the app version. The desktop version can be adjusted by applying content blocker add-ons.

For the last couple of months whenever I'm trying to look at the photos of products, by swiping to the left, the app freezes up and I can't even exit sometimes.. Locks up my whole phone. Eventually it will say Amazon shopping has stopped. Idk if I should in install and reinstall or what. But it's super annoying Also, and I am not rating the app lower for this until I've done my research, but I have been getting notified in the last month or so that Amazon was detected running in the background,.

Having my identity stolen once, while trying to place an order from Amazon. So I bought a prepaid $500 debit card, so I could order more, without taking a chance of the same experience of having to close all of my bank accounts, and starting all over,!! When I tried again to place more orders....I find out that: I CANNOT use it!!! You HAVE to use "Pay Pal"...and they don't accept pre paid debit cards!!! (WHAT A CROCK!!)

Package tracking Awesome. Beyond that the app is slow, and hangs. The app has caused performance issues on 5 different device. Cant simply share items or its not intuitive. Contacting a sell is far to difficult! I can go on. Let put it this way, I would bet a dollar to a donut that if Amazon has a Usability Analyst, the Analyst used to be a software engineer so they can't see the problems, and never will.

Used to love the app, even though the more recent update wouldn't allow multiple changes to search filters, but since getting a new phone (samsung note 20 ultra) I can't even download the app, so I am forced to use the browser or do it on my computer. Very frustrating. Still giving 2 stars as I am not 100% sure if it's an with Samsung, Google Play or Amazon.

It's always a hit or miss with amazon. There has been more then a few times my order is lost/delivered to a wrong address. Then I have to wait an extra day or two. What's the point of being charged $100+ for amazon prime when the package is gonna take a regular amount of days to ship because the order was lost/delivered to a wrong address. So again excellent service or typical just wait for a solution. 50/50

Very slow in responding to certain clicks. Poor quality app. For instance when I want to read the reviews for a particular item for the first time I click on the reviews for that item . I have to click it 9 or 10 times for the app to respond. Also super laggy in others area through the like slow in responding to clicks. My Prime Video and Music app works fine. No laggs. Please fix. Until I might use my own personal laptop or the mobile site on my phone.

I expected better Amazon! Fire your incompetent app programmers. These updates make the mobile experience on my LG V20 unbearable. And before you say it's my phone, all my other plethora of apps do not exhibit the behavior this app does. Slow and clunky, and becomes unresponsive at times. Lucky for me I have an app that keeps old backups of updated apps. I had to revert back to the Amazon app from January 2019 and it is running so much better!

Infuriating sometimes, fine otherwise. Mostly the app works fine but it just freezes when I try to write a product review or upload pictures for the review. I've had this problem quite frequently. This is so inconvenient that I have to upload the photos one by one and the app freezes before I can finish uploading all the images and then I have to kill the app and start all over again from scratch. Wish Amazon fixes this problem asap.

I love Amazon, but hate the app. The app used to be so much better. Why would you change it? It's slow, more difficult to navigate, and I can't find a share button anywhere at all. Unless you moved the share button to the cart, or something, but I'm not adding something to my cart just to share it with someone else to buy. Change it back, you'll get full marks again. Good luck

I always shop at Amazon, especially if I need something fast or if an item is not offered locally. However I am always AMAZED at how poor their search engine works. Search results include many bogus items while the same search phrase entered at Google or eBay returns great results. Also the search results may be numerous, but they only show me a few at a time. I waste too much time going to the next page, next page, next page. Their chosen filters to sort results, also work poorly.

It would be good except that it forces me to use the Mobile web UI the Mobile UI can't do certain things so I have to go into my browser to pull up the desktop UI. But when I click on something in email it opens it in the app automatically even if I have settings on "ask every time" or even "do not open in this app". I have NO defaults set but it still overrides my browser every time. Annoying AF.

I have had no end of trouble with the app because it has become increasingly difficult to use. It took two months to place an order, because I found the site was not helpful. I completed the order, after much frustration. I tried to order a Bluetooth USB adapter and, when I placed it in the shopping basket, it loaded more items I hadn't ordered, but gave me the option of deleting one item, but the item it chose, was my actual order. The last straw was allowing me to add the item to basket, b

Full-screen product images is broken - you can't exit. 'Back' no longer works, until eventually after pressing it repeatedly, the app finally exits you from the product image, and returns you to your very initial search, no matter how deep in the Amazon rabbit-hole you had gone, all progress lost. At least the app is faster than their website; trying to move items between lists is unresponsive af.

Having amazon prime was amazing and the app made thing super easy and simple. But the problem i had, and it came out of nowhere, was that one day i logged on to buy a blanket. When i loggoed on, it asked for a two step verification code, which i had never done before. And on top of that, it was sending the code to a phone number i haven't used in 7+ years. I tried to call the help line but with corona running rampant, there is no one to answer calls.

I just canceled my membership. I've had more problems in the past 3 weeks with no resolution from anybody. All you do is go in circles with customer service and then they throw a credit at you but the credit is only good if it's from Amazon and sold by Amazon. That just makes the app pointless. If I'm looking for the cheapest price then obviously it's not going to be from Amazon. Search option is awful. Constantly getting kicked out of the app. I'm done.

I've struggled with this app for years and it's barely functional. The new features for Smile and hearts to add to the wish list are great. Unfortunately absolutely everything else simply doesn't work. The add to wish list function hadn't worked for years and the searches are impossibly slow. But the straw that broke this reviewer's back is that the add to cart button no longer works, making the app useless for shopping. This is a plea to Amazon to fix this app!

The apps terms of use is a pretty large invasion of privacy, just read it. Most of the stuff now listed in the app ate cheap Chinese knockoffs, where from the beginning it was mainly high reputation and reliable sellers. When I'm shopping for something, I'm looking for one specific thing, not a dozen things similar to it. Amazon has just been on a steady decline over the years after being crippled by the Chinese knockoffs market.

Lately I've been having issues with Amazon app. Specially learning that the sellers are using drop shipping to sell the items. It does not allows you to choose from which country the items gets shipped from. The ones I've ordered with Amazon prime have been getting shipped from China, which takes almost a month to be delivered. So, why pay prime then if most this will be as late as the one you order off from Wish or Alli Express. Total disappointment and loss of money on a membership.

Lots of bugs in this app. If you search in pantry once, it's very difficult to get back to a normal search. Also, the previous and next button are too wide for the page, so to click to the next page, I have to scroll over to the right! Why is an app not responsive design? Even the search results do this if you choose too many filters. What a bad user experience. And the worst thing of all is many items have completely different sets of reviews for an entirely different product. FIX YOUR APP!!

I used Amazon. App pretty much everyday.. looking up things , future wants and purchases. As of a couple months back I lost the ability to filter my search. Two days ago the app said it is no longer compatible. Play store won't let me update it. It downloads, starts install and fizzles out. Clear cache, uninstall completely, and still fizzles out.

I've been an Amazon customer for at least 10 years now. I rarely have issues with the app but now I can't find the wish list tray. Has it been removed? This to me, was the best part of the app experience as it made it easy to add items to your list as you browse, especially when recommendations or "customers also viewed/bought" pops up and you want to add all those items to your list as well. Please bring back the list tray!!! It's efficient!

The app is slow. When i "add to my cart" and it pops up with suggestions "you might also like", the done button doesn't work. Sometimes my back button will work, but often it causes the app to crash. Frustrating. And to view pictures i have to wait a while. But i use this app a LOT and I love Amazon. I do wish the app was faster and worked better.

Generally happy with the app, its convenient, easy to use, and can do pretty much everything. Been having trouble with the app on my new phone - When searching the results display wider than the width of the screen, and so everything appears like a zoomed in website, but I can't zoom out obviously, and need to scroll both horizontally and vertically. Any suggestions or help developers?

Do not expect me to use this app for Whole Foods shopping unless: 1) I can reorder the list of past purchases to show the most recently delivered items first (as in the Prime Now app); 2) navigation to & from the Whole Foods shopping cart is direct & simple; i don't want to end up in Amazon shopping cart; 3) navigation is quick. I don't shop for groceries in an app the same way I shop for other items that are purchased less often. I do not want to spend more of my time shopping & looking!

It's terrible. The fact that the filters have been so drastically reduced limits the ability to isolate the product you're looking for. Only viewing about a dozen items per page is absolutely dysfunctional. If you filter by going low to high or vice versa, it actually reduces the number of items that are viewable to less than a third of what they were by not filtering at all. That's just redundant to have the number of items viewable to change at all by simply filtering low to high or vice versa

They seem to have made reviews as hard to get to as they can. No longer are they plainly listed below questions, but not even on the product page unless you find the second link to tap. That's like half the reason to even shop on Amazon. They just don't want you to know which products are bad in hopes that you buy products without knowing people's response, and you end up with a product that will fail after the return period.

This app is great. I love Amazon! If you need it, they have it. And I'm a Prime member which means I get free 2 day shipping, free movies and videos as well as music, etc. Highly recommended. Update: The app has drastically changed and its terrible. Practically unusable. Can't stand it. Cut way down on my Amazon ordering because of it. Return to the old app design and I'll return your stars.

This used to be the best app. Fast search results, easy to find prices and variations of items...but lately, I can barely get it to work! It's not my phone. All other apps work perfectly. Something changed and it's costing Amazon, because I do a ton of shopping through the app but it's become too frustrating to use. I can't sit for five minutes waiting for a price to load or to check if something is available in a different color because it's taking forever to load.

I used to be able to click on links to Amazon products and have the app automatically pop up. Now the app freezes every single time that happens. I have to cut and paste a link, figure out what the product is, and then go search for it on the Amazon app that I have to open separately. What's the point of having an app that you can't trigger remotely?

I've had the app on my phones for years and NEVER had any issue. Worked great, very convenient. All of a sudden something happened and last week the app kept crashing and then wouldn't even open, despite multiple restarts etc. In the end I had to just delete it from my phone and am back to using the Amazon mobile website, which is not as convenient and I can't even track my subscribe and save orders/packages.

My security app is showing that the app has a Trojan Script. When I had the Amazon app, it was super slow and wouldn't load. Along with glitches on my phone which I believe its the trojan associated to it. I submitted this to the Amazon Bug Program but you guys deemed it "false positive result from a scanner as opposed to a real finding". I believe your app needs an update and security check.

Horrible! I love Amazon (prime member for years) but this app is damn near unusable. It constantly slows down to a crawl and then all of a sudden it'll catch up really quick and the several presses of different things that you do while trying to get it to respond happen all at once and then it's back to being totally unresponsive. Absolutely TERRIBLE!

App sucks! It literally won't let me in it for two seconds without closing out! It's like it knows I want to go cancel my prime pantry so I don't get charged ðŸ˜‚. I had the MOST DIFFICULT TIME trying to order from the pantry, it kept loading and telling me I had to delete items over and over. And it wouldn't let me change my address. The shopping portion is just as bad, now I can't figure out how to search for anything without it only being in the pantry. I need help ðŸ˜‚

Ive been an Amazon Prime customer for about 10+ years... there's something clearly wrong with the app, even after updating. The customer reviews do not match any of the products...its extremely frustrating and misleading. I don't want to order something only to find out later that the reviews were incorrect and go through the inconvenience of returning the products. Please correct ASAP.

Most recent update has made shopping difficult. When I expand product images for a closer view, I can no longer go back. I hit the back button multiple times & it won't go back to the item, but eventually goes back to the search instead. Also, half of the time now when I try to type in an item to search, it instead blocks out the app & shows a lady in a dress & tells me I can search using a photo. Um... no... I don't own the item yet if I'm looking to buy it, so I clearly can't take a pic of it.

Canceling my prime, it's a scam now. They're completely taking advantage of the COVID-19 situation. Delayed orders were fine but now they're doing it on purpose and blaming it on covid (we're opening up where I live). Orders get delayed over two weeks. I'll get something stupid the next day but won't get an essential for almost a month. Also, they charge you to return items unless you drive all the way to another town for their drop off hub. Rediculous!!!

In the 90s, when you loaded a picture you could see the progress in the strips as they loaded. Amazon has perfected 90s technology. Now you can wait for 4 hours to load a simple picture of an item and only see a swirling circle. This app used to be great. With the new update, search results are listed as pages rather than a list. This adds a whole new level of tedium to searching for things, having to constantly hit the next page button and trying to remember previous pages to compare items.

I miss the old version of the app. I loved the drag and drop feature for the items being put into a list at the bottom.. The search bar, I noticed, sucks too. The update overall, isn't it sis. My shopping on Amazon has decreased alot since.. I primarily use the app since it's easier, but the update for the Amazon app really changes the experience in a negative way..

My biggest complaint with Amazon app is the review section. Most Amazon users are all about checking out the reviews and pictures. It's REALLY frustrating when there are options to order from and you can't see which, color or product they ordered and wrote their review on because they don't mention which one. Or you go to the other list view and it won't show the pictures that goes with the review. When flipping through the photos, should be able to see everything instead of trying to guess.

Love Amazon, shop daily on it... Which is why the last update is frustrating the hell out of me. When I search, the results are always magnified. I have to scroll right to left and up and down to see an item. I cannot zoom out. This only happened after the last recent update. There is nothing in the settings to turn it off. I have been reduced to using the mobile browser version. Someone please help!

I love shopping on Amazon and do so at least weekly. However, the app has really gone down hill. The search engine and filter options have never been as good as eBay, but lately the set up is just awful. When I am searching for something and scrolling I do not like having to constantly swipe left and right. This is not tender. I want to scroll freely. When I reach the bottom of the page it is now not letting me swipe from previous to next, I can only view the first page of results. Please fix!!!

one of the richest companies in the world and their app is ass. it's basically pulling everything up like a webpage inside the app. the buttons are extremely hard to touch and basically give no feedback and it takes about 15 tries in order to bring up a product image. WALMART has a better and more user friendly app than amazon. it's 2020, not 2005.

Garbage. Poorly designed UI. Slower than molasses at absolute zero. Actions load faster when I use Amazon through the web browser on my phone. It's perfectly usable but things load so slowly that it's more productive to do literally anything else. Although the app may work differently on other phones, on my Samsung S7 it runs terrible. Mobile apps are meant to be convenient, this is anything but.

What happened to the "filter and sort" option? The new system doesn't work. I'm an avid outdoorsman, and I enjoy all things that go "bang". Trying to find things related to bullet casting, reloading, storage, etc, I searched for "bullet". The only results I get are blenders and vibrators. Please consider going back to the older filter and sort system, it actually worked.

The Amazon app is complete and utter failure. It has been updated into a slow, laggy, clunky, unusable app. Instead of making your shopping experience streamlined and pleasant, it frustrates you with sponsored ads and continues freezes when you try to delete an item from your private list. Moreover, when you search for something, instead of providing you with one long continues item list, it now breaks it up into pages that require you to click a next button. Can't even use a VPN with this app.

My experience with Amazon was great at first, 5 stars and all. Always got my stuff and on-time. And if there was an issue they were quick to fix it. Now it seems i can't order a single thing without problems. Im getting damaged items, even tho the delivery box is fine. Items get delayed and keep delaying. Buying new but getting refurbished, even tho i payed new price. And when you call its just a hassle, with all the run-a-rounds, and just everything about them is getting worse and worse.

Amazon, listen to your customers! Something has happened to the mobile format and now search results are huge and require scrolling all around just to see (left, right, up, and down). Nothing fits on the page anymore. It's messy, inconvenient, and inefficient. The sort of thing that drives away business because customers have to work too hard just to find what they need, when other sites offer a better, more organized user experience. Take notes from these reviews and please fix this problem!

The lag is so bad it renders this app unusable. It doesn't matter how good it looks (it does), how good the interface is (very), or how intuitive it is to use (yup, top marks) if it takes 30 seconds to complete a simple task or lags horribly when trying to scroll. A missed opportunity.

Help... Not working. The App was fabulous. I used the App frequently with no problems... Ever... Until recently. The shopping app stopped working, so I uninstalled to reinstall and hopefully fix the problem. When I went to reinstall, the Google Play store will not let me download the app. Have been reading the reviews. Since the 1/28 update the app seems to have glitches. Can you help? Or maybe the app won't download B/c you are working on a fix??? Fingers crossed.

Fine until my reviews got removed due to the algorithm. Everything in a purchase should be part of the experience, to include shipping offered for the purchase. If the item doesnt come in for three weeks after the expected delivery, others should be able to know that it could be a concern. Also, I cant see the reviews any longer, only the total star ratings and star ratings on certain aspects of items. I would like to use reviews to make better decisions on purchases, but cannot all around.

Amazon seems to be okay for the most part, unless it's Prime we're talking about---then it's a different story. They're real good at advertising the free shipping and everything that's included in a Prime membership, but don't let them fool you. Some of it is as advertised, but most movies, videos and TV episodes will require an additional subscription to Hulu, Boomerang or the various other sites which own the rights to the particular item. Most items DON'T fall under the free shipping. BEWARE!

The search results view does not adapt to the size of my phone screen??!! I'm left seeing max. 1/4 of each search result at a time (= 1/4 of the first result in the list) and having to scroll left and right to see the image, next page button or full item pages. No option to zoom out or change grid. I thought it must be me bc a company like Amazon wouldn't put something as beginner as this public, but I don't seem to be the only one... No easy help. It's the sole reason for me to uninstall.

Keep on getting a notification my order is a certain number of stops away, only to click on the notification and go into the app to see that it's not even out for delivery?!! Harder to search for deals, layout was better in the older version - this one somehow isn't as mobile friendly but I suppose it does what you want from it. Not more convenient or time saving than going through the website on an internet browser on my phone though.

Terrible market place, half the reviews are fake, half the listings send different products to different people. The app interface isn't great for browsing. The options provided for search filters are pretty random, most of the time I can't filter by price. Amazon flat out lies about delivery date and availability of free delivery on the item listing. Even though the dates on the listings claim to be specific to my postcode, when I go to pay, the options are always different. Waste of time.

Useful, but seriously lacking in browsing and search capabilities compared to the website. For example, when I type a search at the top it'll say something like "60,000 results" and I'll scroll through about 50 or so and it just ends. There is no page 2, no "show more" link, just nothing. And when browsing by department, you also don't get all the subcategories to choose from like on the website, only the predetermined sections amazon wants you browse in. A lot of items seem hidden with the app.

At first it was amazing...The new update definitely messed something up. Amazon is making unknown orders and it took at least $80 off my card..and the order is not even showing up in the order history. Called costumer service ( what was I expecting, they don't help) and they said they couldn't find the charge. Seriously?? Had to remove my payment option because they kept taking the money off my card. Disappointed is an understatement!!

Although useful at times, there are quite a lot of glitches in Amazon's app. First of all, the lack of price filters that are usually available on desktop mode are not there. Secondly, some items that you may find regularly might not show up on the app, even with filters. Their pricy equivalents show up instead. Thirdly, the app may not occasionally respond, even if you force stop it and open it again. It's like the app is specifically tailored to charge you more money.

Love the app very much and have been using it for almost 5 years. I'm giving it 4 stars because I have a minor issue with the apps ui. When browsing for used products, for much more affordable deals... some will pop up and some don't. No matter how many times I tap my screen, on both of my Android devices, nothing happens. But when I press my thumb and hold for a few seconds, all it does it highlight the typical blue text, a different color. Please fix this asap! Thank you!

I find this very difficult to navigate now with the last couple of updates. I can't find the filter button. I don't care what's popular. I don't care what's recommended to me or what everyone else has either wished for and others. I want all of the choices given back to me. In each category, you then need to click see more to be shown more in that category. Just show me the items again!!!! PLEASE!!!! It also sends you to the beginning after looking at pictures.

I enjoy browsing and shopping on amazon, but for such a major company that pulls in stupid amounts of money, you think they'd keep this app working better. It freezes all the time, a few minutes at a time. I can't mess with my lists or adjust the search criteria without it freezing, drives me insane that it isn't just a smooth use app.

Having an issue with my saved lists. It keeps crashing when I keep trying to move items that accidently went to the wrong list or deleting items that are no longer available. The individual sort feature is annoying too. If you make a new catagory and want to mass move items you have to spend a long time moving each item individually. I like using the apps buy again feature. It really helps with certain items.

Not worth the costs. Had stuff on subscription since 2015 and haven't been receiving my items. Items ship separately so there's 15 different tracking numbers and they show up at different times (if at all!). Customer service is terrible. Every thing that can go wrong, does. Every Amazon app is also garbage. Riddled with problems, nothing but headaches. If there is any other possible app to try instead, definitely use any thing other than Amazon. They are absolute trash.

They updated the app to make it as useless as possible. You can't just scroll down through all options. You have to tap to go through page after page. You can't select US only vendors, which means it's more difficult to weed out the Chinese counterfeits...and they are everywhere on Amazon. You can filter by brand, but doesn't show every brand and won't allow you to select several at one time. You have to tap on filter again to select each additional brand. They ruined a perfectly good app.

I put in orders every 1-2 weeks at the very least and these new updates were they screwed around with the search filters is ridiculous. I don't even know if something is prime or not until I click on it. I'm beyond disappointed and I spend a lot of money with Amazon. I hope they're paying attention and get things back to where they were when you clicked the filter button and had choices and not this ridiculous list across the top or not having it at all.

It's SO SLOW. It's very frustrating to switch between colors/sizes of items, the photo previews take 3 times as long to load as the desktop browser version, and it freezes/crashes often - not just on this device. Mobile Chrome tries to force you to open all Amazon links on this flawed app, and it's sooo slowww I think I've time traveled to 1997 childhood: the days of floppy discs, dial-up modems and AOL.

The Amazon app is sucking up SOOOO much data! What's the deal?? It's used 2G of data in the past 3 weeks. Granted, I've been Christmas shopping, but I've been hooked to wi-fi literally the entire time (thanks pandenic life), so why is it pulling the product photos & video from my data connection instead of my wi-fi connection?? How do I know it's doing this? Because if I turn off my data, no photos or videos that I click on will load. Get it together, Amazon! Use your billions to do better!

I use amazon constantly it is very convenient. I have noticed a spike in pricing on items that i know i could get cheaper if i had the time to go to the store and purchase it myself. I pay for prime benefits to guarantee a faster delivery being in the same day. Now i have contacted customer care through their chat feature lastnight when a $30 gratuity was offered for my inconvenience and still have not received the gratuity.

NEED TO FIX THE APP! not only do they not ship out for days (yes with prime), they also dont charge till they ship out, causing a lot of confusion, and there's no option even close to fix this in setting, not only that, but when you try and place an order and you happen to close the app (just hitting the home button), when you open it again it freezes and you have to start all over again, I had to put in a new card, address and name 7 times becuase I had to answer texts!

Ok. That's all. Why? Because it's nearly IMPOSSIBLE to get in contact with them + the vendor's when you buy something & it comes wrong or anything like that (when the item does come damaged or just looks and resembles nothing as expected). Cancelling orders is a pain because the money can take 10 to 15 days to get back into your account. I'm giving 2 stars because I have bought a lot of nice things but I have also received bad service & items that didnt even match the picture/display & no refund

I have to reinstall every time I need support, then delete again. Otherwise, I am forced to use the app to browse Amazon. The app doesn't allow multiple tabs, so it is difficult to compare and contrast. However, recently Amazon requires the use of the app for the chat feature. I just install for support and then delete. If keep the app of Amazon didn't require you to use the app to browse.

Automatically selects subscribe button to repeat every order you make. If you don't notice they will take your money every month or 2 and send you repeat products as a subscription. Then you have to go through the major inconvenience of cancelling and sending items back. Then trying to sort out the refund. This is WRONG on EVERY LEVEL. One time purchase should be the default, not subscribe. I hate it for this reason but understand it makes good business sense for ripping customers off. :-(

No accountability for delivery. The date provided for delivery in the app may or may not be the date the item is delivered to you. Upon calling Amazon about items marked as delivered but nowhere to be found, you have to give them another full business day and call back a second time before they will do anything, because "the driver may correct the issue." There is also no option in the app to click to state an item marked as delivered was not actually delivered.

I used to use Amazon all the time. But, as of a few weeks ago. All my orders said the same thing, no delivery date, nothing, just a message stating an email would be sent when the items were available. I contacted customer service, on this issue. Mind you, all items I had ordered where listed in stock, and still are. There answer was not even remotely helpful. Unbelievable, such a huge disappointment. Now I guess I'll switch to Ebay.

The new design is soooooooo ugly and difficult to use. I hate it!! Please change it back!! It constantly refreshes to the top of the order screen, even when switching between orders. It only shows open orders, I want it to display ALL orders, whether they're open or not, delivered or in transit, returning or not. This is extremely annoying!

Amazon replaced the underground app, which worked and customers liked, with an annoying, slow, buggy POS which doesn't work and is apparently universally despised. Product Search is worse than awful. Eg, They sell Bench coats, but I can't find them, whatever search terms I use. Free delivery has to be applied manually each time & No I don't want Prime. I like Amazon, had some great bargains, but this app removes all the useability and most of the convenience. Quicker & easier to shop in town.

I shouldn't have to turn on useless and annoying notifications for my purchases to count towards AmazonSmile donations!! Please fix this!! Also, the "back" button should take me to the previous item viewed, not the search input screen! The app has gotten worse over time, but the website isn't much better since you can't REALLY sort items by price on either platform!

Great app! The interface is easy to use, items are good quality and shipping is amazing compared to other apps. I ordered some manga, it was my first order on Amazon and was expected 3 days after the day i ordered it. It came the next day in perfect condition and that was without amazon prime. Every other book i ordered since has came the very next day with most other items coming in a month (worst case scenario) or the next day (best case scenario). Definitely stick with amazon.

Been using this app for a long time with no problems but over the last week or so its stopped working properly. Freezes often, sometimes doesn't load wish list properly. When searching for an item if I click on an item to view it & want to click the back button to go back to search results it wont & I have to keep clicking a few times & it just ends up taking me back to the start of the search again which is so frustrating when I'm like quite a few pages in to viewing. Have to restart app often.

Overall, easy to use. Filters leave a lot to be desired. At times, you see various options available within your criteria, but one you apply a filter, they seem to vanish. Needs work. Filtering by price rage, a basic option on a computer, is not available and is needed to reduce the clutter. You should also add an option to filter shipping cost, so one can eliminate the penny priced items with inflated shipping cost, misleading and wrong, which is why I dropped you to 2 stars.

Home page is annoying! Won't stop asking me to review products, most of which are things that I don't care about & have deleted from my history. Also keeps showing me multiple adds for E-magazines that I have never showed any interest in! I tried going unto "manage" and deleting them, but even more pop up. I don't even look at home page anymore, just go directly to search bar!

This app is so frustrating. There is an ongoing problem with getting things I click to register. For instance, when I try to click on a size for ordering shoes, nothing happens. Then if that finally decides to work, I can't get the 'add to cart' button to click no matter what I do. None of the updates have ever resolved this issue, and it's been a problem right from the start. I just might be done with Amazon!

Lags a lot. Not bad in general, filtering and results mediocre. Lagging with clicking like or save to list slow and most times just not reaponsive. Not problems with other apps or speed otherwise. Will up stars if those issues worked out. Amazon in general has issues they need to work through with calling things prime and you assume 2 day delivery but may be out of stock for weeks or months. My 3 stars don't reflect that issues. Otherwise would be lower.

Update: App no longer lets me sort properly. Can't select the Prime filter. Other sorting options randomly don't take effect when selected. Frustrating. // I hate that this app loads prices slowly now. It's such a shame because it used to be a good bit faster, and this isn't a phone issue. Otherwise I enjoy using it, but with items that have multiple colours or versions, I usually have to pull out the laptop.

Recent updates have rendered this app completely useless, just in time for black Friday! I constantly get the "oops, something went wrong on our end" sad dog screen, no matter what I try. I've tried clearing cache and storage, Uninstall / reinstall, granting all permissions, etc.. I can access Amazon just fine on my laptop, or in a web browser on my phone, but the app is now useless.

The app has never let me into the site. It gives me a verification page which sends a text to my phone, it authorizes when I click on the link, then send me down the same path when I go in the app again. I have never gotten past the circle of authentication yet. Useless, but yet I can't uninstall. (It came on the phone as a unremovable app.)

We use this app all the time for many,many years. We have had prime for aprox . 20 + yrs. My only disappointment would be that all the newest commercials on TV having to do with Amazon helping to go green ,the work force,benefitting our country. All of these qualities are wonderful & should be commended. I would challenge by saying the US Postal service has been in the red for several millions of dollars. So why does Amazon choose other carriers?? Some food for thought!!

For most part GREAT! But when you look at an item and it says to follow that brand it only shows you that item. Like that item is the only thing you're following not the brand. Just found that out today. But overall it's a good app. It's the most popular app to buy things on without going to each brands store. I do wish they would Not allow products from China. Had a lot being sold falsely and couldn't return. Amazon sided with seller even after proof was shown.

I've always been a big fan of Amazon as a service but I'm shocked at how poor the shopping app has become. I contacted Amazon to advise that the links to browse preowned listings are not working for any items via the app. The solution they suggested was to use a browser instead. If If I use a browser, what is the point of having the app at all. If there's a problem, fix it! Even better, test updates before rolling then out ðŸ˜¡

Searching for items has become impossible now. The images are enlarged so much that you can only see about 1/4 of the picture of the item. It's like it's not optimized for mobile devices and you are looking at the desktop version with no option to zoom in or out. This makes browsing for any item near impossible. Fix it and I will update my review.

The search is trash and you can't filter things properly, as with the website. The really infuriating thing is if you install this app, they use it as a 2-step verification tool whether you want them to or not. So I was trying to make a change to my account on my computer and it kept asking me to check a notification from the app to proceed - WHICH NEVER CAME. Stupid idea, bad execution, and I never wanted/agreed to use my mobile for verification.

The app developers need to add a search filter that can filter out items that ship from overseas. Ebay's figured it out for years. Considering Amazons popularity it's hard to believe this is a simple oversight. Furthermore I find it hard to believe you dont recieve this feedback from customers on a daily basis. North American products should be on the top of the search results by default. This is hands down the most frustrating yet easily remedied issue with the app.

I keep searching for a new update because the last one causes so many freezing issues. Any time I try to use this app it works ok for a few moments then freezes and is completely unresponsive. Trying to get even 3 items to buy takes longer than running down to the local Wal-Mart and back! You'd like with the current situation the devs would make sure their app that so many people are relying on would work perfect. Sadly I've noticed Amazon in general has gone down hill since the pandemic.

Poor customer service. Was left on hold for over 10 minutes after being pushed off from one cs rep to another. Deliveries are always late. Even with prime membership, no more 1 to 2 day delivery. They didn't honor their ad. They didn't match the price. Definitely not worth paying $13 a month anymore. I'll just stick with Netflix and Roku for movies and shows, and cancel prime.

This app USE TO WORK. Whatever updates they've done over the past 6-12 months have made this app one of the least user friendly apps ever. It's slow. Constantly gives blank pages. Gives "uh-oh" pages. Takes forever to load, the aesthetics are worse than before...it is so frustrating. This app used to be a good, intuitive, user friendly app. Now? It's easier to use the mobile website than the app, which is just ridiculous.

the update from April 30 makes using this app absolutely maddening. to parrot other recent reviewers: looking at an item's pictures causes you to be stuck until you've tapped the back button so many times that once it finally lets you out of jail, it's kicked you way back to the beginning of your search. also, re: filtering/refining product/department search parameters. whatever you did to force filtering selections to only happen one at a time, let's go ahead and undo that madness too. cool?

Doesnt think for you like google does as much as it sells advertising to its sellers. As someone who tried to sell on Amazon I get how it works and it doesnt really work for you as much as for ads. Thats why when you choose an item you have to scroll past multiple other items to get to a description of the product you are interested. Because if you click on 5 items, they all get charged a click. I guess to pay $15 an hour, and be the richest guy on the planet you need every dollar you can get.

So...I have to agree with some of the things said in earlier reviews. The search feature stinks! I can understand bringing in different items that have the same word in the title/topic, just used differently. But it's now completely random. Also, my app keeps getting lost-I have had to reinstall three times in the last weekend.

Updated from 5â­'s to 2â­'s. I've used this app for years without any issues but recently it's been running EXTREMELY slow. Especially when viewing product details, when there are options to choose from. Takes a minimum of 15-20 seconds before you can scroll through the photos of a product with options and another 15-20 seconds anytime you change an option to view it. It's really becoming quite frustrating. eBay doesn't do that.. just saying. Needs to get the bugs out of the last update and soon

This app seems to have some issues with user interface and touch sensitivity. When scrolling it'll randomly decide that I wanted to click on something instead of scrolling. Navigating the search filters is difficult since the back button goes to the previous page instead of going back to the search filter list. Fairly good app, but it has some UX issues.

Usually the app works fine, not as detailed as the website but great for quick purchases and browsing for your wishlist. But a week ago the thing just crashed and it wouldnt reopen. I reset my phone cleared out the app cache and all but it just wouldnt work. I'm reinstalling it now but that experience was a real let-down in terms of the app's quality. Other than that, it bugged out of payment in checkout a couple of times, but works well overall.

For the last couple of weeks I've been having issues with Whole Foods checkout proces. The order summary is slow to load. It's hard or sometimes impossible to edit produce quantities - I can't seem to "catch" the required amount, the selector jumps from one number to the next. When I try to delete an item, it fades and stays there for a long time, I don't know whether it was removed or not. All subsequent pages ('complete your order', 'did you forget?') are very slow to load too. Please fix.

The app used to work perfectly fine, but since July, nothing but the home page loads 99% of the time. I either get errors or pages will only partially load and are completely unusable. It once straight up lied saying there was a problem with one of my orders. I switched to PC and then it didn't say anything was wrong, and I did receive the order. Why aren't you fixing this?

I've had this app for years and never had issues until the last two updates. IT IS SO SLOW!!! Nothing else on my phone operates at the sloth speed that this Amazon app now works at. It's very glitchy, takes forever if you want to see the different options of an item, things like applying filters and scrolling through to choose a department is a waste of time, because it'll never reload. This has been an ongoing issue for weeks. Fix it already!

Couple issues: 1. The search results do not properly format if you have your system font set to large. Text is cut off. 2. The "Share" menu does not have a way to copy to clipboard. 3. Clicking on images sometimes shows a magenta background in the thumbnails. 4. Clicking on links to Amazon will temporarily show an Android Amazon title bar from 10years ago.

SO frustrating. Since the recent updates, it is nearly impossible to filter down. The filter list won't even open if you select 4 (if you prefer to always narrow by avg. Review and Prime, there went 2 spots. Narrowing down by Department has become very frustrating. It limits you to often-useless subcategories. It seems to try and force brands instead of just letting you really narrow by, say, clothing size. I am CONSTANTLY hitting an "oops" page, usually when trying to narrow search options.

Amazon is a great service.to have. The only drawback for me is the filters for searching for your items. When using and android amd searching for an item you can typically choose 2 subcategories sometimes only 1. Sometimes I dint even get an option of category for the item I want and it shows me a bunch of random things. It just needs to be set up better.

I hate the update! I liked the old way where I could see all the items matching my searches. Now the item and screen are cut off and you have to slide the page over to find the "next" button to review the results. Just because of how un-user friendly this is I'll stop using it to shop. So that's why I give it 1 star, because I won't buy and waste my money with Amazon!

The app needs to get cleaned up. It's getting so cluttered from what it used to be. The photos are also annoying. If you click on a photo you can't swipe to the next photo unless you swipe all the way to the right, tap on "See More" THEN you can navigate to the next photo. ... Why? Amazon is a leading trillion dollar company and the app can't be more convenient or cleaned?

Improve: Useful for sure, however there is far too many menus you have to go through to get to eg. a product you ordered. Each page is slow, and you must go back one by one just as slow... That loading integrate: Amazon should share all orders, past ratings and profile with each store domain too!? I actually can't believe I have to go through settings, find where to and change my "country" just to check where a US order is, then swap back. No notifications for them either.

I know many states are still in lockdown mode, but something is going horribly wrong with deliveries, customer service, and the value of products. Clothing items are being sent to me in the wrong size & this was never a concern I had to deal with. I speculate that sellers are sending whatever they have to fulfill the "prime membership" I have with Amazon. In addition, sellers are falsely advertising items with false ratings & continue to keep business. It feels like a scam here now.

I used to love this app, but with the most recent update using this app has become extremely annoying!! I used to have no problem with looking at an item and being able to hit the back button and go back to the list & page I was previously on. Now that's a rare occasion bc most of the time I have to hit the back button a bunch of times without anything happening until it finally responds, but takes me back to the first page of my search results. Please fix this & the new layout, bc both suck!!

It works. Slowly. Startup takes forever and it feels like a glorified web app. The menu and many buttons don't feel native at all. That said, prime shipping is great usually. Except for the occasional problem where they mark an item as having prime shipping, but it takes 4 or 5 days. Then it feels like a scam. Overall, Amazon has good products at decent prices, but the app is kinda meh.

Fix it or I'll stop talking to Alexa! No seriously, it used to be good but now it's all screwed up. Android and tablet versions are both an horrific experience and trying to shop or browse for items has never been so frustrating. Loading thumbnails or enlarging pics takes ages and once on a close up picture there's no way to go back, back button just doesn't do anything... Until it jumps all the way back to the hlme page. FIX IT! pretty please

Garbage. Doesn't work half the time. Signs out users randomly. App deleted. Unfortunately, had downloaded this version to replace the bloatware version that came already installed on my phone, because that version doesn't work either (nor can it be uninstalled). Amazing Amazon is the largest company to exist, yet they can't get their own apps to look or function properly.

Broken. It doesn't search or load right anymore. Just gives a blank white page and the search bars. Doesn't open when you click amazon links or any tabs in the app. Everything just leads to a white page. Edit: After seeing someone else's review I can confirm the app breaks when using a VPN. Loaded pages and links when vpn was disabled and broke again when it was turned back on. Still broken, every other app works with my vpn so why does this have have a total failure with it.

It gives you the option to by audiobook and ebook cheeper together. you tick the right boxes, but both of them don't end up in the shopping cart. Tryed Webb page and app. Even Thoug I change currents to aud they still show price in usd on both app and webb. And then you get a chock when you go to pay and it's way more!! Really makes me not want to use a faulty page. Waist of time and really frustration.

Amazon has become a repository of knock-off items. It's virtually impossible to search for an item, with the hopes of seeing the offerings by major brands because most of what populates the search is cheap imitations from "manufacturers" with comical sounding names. Even if you enter a specific search term, including the brand, the search still brings up everything else in the category. The filter process is slow and cumbersome, too.

App displays wrong after update. The search results screen is zoomed in causing you to have to swipe right to left multiple times. Chat support only asks me to uninstall and reinstall. Which I've done over 10 times in the past 4 days. The app does not uninstall completely. It only reverts to stock Amazon shopping app thay was stock on phone. Wish i never updated it. I even oay for Prime membership. Very disappointed in the app and the support.

The app is not any different than just going through Chrome except for one thing. It puts personalized full page ads on your lock screen, home screen or any screen based on things you've searched for on Amazon. It's annoying and I thought I had a virus on my phone. Uninstalled app and I go through Chrome instead and no more random ads.

Absolutely disgusting service from Amazon. I paid for an item in which they only sent me part of. Than I was required to send it back instead of them sending me what I had paid for. Better yet, the item went up in price as this was happening. Seems very convenient that they 'forgot' a box and can't replace the prices they neglected to send unless I pay the inflated cost of the item. Absolutely terrible app, how disappointed that a billion dollar company screws over people like this.

Well I just updated the app and figured out why I couldn't change the display currency to my local currency. It only works if I change my address, which wasn't a problem before. So many great features have been removed, eg. filter options, having the wish list at the bottom of the screen and the ability just add the item to the list by just long press and drop. Also it only shows items that ships to my address. What happened to showing me everything and just telling me if it ships or not?

In terms of the app itself its usually fine. I use it a lot and there are still tons of bugs that don't get fixed One annoying one is the picture issue. You can't click on some pictures and when they do become clickable they won't load? On top of that when you try to exit the picture "mode" it will send you back to the first page when you are trying to exit that page and you lose your product. If you can't remember what product that was at all you have to get lucky and find it again.

Poorly optimized, which is odd considering this was never a problem before. Runs incredibly slow, not talking like 30 seconds to load stuff but at times close to 5 minutes. Pissed me off enough to write a review about it. 2 stars because UI is tolerable, could be better, but nothing is as big of a deal breaker as the poor loading. It's an issue specific to this app too.

No music samplesðŸ¤¨. One of the things that I used to like about Amazon was that if there was a song that I was not familiar with or unsure about, there was normally a sample available that I could hear before committing to buying the song. Amazon has chosen to remove that feature. Thus, I will no longer buy any music from Amazon.

Terribly slow lately. Cannot browse. Cannot look at lists you have saved. Cannot look at previous orders. Nothing loads correctly. Pay monthly for prime membership but cannot even utilize the fast shipping because the app will not let anything load. Is there possibly a fix for this in the near future? Been like this for months now. Same problems. Done the tech support twice now, repeating steps both time to Uninstaller, reinstall, and try that. Still doesn't work. Still not my phone.

It used to have a filter for what can be delivered same day or next day, which was very, very useful, now all i get is a "prime" switch for the "free" delivery that's actually in the price of the product. Some things are on ebay for half the price from the same seller for example. Also, what is going on with the pictures when scrolling? It's soo nauseating having all images on listings flicker in and out at every swipe

If it loads at all, it's sloooooow. Most of the time, I can't even get to the home page, the app just does not load. I give up and go on chrome (which also is slow with Amazon). Sometimes, I'll be able to get a search in, but I am lucky if any results pop up. Very disappointing as I love using Amazon to shop. Good thing I kept my old iPhone and the iOS app works perfectly every time.

I bought a couple of items from Amazon a few years back but recently downloaded the app, big mistake. Had trouble with the 3 items I tried to buy. 1st item - lost during dispatch, 2nd item - amazon mistakenly cancelled order on my behalf 3rd item - amazon took order and I was charged even though item was out of stock, they never checked, never told me, only for I contacted them, appalling customer service. Still awaiting substantial refund after 7 working days. AVOID!!! I'm deleting my account

Absolute rubbish. The app keeps on crashing on my tablet after a few seconds. I will tell you what Jeff. I know you are finding it difficult to make ends meet what with the divorce and all that so I will lend you a few quid so that you can get a proper programmer to finish the app properly then you can pay me back when you are flush. I can't say fairer than that. 3rd August 2030. App has just updated. Still unusable. Constant crashes. Seamless shopping experience? I don't think so!

I have no idea who had the idea to show items side by side, but please, tell them it was a HORRIBLE idea. I can't see things and hate scrolling left to right just to try and look at the items and the price. I've searched Google and the app high and low to see if I could change the view setting, but nope, nothing. I LOVE this app. Well, used to. Now I'd rather drag myself out to a store where I can actually see things I want to or need to buy and search easier for them.

My experience w/ Amazon has been a positive one until recently. My house & wardrobe could be used for promotional purposes. I'm constantly asked where did you get that? "Amazon" is 99% of the time my answer. My only concern is that lately items I purchased seem to have disappeared from my order history. Plus, when making a purchase they charge the total order. Then I get hit with individual item charges following that. It's as if I'm paying double for the items. Need 2 checking in with them &?

Usually very good but recently wishlists not working properly. Can't search by price drops anymore. And can't search by price high to low. (I used to have to as not all books from my wishlist would show searching by price low to high, then more would appear searching the other way around.) Can't do it now in the app-only on website on computer.

Recent updates don't let you zoom out to view multiple products after a search. All the products are shown in extra large icons and fills the whole screen I have to constantly scroll side to side to view products. This is making my shopping experience tiresome. Please fix this app to be able to view smaller icons and fit to page without the need to scroll side to side just to view a product. This only happens when viewing search results.

Unable to search for same day delivery items. Amazon protects sellers, tried to leave 2 bad reviews including picture proof and they said it "violated community standards" ... not sure how since they contained nothing inappropriate. Lastly, A-to-Z guarantee is not as straightforward as they make it seem. Overall an OK app, just some issues with the company itself right now. The wishlists options are great and easy to keep organized.

Well wow they got rid of the add to cart button completely. Now they offer bundles. You find the item you want, decide to buy it and you have to go into the bundled offers, unclick the items you DON'T want THEN add the item you originally wanted to cart. Lately I've been buying more from local vendors especially with amazon's inferior products. I think this is the time to finally take the plunge. I don't like how they're trying to force my hands. Don't try and upsell me during a pandemic.

Honestly, you can't be disappointed, in my opinion, with the innovation of the amazon app, or any amazon made product for that matter. Links to different ways to utilize the site for daaaaaays, I mean try not to but the near infinite amount of the links themselves. Plus the intigration capacity, the research coducted, then there is the simlple stuff that Amazon just always gets i Right, they get whats needed and thensome, solving all problems with the few actions that he does. Right or at least

I've never really had any issues with ordering or returning through Amazon. I've also experienced good customer service. HOWEVER, lately I've had plenty of issues. One of my items never arrived and amazon had cancelled the order stating that there was an issue and a refund will be given. But I have yet to receive the refund after several phone calls. Furthermore, the only selections that I have for returns are at their amazon hub locations and it has caused nothing but issues with no refunds.

Overall, very good experience. BUT, the Filter feature is VERY Annoying! Why does the app need to refresh with every single change to the filter criteria? Why can user be not given the option to choose MULTIPLE / ALL criteria at once, and then only the app refreshes? (for reference, you may check Flipkart app) Please fix this. A similar annoyance existed with the absence of instant 'add to Wish List' feature, especially with the search results. This was fixed with the Heart icon feature.

Amazon app is becoming annoying with the passage of time. Amazon keep on trying to lure customers to subscribe for prime membership. Which I don't want at all. I don't even want to try it. I don't want to see this question on checkout. Amazon is pushy about their membership. I know they want steady monthly income by luring customers. But it is an annoying and cheap way to do it. Don't offer it on every checkout. Please let us do shopping freely without annoying questions.

Why would you break something that used to work fine?? Ever since the search results moved to 2 columns this app is useless. I can't move the screen to even see the second column or tap the "next" button to see the results past the first page! I can't even SEE a "next" button and the screen doesn't scroll left/right at all! Ever since system updates obliterated my phone's auto-rotate feature to the point where it's not an option in my settings, I can't even use that as a temporary fix. WHY???

IF YOU HAVE NOT UPDATED, DO. NOT. UPDATE. App was great until last 2 updates. Now it's as if it wasn't made for mobile users at all. There's no longer an option for list view of your results and you have to scroll side to side then down to the next line of results. It's like someone tried to fit the desktop version onto a mobile phone. It's not good and frankly harder to find what I'm looking for so I end up buying it elsewhere.

TERRIBLE SERVICE! I've tried to send a product back which is falsely advertised by a 3rd party seller, over 2 weeks later no refund or contact from the claims department. I bought another item double the price which never turned up and again, still no refund! Amazon customer support keep cutting me off ( because they can't be bothered to help) so i have to keep explaining. Thanks to Amazon I'm nearly Â£300 down! I use Amazon for everything...not anymore. AVOID if you don't want robbing!!

Good for ordering on the go. Prime membership is a no-brainer....SO many perks!!! Shipping practices have gotten a little sloppy - using plastic bags for cases of pet food, Large bubble envelopes for a small jewelry-type box, leaving gaps in tape when covering boxes so anything could fall out... You get the picture. Could be because of CO-V though as it has been last few months only. Before was fine. Amazon is excellent with returns as long as you follow the guidelines.

I love Amazon. But wth did they do to it!? The screen is magnified 10x, I can't see anything at all bc one one single item takes up my whole screen. It's impossible to search for anything or view anything. I have never left a bad review on anything but what use is a shopping app if you can't view your search results!? Beyond frustrated.

I have called Amazon several times and changed my password but random items continue to show up in my cart, obviously this is a security issue because nobody else has access to my account but Amazon doesn't seem to be worried about it and just recommends I change my password again. I have to check my cart daily and remove an average of 4 to 8 items also extra items to my saved for later. When your credit card is directly linked to your account this is a serious issue.

Amazon is great usually find exactly what I'm looking for and they have many options and many great things. Delivery is always fast and right at your door. However I have canceled a few items before as soon as I made the purchase, and it usually takes the money off when it ships but it took it off right away and did has not refunded me on two items now. I shop with amazon regularly still. But it has been a month and no refund. So before I place an order I just make sure it's the one I want.

2020 update. Worse each update. More ads. Fewer items shown per page in search results. No way to grid anymore. Alexa has taken the location of the search button, making accidental Alexa instead of search, and can't be disabled. Forcing my location to always be shown in search and browse results is also useless and just eats up precious screen real estate.

Up until this last update (may 2020, version 20.10 xxxx or something) the ability to filter search results was mostly working as it should. However, with this latest update, filter options have gone from a drop-down menu with lots of selections to a small amount of basically useless options positioned in the top of the results section. Also, when you go to enlarge a photo of the selected item, the back button usually takes you out to the results pages, instead of closing the photo. So, 2 stars.

This app has become a mess! Current version has a major issue when filtering by department on the deals screen. When I try to filter deals by department, the window for selecting the department(s) shrinks to the bottom of the screen and I can only scroll to the Power & Hand Tools section. Obviously this means that I can't shop in any department below that. Not good! I guess Amazon doesn't want my money?

Bought an item, checked the price 2 days later and it droped by about $30. I contacted customer support and asked about it. They were a great help in understanding unfortunately Amazon's scummy and garbage policy prevents me for paying the lower price. I could return it for a refund and buy it again for the lower price but that whole process would take about a month if I'm lucky. Amazing how they talk about how they price match but can't do it with themselves.

This latest "upgrade" is a pain. The added "Next Page" is unnecessary. You no longer know how close you are to the end of the list. Also, I should STILL be able to choose multiple filters without being kicked out the screen. This changes what was 5 or 6 clicks into literally 30 clicks just to filter down a search list. These two changes alone make this app too time consuming to even bother. 9.24.20 - Another crappy update! The filter options and the search view need to go back to the original

Absolutely horrid. I have been using this company for my purchases (probably 90% of things I buy) for years, and have spent many many thousands of dollars. Just recently, for whatever reason, they can't seem to deliver my packages. I order something, it shows as "delivered to mailroom" (I don't have a mailroom), and I never get it. I waste my time and effort to complain, they refund me, I purchase the item again, and the same thing. I have complained so many times, and they apparently ignore my delivery notes. Their service has gotten so bad. A lady yesterday ensures me she has put a permanent note on my account, and this will never happen again. It happened THE NEXT DAY. I am unable to get packages from Amazon anymore. They are apparently unable to do their jobs, right when I most need a service like this. I contacted support to get a refund and cancel my account, and the woman disconnected me! Rude, unprofessional and inept.

Amazon prime was the worst subscription ever. I pretty much paid $13 a month to ensure I had the best possible customer service I could get shopping online. Well everything is great normally, but wait until you actually have an issue. The worst customer service I have ever experienced. Not only did they not help me, but waisted 2 hours of time I should have spent enjoying with my family, oh an they had the nerve to try and sell me something for 25% off on the way out. Canceled my subscription!

Well done Amazon 5* for making a nice easy app for shopping a massive pain in the neck. Search feature now comes up with just about every other irrevelevant item and can only scoll through a few on each page now. Filters are also not that helpful to narrow down the pages of useless matches. Whoever you paid for this update ask for a refund, cause it needs fixing.

Worst app ever! Refreshes after each selection so you have to go back every time you want to add a condition, Amazon expects you to have the sorting options committed to memory since hitting the back button goes back to the search page, have to press the next button to see the next batch of products instead of seamless scrolling. Worst user experience in all the shopping apps I've used.

New update is bad for digital music customers. They've removed the preview feature and the ability to purchase individual songs. If the plan is to move all of that over to the Amazon Music service, add that feature BEFORE removing it from Amazon Shopping. It looks like they are setting up a structure for that but right now the ability to preview and individual song purchase doesn't exist and it's been gone for about a week.

Having issues with the filters at the top of the screen. They cut/run off the edge and don't display all. Not all drop down to choose how to filter. Once search items come up, there are 2 vertical columns, but I can't view the 2nd/right side column unless I turn phone sideways/horizontal. When phone is vertical, the NEXT button is not displayed and won't swipe over, so again, have to turn phone sideways/horizontal to view and hit next. The recent updates made things worse/not user friendly.

I love the Amazon's deals & delivery svc. Just be sure to watch your bank statement! I was charged 10.99 per month for 6 months for Prime, but cancelled free trial b4 it ended. Cust. Svc. reps-clueless, couldn't find glitch & said I "wasn't getting billed!" They make promises they don't keep to research & correct error. Was never credited the $66+ billed in error. Delivery service gets 3 stars. Fast, but need to follow customer del. instr's!

Amazon Prime has to be one of my favorite subscriptions and apps because of the fast shipping and delivery method. As well as the quality of customer service and quality of items. My family and I definitely rely on Amazon for most of our shopping needs since covid-19 pandemic started. I just wish sometimes that they had more options in items sold and a wider variety to display so my family and I could pick from new things rather than things we've already seen. However we are very woth amazon!!!!

Cancled my prime because there were alot of instances where my items came late. Prime isnt cheap so I expect to be given the service I'm paying for. I had reached out to amazon multiple times and they just dont care and tell me it's the carriers fault. That's not the point, I'm paying amazon so I expect them to right the wrong, or at least show any concern. Customer service is always bad. Aside from that i love the wide variety and convenience of finding what I need.

For the most part, I like it, but I have a few issues. 1- I no longer see a way to sort the lists of other people. That is an extremely important feature for me, but I only have the option to sort things i look for, or my own lists. 2- The filter options have gotten terrible, and half the time I STILL get stuff that should have been filtered out. 3- I use Amazon Smile, and hate that I can only use it on my phone. If my husband orders something on his phone, it doesn't go through Smile.

Why is the search function so absolutely broken? You can search for something and it will give you pages of stuff without any of the words you typed in and there's really no way to narrow it down like with other sites. You can type in exactly what you want and then only actually find it in a recommendation on the page of another item. It's a borderline useless function that just gets more frustrating with time. AliExpress has a more user-friendly setup than this ffs

I've been an ebay shopper for many. Friends talked me into trying Amazon. This app is bad. I did a search for milwaukee packout dolly on ebay app and 90% results was what I was looking for, Amazon's results revealed bubblegum machines, golf clubs, etc, oh, and 1 of what I was looking for. Wth? The other issue is you can only review a few results at a time, then keep tapping next. Thanks but no thanks.

This app is generally very good though I took off one star because it takes you back into a "loop" whereby I think they believe if you stay caught up in it's web you'll buy more. I would also like to see a segment introduced whereby one could see the items billed for, the taxes and associated dates. The items don't arrive with receipts so there should be a more streamlined way the purchaser could cross-reference the charges against their accounts.

I have experience with Amazon India & Canada. The switching experience is not fluid. Amazon India has COD option, which is great & I do not have to provide my Credit Card. Amazon Canada has no such option. When crossing borders, I have to switch to the country I am in. Shipping is also complicated and may be more expensive than the product. Search filters are very limited. Amazon Canada enforces control over customer reviews & will not show reviews, even though no foul language used.

Didn't expect "Amazon" to be useless, bought a product which didn't reach on time, I have to write to seller and the seller cancels it, I need to follow up with seller. So why are you there? Learn from Aliexpress maybe. When things goes well the app is good, but obviously there is no customer support when an issue occurs, not even an email or channel to reach assistance.

Many glitches with the free version of the app for setting up playlists, including not being able to set pkaylist to shuffle, clicking on a song only to have the app play a completely different song, app loading songs into my playlist that I didn't request, and not being able to delete songs from playlist without encountering an error message. This clearly is not Amazon's core competency, and although free, it is so full of bugs I'm considering going back to another streaming app.

I love shopping on amazon. But lately it's been a hassle. Starting with how lagging it's been lately. Also I hate, hate, hate. How they switched it In the app that your orders appear in the order they are delivered and not ordered. And everytime you click out of an order from orders it takes you back to the beginning! Which is annoying when you're trying to figure out how much someone owes you and you order 100+ things a month!! Update** now you can't upload pics for reviews on the app..

The orders section needs to have the option to sort orders by DELIVERY DATE as well.
