Also, it would be nice to be able to EDIT general information on orders as far as quantity of an item, instead of having to cancel the order and placing a new one. Definitely like that you can see if an order is secure before it's placed. I DON'T like how you just use general explanations of updates that never changes. Other apps say what the app specifically updates....I.E. "bug fixes, security updates...

Someone needs to completely redesign App. It's hard to find anything. Sometimes you can't click on parts because the screen doesn't autofill. I have to move items into focus because they're on the other side and,(expletives) I have to scour for the right price and as soon as I make a purchase it recommends the same thing or something better for cheaper(would have been nice if it popped up in the search!). I don't usually complain. Please fix it guys. Amazon Customer service reps is 5 star though

Will be uninstalling from my phone as this app is completely useless on a mobile phone. I have no problems on my laptop or tablet accessing items and filtering to get the results im looking for. It was ok up until a week ago where I can no longer filter categories. Prime day was a joke accessing. It was a grid like format that kept resetting when you clicked on an item. Please fix this bug.

Awful update. Front page is just a big advert for music and tv/movies. When I open Amazon shopping, I expect to go there to find things I want to buy. Looking for a product is difficult now because products are not side by side like the web page. Terrible update, I'm going to just use the web page through my browser, and get rid of the PITA app, I'll use the newly freed up space for Ebay.

Basically useless after the last update. Am I the only one who is having SERIOUS lag and freezing issues?! I can't do anything with my lists! Anytime I click to do ANYTHING (add to list, delete, move, edit priority) I have to wait like 10-15 seconds, and that's if it doesn't just freeze up completely! Otherwise, I loved the app before! Please fix!

Terrible update! Fir weeks when searching for an item after I've gotten to the bottom of the page, I am unable to click the next button. The page will not slide sideways for me to even have the option to go to the next page. I used to love how easily Amazon could be navigated, but now its seems I'm just frustrated and annoyed. Definitely canceling my membership, no point in paying for a glitched service.

I've been having problems with the app since the last update. When on my lists trying to organize it by price (low to high) it won't change anything. It would do it before, but not anymore. Please fix it, that is great feature that will definitely make the decision on rather I go online or use your app. I appreciate your time reading this....

Latest update sucks! Slow, freezes often, layout was better on old app. Search filters make you want to smash your phone. You click "more filters" a bunch of categories with options under each show up. After picking one option, it pops back to results screen. To select another option you have to go back and repeat. Why not let me pick all the option, then select done to see results. Can't believe they can't test/debug. Bezos must not have enough money to hire some software testers?

Like others here, recently been having problems. First, every time I click on a link in Google search, the item attempts to open the Amazon Shopping app but fails. The app opens but the screen is blank. Have to open Android Chrome and go to Amazon on a web page. Also disturbing, and why I search directly on seller/manufacturer websites more often, is the huge number of sponsored items, often unrelated, that must be scrolled through before getting to what I searched for on Amazon Shopping. Meh!

The app is good, I've never had a problem ordering my stuff but it is a little slow. And the bar code scanner NEVER works! I've used the Amazon app on my last 2 phones within the last 2 years and completely different phones and different brands and has yet to work again. It sucks because when I'm in the store at want to see if its cheaper on Amazon and alot of the times even when you type in the exact item name it doesn't pop up

I am a long time customer and primarily have done my shopping via the app. Like several reviewers, the past update has caused it to be annoying and frustrating. First of all, what's with the ads replacing the "see more like this"? Secondly, hitting the next button was an unnecessary addition. However, one thing I do like is the ability to rate the delivery experience.

I don't like the fact that the company can switch prices after your order is filled. I've been overcharged, so I canceled my orders. Money is being taken daily, then as I decide to take a look at my orders. The prices went up on a few items. I wanted what I was paying for, not anything else. I won't be shopping with amazon again. My previous orders were the done the same way. That's not cool. Please inform your customers when the prices suddenly switch and go up on there orders.

Every time you try to change the color of something or the amount, the app just freezes for 10+ seconds. Also scrolls randomly while trying to select drop-down lists, causing you to open a different list. It's 2020, Amazon. Get it together. I should be able to change the quantity of an item easily on a Galaxy S20+, one of the most powerful smartphones on the market.

New app sucks! Apparently finding what you want was too convenient in the older app. Type what you want, filter out by rating , price, prime all nicely at the top of the page.... NOPE TOO EASY. Now you got to open the menu, search through a long list of "departments" find the one that magically fits your product, go to another page, narrow down what your looking for, THEN you may search and filter things. What fresh out of college kid thought that was a good idea?!?

Amazon has outstanding customer service. It took me a while to get comfortable but they really take care of you. Returns could be slightly easier but they offer a huge array of options to return items even without packaging which is amazing. I didn't enjoy my experience with their credit card backed by chase. However they directed me to a card backed by sync bank.

When shopping in the app on my galaxy s10 the items displayed are so zoomed in and enlarged you have to scroll up and down and side to side just to view 1 item. I just go to the website which is the same interface but without being zoomed in so ridiculously close to everything. Cant find anything in the app that allows me to adjust this so I dont really use it. It is useful only in the sense that my phone gets pop-up pin notifications for my items when they are shipped, delivered, etc.

What I would really like to review is Amazon Customer Service. They're great! I couldn't cancle an order from my phone, so I chose to have them call me and it was worked out very quickly and they were very kind. It turned out that part of the order had already been shipped. I ordered the stuff lastnight, so that's super fast! It just turned out that the other item wouldn't be here until mid May and it was for home school reasons, so we needed it asap.

This update sucks. When you go to change the filters or departments it just freezes, you go to look things up and you have to filter through sponsored ads, and generally it is not worth my monthly subscription. I kept paying towards my prime account all summer long even though amazon took away the one benefit of having prime (free 2 day shipping) and now you give us an app that is essentially spamware scale back to the last format and lose this one. Failed.

Been using almost exclusively Amazon for a while now. The buyer protection and customer service are great. But, since I am rating the app here: The basic functionalities are all there, but the search is HORRENDOUS. There are not enough filters, if you are not buying a sponsored or prime product, you are better off using google and then switching to amazon via link. If you are looking for a cheaper option and sort by price, you first have to get through pages of vaguely related 1 â‚¬ items.

I loved Amazon until recently. The new display is horrible, not practical at all. I have to scroll left and right constantly just to be able to see 1 product. This has actually deterred me from making purchases because I simply don't want to search through Amazon anymore. Please revert back! Change isn't always good, and that seems to be the case this time around!

Thanks to their little update I am no longer interested in using this app. It was already a lot of trouble sorting through the less than useful inventory before they changed the filters tab. Now that the filters are harder to use this app takes to long. It is no longer effecient and I will never be able to find the things that I need without flipping through a million tabs. I guess they no longer want my business.

App is buggy. For example, when viewing an item and you tap the photo to view a larger pic of the item, nothing happens and all your see is the swirling thinking icon even though internet is fast and it works fine in browser. If an item has a link to a owners manual in .pdf format, it never works and displays an error instead; again, the same link works fine a browser.

Still waiting on like 3 of my packages, from months ago. They have a "A-Z Guarantee" apparently they say. But I've tried emailing the actual seller of the product and Amazon. They've shown little ability to help, and even less ability to care. I've spent hundreds of dollars on things for them not to arrive and then customer service can't help. I'll be deactivating my account and literally shopping anywhere else. LOCAL!!

Used to be a very good app but suddenly it has become glitchy. Photos of products don't show properly nor does the little heart to add an item to your wish list which makes it hard to search and save things. I typically like shopping on Amazon but these latest problems with the app is making me, and I'm sure other customers, think twice about using this service. Much better experience shopping on eBay at the moment. Please solve the problem before more people stop shopping with you.

App is generally really nice, clean interface smooth action, crisp transitions to next product. The reason for 3 stars is, I have a few items I "save for later" , everytime I log on there is always a message in my cart about "new information of a product Your cart" when I click on this link, well nothing happens. System freezes on a blank screen.

Useful, but still very frustrating. Delivery dates get confused, different days on different pages. It's pot luck which is correct. There is no filter to sort by delivery date. Not very helpful for subscribe and save. Search is frustrating. I get different results on different devices and finding a specific product from a specific seller is often impossible. About 30% of items are not related to the search at all. Frequently, after a purchase the basket doesn't empty.

EDIT: still crashing, still having to unistall and reinstall... months layer comon Amazon, get this fixed... or I'm off! Normally love this app.... not anymore, it has become so slow, crashes all the time too. In the last week I have had to uninstall and reinstall at least 3 times because it just wont open. Please sort this out, it is just unworkable at the moment. Normally would be 4+ star rating, but not until issues are resolved.

The new layout is absolute garbage. I really hope they reconsider the design, because the whole oversize images and side scroll is awful. I was hoping it was just a bug or mistake, but after the last update and it staying the same I realized someone actually thought this layout was a good idea lol...ðŸ¤¦â€â™€ï¸ what was wrong with the old design...the one row column was way more functional, now we get to side scroll and maybe see some items off screen or complete blank screen haha.

As a long time amazon customer, I really get annoyed with this app. The search aspect is a joke, with so many knock off chinese brands flooding my results. When I search for something, an item with the actual search terms come up about 1/4 results if even that often. There is no way to save a search, and there is a glitch that when you hit the back button it sometimes loses your search altogether, so you may be 1000 results in, and lose your search and have to start over. So frustrating!

Hey Amazon, there's a problem with the delivery chooser. When I try to change the delivery method in the checkout screen, I can see the options, with the radio buttons next to them, but I can't click on the various different options. The delivery option text slightly overlaps the radio buttons, so I expect there's a screen layout problem. Please fix this as I've had to abandon the app and use the web browser version until this is fixed!

The app no longer shows suggested shopping stuff on the main page, instead it shows ads for amazon prime movies, music, audiobooks, books, and magazines so I no longer can easily browse for things or look at products I may like or need based on my purchases or searches. It literally makes me not use it as much and not GIVE PEOPLE MOMEY. I did previously LOVE the app and Amazon prime, but the change in the home screen is a HUGE deterant.

I love using the app when I suddenly think of something I need and want to browse without booting up my laptop. But whenever I go to order something and change the delivery method, it then just buffers and doesn't complete the order! Pointless having the app ig you can't actually order anything. I've tried reinstalling, closing it down and reopening, everything. Also think it's really cheeky that Amazon default the delivery method to standard which you pay for in the first place!

Amazon Prime is designed to keep raising prices before your final purchase. In less than a week I observed 9 price changes on the same item from the same company. When the price automatically raised I deleted the item from my cart. When I searched for the item again the price had lowered a little until I tried to purchase it, then it suddenly jumped up another $5. I firmly believe amazon Prime is designed to continuously scam people are higher prices.

Amazon. Name speaks for itself. Nobody can get my stuff to me as quick without having to shop at stores I would rather just wait for Amazon like everyone else. Quick shipping cheap prices and delivery + returns you really can't go wrong. More brands than I would like to see myself, sometimes when looking for a product I can get tied up with all the different brands that are new to me but I guess bigger product selection is what people want. Thanks Amazon for never disappointing.

I love Amazon. I shop on it daily. However, the last update totally screwed up the way I see items. It is too big for my phone. I have to scroll left and right to see the page. I can only see part of the "previous" button on the bottom, and have to scroll way over to see "next". It no longer has a total of items at the top left, and the way they have changed the filter section is horrid. I HATE it. What are you thinking??

Slow, hard to use, and dramatically inferior to its predecessor. This app tries to do too much, and does most of it badly. The previous app was focused on quickly and efficiently finding products and getting them ordered. This one chugs through searches as it loads a million things you don't want and pictures you won't look at. Lag when increasing the number of items, color, or size take 30 seconds or longer. Stick with the old one as long add you can. I'm sorry I "upgraded."

No longer working properly on my phone. Doesn't show the full screen when scrolling through products, also cannot move page to see the right hand side, so filter options are very limited as well as the next button for the next page, have to turn my phone to landscape to get just enough of it to click. Come on amazon put the faults right so we can actually use the app!

I mean its Amazon who doesn't love Amazon? It's a real lifesaver when u need something fast. If you can't find it on Amazon then it probably doesn't exist. I say that knowing that Amazon can't and won't sell certain items. My point is that Amazon is the first place I check when looking for something. Their prices are great and even better for prime members, so if ur not a prime member I highly suggest becoming one because it offers a lot more then better prices.

I have been using this app for several years and was happy to see that Amazon added the Smile (chaity donation) function to the app. Unfortunately activating it created a never ending loop that failed to turn it on. ANYONE, having difficulties with ANY app, simply uninstall it and re-install. It worked for this and other apps that have been auto updated then had issues. Enjoy full, and expanded functionality, going forward.

Save money, go to AliExpress... I had Prime for 2-day shipping, but I (understandably) was not getting that benefit, so I cancelled. This isn't a problem and I would be willing to sign back up, but not after noticing a lot of the products recently are cheaply manufactured and are available for a fraction of the price from AliExpress (the site I would assume these items are being purchased from to resell on Amazon).

Liked better before it was invaded by Amazon content ads. Used to be easier to browse but that is gone and replaced by Prime Video ads, Audible ads, etc. There's no easy way to browse thru possible options you have to go to the area your shopping for and find your item. Can't access lightning deals or gold box with ease. Very unhappy with this version

Whenever I try to open the app it either shows a completely blank page(excluding the top bar with the menu, which does nothing but open blank pages), says something went wrong, or to sign in(but if I try to sign it it gets stuck trying to open that, eventually timing out and going back to the sign in screen). I've even tried to uninstall the most recent update with no luck getting it to cooperate.

I've had this app for years, but finally fed up with one issue to leave a review. The app resets my progress when looking at a list like daily deals. It happens when I select an item and go to that page and then decide to return to the list and press the back button. When I go back to continue viewing the list it starts me at the top. So infuriating that I stop shopping which is a lose/lose for both parties. Please fix.

Lowered app rating from new update when they removed the option to see similar items at the bottom of a listing and instead replaced it with "related posts" that just look like ads. Much less helpful when searching for what you want to buy. Terrible to have to search through pages of listings, hitting next and not being able to easily find a prior listing. Long lag times and frustrating to not be able to choose multiple filters then apply them all. It's all directed at showing more ad listings.

It's great to be able to have the world at your finger tips. Ordering thousands of dollars worth of stuff I dont believe I've had one order without having some sort of shipping issue. Most recently placed a one thousand dollar order 25 days before Christmas but because one item was unavailable until the 12th of February it held up the rest of the shipment and there was no warning that would be the case.

Although I've usually had good experiences with prime this one was way different. I had to cancel my order because I don't have the money. (I did in the bank but not for free spending) I tried cancelling the order 4 times. 3 cancel orders requests were sent. So I spent the money I had (the reason I canceled the order) stupidly assuming it would go through. The order cancellation did not go through. Lesson learned. I love prime but please make sure u absolutely want your order before purchasing.

The app is bloated, slow, and non functional most of the time. Managing your Wishlists is a nightmare, as most of the time the app just doesnt respond when you try to add stuff to them, move stuff around, or just plain old crashes. It takes up to 20 presses just to get one thing MAYBE added to a list, if it doesnt crash first, or click on something else. Its not my phone - its the app. My phone works perfectly fine for all other apps, its fast, and has no lag. Its just this app that breaks.

Can no longer view my recent orders without going in and changing filter settings to the last 30 days. It is showing me 3 months ago. Also when you make product images bigger you can not go back to the product it sends you back to your search. Hope they fix these weird bugs soon. Very happy about being able to use amazon smile from the app now however.

This app used to be awesome but now anytime I search for something the results are bigger than my screen. I can't easily see them without scrolling left, right, up, and down! I searched every setting I could find and did several Google searches. There is no way to change this that I can find. Absolutely terrible and mostly unusable now. I used this app weekly but now I have to wait until I'm home and use my computer.

Nothing has changed even after contacting support! Multiple search results appear too large (like in desktop view). It's difficult to see anything and I need to constantly swipe left/right. This interface is useless in the app and still hasn't been fixed. And yes, I deleted and downloaded the app several times like support suggested - it did not help. It also looks like this from another phone, so the issue is not with my device.

It has always been wonderful, Amazon is my go to for online ordering. But I dont know what has happened recently bc all of the sudden it's super delayed and the pictures wont show up. it needs to be fixed ASAP! Not happy!! Is there no team reading these reviews?! Everyone is saying the same thing. This app used to be wonderful and now it barely works at all! Something needs to be fixed NOW. Currently it's basically useless ðŸ˜¡

App has been great until recently. It has made shopping very difficult and frustrating (which is maybe what Amazon wants so we'll buy less of their stuff?) I am unable to go back to where I was in the list after clicking on a product. I have to use the back button several times for it to respond, then takes me all of the way back to the first page. Please fix this!!!

I think it's a great app and I do recommend it, but it it has a few flaws like sometimes when you delete a wishlist it doesn't delete until the next day, and if you to go to Amazon Basics you have to actually search 'Amazon Basics' instead of it being a catagory to go to. But other than that it's a really great app and it has some really great and useful items.

Prior to the update filtering was very specific. After the update the filter feature was changed/simplified which prevents the user from narrowing results and now instead of 30-50 results i have 2000. Cant begin to say how many of those results arent even close to what was entered in the search. Also, while viewing & selecting the picture for a product, retirning to the item page is impossible without selecting the back button many times and eventually arriving at the 1st page of the search

I would give 5-stars but I believe that the filter refining tool needs to be improved. It seems that when I choose to have items sorted by price that a lot of the items disappear. For example, I usually select prime first which eliminates all but prime delivery options. But I prefer to sort the remaining items by price from low to high or vice versa. This usually eliminates a lot more items and I am not sure why. Also, if I am looking for a specific item, I want only that item not associated ite

Glitchy and Hard to Use - I keep having glitches where pictures won't show (I can't scroll through more than maybe 15 items in their prime day section for example without all the pictures disappearing), and the categories feature is really frustrating to use. I wish you could set a price range when searching instead of choosing from options like "under $25" or "$25-$50", and they make it hard to search (what would be REALLY helpful is being able to select more than one...)

Edit: new bug. Needs notification approved on the app but this is not compatible with Android devices. I don't know wha's happened to the search. Maybe they're pushing their featured/sponsored results at the top of the list, it takes ages now to find what you're looking for. Difficult filtering, not transparent in terms of where the items come from. Reviews often don't match the item on the page. Feature request: order results by which item I can receive the quickest

I have no earthly idea what in the world happened to this app. But the view list while shopping is completely out alignment! I cannot see the results without sliding the page from right to left. Please fix this ASAP! It has been going in for a couple of weeks now. I've uninstalled and reinstalled hoping to catch an update but its still out of alignment. I'd hate to do mu Christmas shopping elsewhere but there is noway that I can successfully shop like this!

Loaded because I had a pop-up offering $10 discount if purchase made through app, which I never found once I installed it. But the biggest frustration was trying to navigate loading of the multiple gift cards I had. Finally got the first loaded, tried the second, and the system said the purchase was processed. I still don't know how much I was charged. I'll stick to the website.

Latest update unusable on Samsung Galaxy phone... Have to scroll reaaaallly far to right to see filters & some are missing or have no options in drop down. Used to work fine! Whyyy? Search results are giant, and can't see even 1 item w/ photo, description & price fully on screen at once. Do they think we are all on landscape tablets? Used to adjust to my screen size. Now like trying to shop on a website that wasn't designed for mobile. I mostly use on phone, or occasionally on tablet or laptop.

This app is no longer efficient or reliable. #1) it notifies me that my PICKUP LOCATIONS are NOT available or are CLOSED... When in Fact, online those locations are available. THIS CAUSED UNNECESSARY need to find alternate locations that are not convenient.... 2) Filtering Criteria for products... Does not allow you to check each filter at one time. Instead, it takes an individual checked filter at a time. Very tedious lengthy process which defeats the purpose of using the filter.

Very bad service service client, having now a problem regarding a product they sent, was completely wrong, was not what I have ordered, they don't send the label for return, I had to pay the shipping cost by my self even the mistake was theirs, now is almost 1 month waiting for a refund. I can't even see who was the seller, Amazon or a third part... They won't let me know. I would like to write a review to them too, because they made a big mistake, making me lose a lot time

I pay extra for prime and cant even get my stuff on time. I am paying extra, and some items arent even shipped by the date they are supposed to arrive on. I contacted customer service and they said the best they can do is cancel the order and then i can pay for expedited shipping. So they want me to pay extra for an item i would still receive late. This is how they treat customers that are paying an extra monthly fee to supposedly recieve items faster.

I have used this app for years and have loved it. But they have changed the layout. Instead of all the items for sale being right on top of each other, they added another row to the right. 2 items per line. I can't see both items unless I scroll over. And then I have to scroll down to see what's underneath. I don't know if I'm describing this well, but I find shopping with this really unpleasant. I guess I'll just use the website instead.

Can't go without it. However, I really, really dislike the new Lists layout (OK, I hate it, and not just because you can't pop a secret onto a list for your spouse not to see, but now it's left out in the open!), that there's never a single place to easily see all of my credits and balances, and that photos on products always seem to take a long time to load. But in the larger scope of things, the app is overall great.

Really frustrating to use this app. Just trying to scroll through the lightning deals, images load fine, then suddenly all images disappear and takes a little while for the pictures to load back in. I've tried force closing, clearing cache, clearing data, using WiFi, using mobile data, restarting phone, uninstalling and reinstalling the app, unplugging phone from charger and it makes no difference, so can only assume it's the app!

Does what I need, but not worth taking up space on my phone. I had Amazon's app earlier on my phone but removed it in an effort to not shop as much. I decided to reinstall the app for 2 reasons: 1) the ability to drag and drop products into a list below for easy navigation of all your options 2) being able to swipe between customer photos, which is a nuisance to deal with on mobile site Both of these features are gone, which is upsetting. The ONLY perk of this app is order status notif.

Normally very good. But when I forgot to switch payment method to new card and it was declined (perfectly fine, my own fault) when I switched payment methods to new card and applied a $5 gift code I had received the $5 was not taken off and instead I was charged for 2 orders instead of 1! And now I'm supposed to download the app to chat with someone because I'm at work and can't have personal phone calls! Won't be shopping at Amazon again for a long time!

What happened?! Amazon sure knows how to take the "shopping" out of the Amazon Shopping app. Why is my home page FILLED with only books, movies, magazine subscriptions, albums, all sorts of digital content I'm not even remotely interested in. I used to love scrolling through the recommended products. Now I only open the app when I have to. And even then it's annoying and half the time I just close it.

This app use to be great, now when I search for something I have to keep dragging the screen back & forth to see stuff. It automatically spreads it out like a freakin web browser & it's driving me nuts. I'm ready to uninstall, cancel my prime membership, and all of my Amazon music, etc. & stop buying from Amazon completely if this issue isn't fixed soon. **UPDATE** UPDATED MY ANDROID SYSTEM WEBVIEW & IT FIXED MY AMAZON APP PROBLEMS!

When viewing results of searches, my other shopping apps have an endless scroll of items. For some reason, Amazon app makes me go to the next page after only about 25 items. So if my search returns 500 results, I have to page through about 20 pages to see every item rather than all items on one page. If I want to go back to a previous item, it's very tedious to find. If this were resolved, 5 stars!

For the most successful company on the planet I don't know how they're messing the search results up so often. For years it was fine, do a search and to see everything only requires scrolling down. For months now a search will now put half the results off-screen requiring a side-scroll, meaning you have to zig-zag to see all the results. So asinine for a mobile app, where a single column list should be default.

You would think with Bezos being the richest person in the world he could actually build a useful app but I digress. My biggest gripes are with lists. I can't view any of my friends or families lists in the app, which is beyond frustrating. I have to email or text myself the link to access. Secondly, I can't add the same product to multiple lists. What if two people in my family want the same thing? No way to add it to both of their lists. Please fix this glaring problem.

Load times for filters ruins this. So slow! No different than using the site on a mobile browser in which case why bother using an app. Too bad Amazon will miss out on purchases of mine because I always say....nah I'd rather just wait and do it on my pc or laptop. By then I often forget what I was shopping for and don't shop for several more weeks, if at all. If I were Bezos I would tear his IT department a new one for still not having fixed this. You're losing revenue due to this guaranteed.

This is such a horribly buggy app verging on unusable. Horrible lag and it often makes my entire phone (OnePlus 7 Pro) unresponsive. I've had these same issues going back years and on several different devices. The problem clearly the app & its development team. It never improves and I'm tempted to say it has gotten worse. Today, I decided to remove the app and only access Amazon through Chrome. I wish I could tell you why I didn't decide to do this years ago. Amazon, get it together.

Recently I've found the update to be a bit frustrating. One update in particular, the filter options. Although I don't mind the new placement, you can no longer (as far as I've seen) filter by price. That is usually what my shopping experience has been about. I don't mind the recommended items, the 4 stars and up etc. But if I've gotta sit on this app and search for something i feel suits me..I don't want to have to spend 30-40 minutes on it. After a while i just give up, saves me money i guess

Content is great obviously, but the app can be a little flakey at times. For instance when scrolling through product lists (usually Flash Deals or Black Friday lists etc.) the images for the products occasionally disappear at a certain scroll point, then reappear if you scroll back up, however this can mean you only see the very top of an image before it disappears. I can replicate this often and am able to take a screen record if Support/Dev needs it. Managing Subscriptions could be better.

App is super convenient and great for finding and comparing items. Only thing is that it often has bugs where you get stuck trying to do certain things. Most commonly when you try to switch from standard shipping to free shipping (which once eligible should be the automatic selection) the app will get stuck on a loading page forever. Only way to solve it is to back out of the app, go back in without closing it, then click continue again

Recently there has been an issue with this app. It used to function "okay", but now when I try to sort my wish list by priority, it will only allow me to see the two dozen or so items at the top. This happens on both my phone and my tablet. Overall, it's more glitchy on my phone. Also, in addition to fixing the current issies, I would love to see a change to make it more similar to a computer. That being, having my wish have pages...not just one horribly long page.

Not a fan of the new style and functionality of the lastest version. Seems like they merged all of Amazon's various arms into the shopping app. Now it's just a dysfunctional mess of stuff I'm not concerned about. And it's actually made shopping, what the app has always done best, harder. The new color scheme and way results are displayed is not great as well.

I ordered an item using Prime and it said it would be delivered in 2 days when planning the order. Unfortunately, due to the COVID-19 pandemic, they delayed it for over a month. That was understandable, however, they refused to let me cancel the item so I could go buy it in person elsewhere. If they can't deliver the products, they should allow for reasonable cancellations.

This has been a great app for the most part. I have had issues with small technical things, like I attempt to click on an image to make it bigger but it won't load. It doesn't always load all the information on the site. However I have been able to use Amazon seamlessly and if there has been any problem with orders I get it sent straight to my phone instead of having to check my email. I only took away one star because of the interface issues and small technical problems that they're aware of.

The app is what I check the most unless writing a review. I'm most likely never going to master touch screen typing but on my mechanical keyboard and laptop, I zoom through it. The app is excellent for checking (obsessively at times) the status of my order and the updates regarding where my shipment is. I love when I can follow the stops it makes when it gets close enough via Amazon Van's.

Mostly a good experience, but I've had multiple problems with sellars and I still havent gotten a refund from a month ago. Its great for tracking your products and finding things you need or want without leaving the house. I really do like amazon, the app is more expensive than wish at some products but in so many ways I prefer it. I really love amazon and I've only had a few problems with them and the customer service being snippy with me but it's a good app and very trustworthy.

I'm wondering who in the development team had the idea to group the search filters by tabs instead of a simple menu. Also, the filters don't work properly. For example, filtering 4 stars or more shows items with average of 3.5 stars. To complicate more, the new update doesn't show the number of items found after each search. It's a nightmare, why call it an update? It's more like a child's toy. I'm uninstalling the app and canceling my prime membership until the app is fixed. Wake up Amazon.

The most recent couple of versions of the app are not showing the products when scrolling on the galaxy s10. They completely disappear and can only be viewed by clicking the product. This happens in any of the black Friday buttons (such as lightning deals or all deals). Uninstall and reinstall doesn't help. Up until the last couple of versions it worked great. Using android 10 with latest patch.

Fantastic Shopping App!! Amazon has almost everything a person could hope for!! The prices vary from very advantageous to ridiculously high. I believe they're high when Amazon doesn't want to carry that product. So that's when I shop elsewhere. Amazon usually exceeds my expectations! Whatever you buy can be returned with no hassle and Amazon pays the return shipping! I have several subscriptions for basic home products that I save a lot of money on plus I get a 5 or 15% discount on each of them!

Pointless One of the worst apps I've ever used. Sooo much slower than Amazon though my web browser. Also very glitchy: tried to make a purchase, the app said both my addresses (PO Box and physical) were undeliverable on EVERY item in the cart. I switched to my browser with the same cart No problems! So why use this app, I can't think of ONE good reason!

Please FIX SAMSUNG DEX optomization! I use Samsung Dex for most of my computer needs does the job and I shop a lot on Amazon. The app isn't designed for the Dex OS, if you can get a developer to make it optomized for Dex users that be wonderful! Most the photo thumbnails are blow up and won't scroll though the menu photos when you are viewing an item. This doesn't give the feel of a good user experience! Thank you.

I love using amazon and will continue to do so. The only problem I have is that I have been blocked from leaving reviews on the stuff I buy. I have emailed support many times over the past few years and have yet to get a response back from anyone as to why I am not allowed to leave reviews. I'll give a 5 star once someone gets I'm touch with me about this situation. Update: The app either doesn't load or it loads then crashes.

Amazon is so better than walmart. There is no middle man you get ur products from the source. I love how reaching customer service is so easy. Amazon doesnt play about messed or dmanaged products they will either get ur money back or another product. Shopping is a breeze and each section is well organizing easy to filter. I never been big on online shopping or trusting places with my credit card information but i do with amazon. All there items are unique!

Twice, I have made a purchase & for some reason, the package can't be delivered. Amazon, fix your game. Not even during this quarantine affair, it canceled my order. Let's look @ why it canceled. First, Amazon doesnt even provide you with a reason. Sec., potentially an item does "not ship to your location". I can understand that but when the person I sleep above orders the same thing, sends me the link, & in a few weeks she gets the same product & I get "undeliverable". Equal Opportunity much?

They have quite the selection and the app is easy to use except it is hard to get packages delivered to the correct address if you live in a highly populated area. I constantly get packages delivered to the wrong address I have to track them down myself with little to no success Amazon always says they will reship the package back out but how much good does that do if they keep sending it to the wrong place.

I loved Amazon & it has been my go-to online shop for years. Recently, lesser and lesser things have become available to ship to my country. Even when I select global shipping filters/ international shipping eligible, either no products are available or it shows me completely different products! There would be no point in me having Amazong much longer if this will continue to be the case for anything I buy. Hope things will change soon.

This latest Amazon update has completely ruined so much for me. Half the time my screen goes black when scrolling through a list and only returns after I've passed the item that causes the glitch. My Orders aren't showing up correctly causing me to order an item twice. It used to be 5 stars but the amount of bugs in this new update has been terrible

I have ordered from Amazon a few times, not alot though, infact probably less then 10 times, but each of these times I have gotten my things on time, with out any problems. So based off of my experience with Amazon so far, I would highly recommend them, and I definitely give them a thumbs up. I have also noticed their prices to be a little cheaper, which is always in good thing, don't you agree?

For as much money as amazon makes you would think that they would be able to make an app that works. I've been an amazon customer for over 13 years. This app just gets worse and worse. Half the time it doesn't load properly or stays at loading screens for ever. It crashes all the time. You constantly have to reload it. When it works its great but like I said, it only works half the time.

The app works really well until I get to the payment/delivery options screen. If I try to make an adjustment - for example, when changing from standard delivery to free delivery - I just get a spinning wheel and I can't complete my order. It is very frustrating. This has been a long-standing issue, across more than one device. If not for this bug, I would give the app a five star rating.

It used to be amazing, seems to be super slow now. Lags and delays on clicking. Plus the fact that they don't allow you to call customer service anymore, and instead they try to force customers to communicate with customer service associates via this new instant-messaging/chat feature, which can be quite frustrating at times. Hopefully things pick up again when the pandemic nonsense is behind us allðŸ¤™ðŸ™ðŸ¼

I don't know how amazon can take a completely functioning app and break it so badly. It was funxtioning perfectly in January then I installed the update and it ran so slow that I couldn't use it. I then deleted and reinstalled it, same thing, slow as molasses. Deleted everything on my phone and did a factory reset. Amazon app was the first and only app installed still too slow to be usable. Then I installed it on my tablet and other phone. Too slow on those devices also. Garbage app.

Update: this app truly sucks. It is designed, yes, designed, to make you accidently click on what you don't want during checkout Old: Useful if you know what you want to buy. However, the Amazon search engine misleads you. It is hard to find what you are looking for because they intentionally drown you in irrelevant, sponsored, or other useless results that are just pure spam, in hopes you buy more irrelevant junk. No, they won't change it, and it's no accident. It's been like that for years.

Amazon is a mess. Going on this app trying to shop is like going into a rummage sale in a third world country. The prices fluctuate constantly and there is a scam with every other product. The app is slow, misleading, before I can finish my order products in my cart sell out, disappear, I was recent charged 135.00 on my card but then only 119.00 worth of product was in the arriving order. Trying to talk to a live human is next to impossible buried under layers of nonsense. Terrible app. Don't .

Terrible! The home page is completely useless with book and movie adds! That's NOT why I am a Prime Member! There is no option to change the layout and the process you have to go through now to search for items is primitive at best, such a waste of time. This change DEFINITELY decreased the amount of purchasing I'll do with Amazon. Thumbs down to development!

After the last update just prior to this one, whenever I do a product search on my phone (galaxy 10e) I only get one page of results with no option to go to a next page. On the bottom of the search results it just has a back arrow and previous. Reached out to Amazon and was told it must be a glitch and they would fix it. Not fixed with this update. I agree with others that the new filter tabs don't work very well either. Your old format was better. Not too happy Amazon. Fix it!!

I love Amazon but after the last update you can only look at 10 items per page and you can only filter searches one at a time. It has made shopping in Amazon an annoyance which makes me look elsewhere for product. Dropped my rating down to one star. I just can't anymore with the app. The new filtering makes the app mind numbingly slow. And each update adds a new problem or a "feature" that makes it less user friendly

There's been some major problems lately with the app... When scrolling randomly all the images of products will just disappear. I still hate the page system they put in place. On top of those two issues, I still can't believe amazon doesn't have a dark mode yet. In all honesty the app just blinds me if I'm in a semi dark room. Even just a medium grey background would be better than that blinding white. UI's clunky, there's bugs, and the page system for scrolling through products is frustrating.

The new update on search is horrible. It used to be user friendly. Now the images are HUGE and I have to scroll back and forth to not only see the one image, but there is also another product to the far right of it that I'd miss if I didn't scroll over. The "Next" button is also to the far right. Can you please go back to the old list of smaller images of the products for easier viewing?

Overall I love Amazon, my only complaint with this app is that the filter options do not work anymore. I can select filters, but they never apply to my search. There's no apply button and when I toggle the filer box after selecting my filters nothing happens. The only button that works is the PRIME toggle button, not even the PRIME option in the filters, I've already reinstalled the app. A fix/update to correct this would really be nice and would create a better shopping experience.

A disappointing, infuriating experience. This is just an app with an embedded browser. It's a PWA, but the browser engine is TERRIBLE. The performance is several times worse than the website on Chrome/Firefox mobile. Navigation takes 10s to render, 25s to fully load. Changing a color/size of an item causes a 30+ second hang EVERY TIME. On a flagship smartphone. This is pathetic. Only use for notifications. Better performance plus ad/tracking block just by using Firefox.

Typically Outstanding..Every time. It's like the app and I are so sync'd that when I'm looking for one item, I know those things have additional requirements. Amazingly, it seems to read my mind by having the additional item suggested. Of course there's always something that needs tweeked, and Amazon is on top of it or, in most cases, already ahead.

Idk what happened, but the past couple months after I've filtered something and trying to lol through a category or price range in the middle of browsing through items, it puts me back in the home screen and what I last searched for is in the search bar for me to hit submit. very, Very, VERY FRUSTRATING!!! Please fix this ap issue! I have a Galaxy Note 9. When I search via internet browser, it doesn't do this. So I'm guessing it's an app update or whatever

Someone has started leaving fake reviews from my account. I contacted them on the weekend and they said it would be 1-2 business days before they get back to me. This is day 3 and nothing. Be very careful people. It looks like their security has been breached. Going to close my account and not buy from them anymore because I don't feel safe shopping from them now. My amazon prime membership was renewed last month unfortunately.

As a Amazon Prime member I like using this app. However I notice it has been gotten a bit worse. Lately I tried to filter out my search in order to get the things I need. Like 90% it glitches and does not work. Besides that interface could be more smoother. I like the Amazon but this app could be better in my opinion. Update: they have sorted of fixed the filtering feature but it's far from perfect. It's a bit laggy but doable...

Love Amazon...but...... Positives: great customer service, ease of returns, great selection. Not so positive: the latest update. No lightening deals, too hard to find deals of the day. Im not interested in the music, books, media that is being flooded on the home page. It completely takes the joy out of shopping, browsing, buying and DISCOVERING DIFFERENT items I may not be lookng for or know about. It's not fun to shop/browse anymore.

When I'm scrolling to view any of the products on lightening deal it's a blank screen so I have to click to view whatever it is. I get notifications for roll filaments everytime they're on a deal I don't care nor do I want to buy a roll of plastic. Would it not make more sense to send me deals I've bought in the past. The app is so sloppy it's not good at all. It's more of an inconvenience if anything! The app should be an easier experience then using google but it's really not!! Thumbs down...

Shipping time wasn't priority to me but didn't want to pay the extra. Before ordering November 2nd said it would be there by November 10th. It's now November 12th and still not shipped yet. They want me to pay the extra in order to ship it when I want. Misleading information from the get-go period would have thought from somewhere else that I known this but believe me I won't be using this app for shopping ever again.

This app is inferior to ebay. Search engine is poor and even sorting mixes items that arent even related to your search. It even displays items that doesnt deliver to your country. With the size of amazon you'd think they can spend the money to improve all this. The reviews area are better than ebay including a section where you can ask questions about the product from both seller and previous buyers.

I think this is the 2nd way to use Amazon, (if you don't have a desktop, or laptop in front of you), but the website itself has a problem with debit/credit cards, cause when ever my dad tries to use it just at the checkout screen(s), you have to end up adding the actual card, and then removing it a day later, can you pls make to where if you can make it to where people can just use the card for that specific time, and then again, instead of having add it, thx!!! But overall this app is amazing!

This use to be great but as of late if I am look for something I can't even get past 1 page and it kicks me to a screen that says something like having problems trying to fix return to home screen. I have uninstalled this app half a dozen times an reinstalled it still does the same thing. It works fine on my phone, but my tablet is where the problem is. I even tried the Amazon for tablets, same thing. Wish this would get fixed so very annoying and aggravating.

newly terrible. I used to love this app, it worked seamlessly with no freezing / glitches. I don't know what happened, but I don't even want to buy anything on Amazon right now because it's so difficult to use the app. ex: when I'm looking at an item's pictures and then press the back button, nothing happens, then I press it again and I'm brought to the home page and now I've lost the item I was looking at. the iPhone version looks great, guess android users can go eff themselves. thanks Amazon

App no longer works on Pixel 3 (my phone has the latest security update from this month). Amazon App worked fine until the other day when it was updated. Now it no longer works and crashes immediately upon open. Even after clearing the app from memory, un/reinstalling it and rebooting my device, I still get a notification that the app has crashed. The app worked perfectly before this week's update.

My biggest complaint is the filter options. They're inconsistent, don't offer many options, nor does it allow for you to /exclude/ certain options. Example: for my work I need steel toe boots that are 100% leather and at least ankle height. If I could even be given the option of using key words to filter such as 100% leather, it could really help. Or being able to exclude certain things brands that I know I don't like.

I can't see all the filters... This has been going on on and off for a while. I have to go on my tablet which is inconvenient at times cause the app doesn't let me see filters ..or it's HUGE and I can't slide the page over to view. So annoying. And I updated to see if it would fix it .. NOPE. COOOOOOOOOOOOL I love paying for prime when first off, majority of the time I don't actually get 2 day shipping AND the app is always changing the layout. 2 years ago it was mint. Now. Hunk of junk ..

Worked fine for months, but has gotten so bad the last 2 weeks that I finally deleted the app. Not worth the stress of waiting 2 to 3 minutes for a single link to open. Even then, half the images don't load and I cannot scroll through the page to find what I need. Links sent to me by friends will not open, app won't load then crashes.

Careful with the "free" Prime trial.. it does not automatically cancel . Therefor they end up charging you without any notice. No wonder its a multi-billion dollar company when they can reach into your pockets and simply take money (Yes.. I know... read the fine print right, cause everyone does that). I have also found that there is a lot of cheap knock off products through amazon posing as the the real thing. Read about your purchases and research the seller carefully if you are looking for quality products.

Update 6/22/2020: the app has become so unresponsive that it's borderline unusable. Also I noticed that it was getting order tracking numbers confused in the app and getting the correct information was only available through the web interface which isn't convenient when picking up packages and needing the correct tracking. Found a solution. Uninstall the app, and add Amazon to your home screen from Chrome. It will install a web app that actually works

Frustrating, stop taking over control of peoples phones. I sometimes scan QR codes to text links to others, I need it to be able to bring up the url so I can copy it, this app forces all amazon links to open with the app then has no way to generate the URL. There is no way to prevent it from opening the app other then deleting the app.

I'm constantly using the app for purchases and im an Amazon prime member. Recently I'm severely frustrated with the app. You cannot switch your searched items view. There is no way to choose grid view or list view. There is no way to zoom out to view. Also unless you turn your phone to landscape you miss an entire column of items available for purchase. You can no longer swipe left at the bottom inorder to click next. You also can no longer swipe left at the top to choose your different filters

This app is the slowest most unreliable app I have ever experienced. Every other app will work perfectly fine but Amazon needs like lightening fast speeds and the greatest internet connection in the world before it decides it wants to work. I have a Samsung galaxy s8 and there is no excuse for how pathetic an app it has been over the years.

Horrible UI for mobile phones. Searching is tedious with a recent update because the images are so large that you don't get enough results at one time. You have to scroll longer and waste too much time. #frustrating Just go to the regular site on a PC. Avoid the app until they do back to the old way or improve the new way of searching.

Can we fix whatever causes devices to lag/stop responding when moving an item to a different lost already? I've had several different phones over the last few years, both android and apple, and on every single one the app always slows down, stops responding or crashes whenever moving more than 1 item to another list. Doesn't matter if no apps are running in the background and hard closing out of the all doesn't solve the problem.

I used to love the app, now it's constantly clicking on that stupid one click button instead of scrolling while I'm on my list, over half of my searches (I search for a few authors daily to check for reduced prices on books) refuse to show, it's so much slower than before the update, and it's harder to filter and sort searches. Wish I could go back to before the update.

Customer service has gone downhill. Ever since they let 3rd party sellers sell their goods on here, it's been nothing but trouble. I understand the delays in shipping for certain things because of Covid. But, Amazon not updating things sold n fulfilled thru Amazon, not refunding money when item never shipped or was out of stock but they still took your money or double charged u. Waiting weeks or longer for info on shipping on items and sometimes never getting it. I'm really disappointed Amazon!

Using Amazon on an S20. My biggest wish for this app is I would love to exclude Prime searches that have import+deposit fees. I waste my time a lot, going in and out of Prime delivery purchases that have import+deposit fees. Used to be able to click on the cart icon after reviewing price changes. That stopped working and have to exit cart. When reviewing purchases, would like to see what card I used to make the purchase.

It's convenient, easy to use, fun to scroll, BUT it'd be cool if there was an algorithm to automatically remove things off the wishlist if purchased by OTHERS. If I buy off my wishlist, it goes away. If others decide they wanna gift me, I have a chance of getting doubles/duplicates because it doesn't auto remove when someone else purchases off my wishlist.

Amazon has become very strict with their fraud policy, almost too strict. I need some things I really cannot get anywhere else and cannot log in to my account. The agent was not helpful when he said to send a verification document I could not even open myself on my phone. Pain in the but. Now I still can't get into my account and have to go somewhere else.....

It doesn't take the money out right when you pay for it but when it is on its way, I also have been getting some notifications that I'm spending more money on amazon than I am, Im not sure if it's a bug or if the money thing could be fixed but it would be appreciated. This is a great app, gets most deliveries on time or early so far!

SO SLOW! I keep waiting for them to fix the slowness of being able to click on the pics of a product, or click add to cart, but it takes so long before you can click on most things after the initial product page loads. Issue on all phones and tablets I've used. Also very tricky and nasty of you Amazon that after I buy something and then go down to click the "continue shopping" button that it drops down perfectly timed so I end up clicking on someone's Ad instead of the button to keep shopping!!

Had been using this for a year while living in US and the service was exemplary! I was using prime and all deliveries were almost always on time, and when they make mistakes with my orders, customer service is always ready to help and give discounts and upgrades. Reliable items as well! Only had to return items twice. Comes highly recommended!!!

Pretty decent overall. Intuitive user menus (that aren't search filter related). Biggest issue is that, for some reason, newer versions don't have a copy to clipboard option on Android. Why? When I want to share something, I don't want to go through apps. I want to copy a link.

My family and I have made hundreds of order via the Amazon app with no problems. However, this past weekend I made an order for one of the deals of the day/lightning deals which the app showed as submitted and confirmed. Done is done, I thought. When I checked this evening, the order never processed, the item was back in my cart, and the price for the day I attempted the order would not be honored. Costumer service recommended I reinstall the app and/or go ahead and pay full price.

Absolutely exasperating, sticky pull down menus, update buttons that take forever to update, shopping within whole food portion of the app then suddenly takes you to prime or amazon fresh tab, you then have to physically navigate the app back to whole foods, select your local whole foods *every single time*. Not intuitive, UI way too cluttered with millions of products, tabs, options. Amazon desperately needs a streamlined, clean ecosystem that is decluttered, simple and intuitive.

Please change the app back to how it was before! It's now super slow, (reminds me of dial up!) I have to press the buttons multiple times to get them to work (which is only an issue with this app.) I wish I could drag & drop items to my wish list like I could before. Also, I wish we could filter things by price in all the categories, not just some of them. The app worked great before, not sure why they would change it to this.

The mobile app is terrible. It seems like they took the desktop page and did not bother to configure it. All the icons are too big for the screen, and you have to scroll sideways and up/down to even see anything. The mobile browser version is much easier to navigate than the app, and all the icons are the correct size. What is the point of downloading the app when you could just open Brave or Chrome? Yikes!

Usually a fine app, but the latest update changed the ui and the main screen dosnt even have items for sale anymore, it's all ads for Amazon services. To look at items you need to search for them, when I always really enjoyed seeing the products recommended based my on interests on my home screen. At this point not sure how to access the deals section anymore.

Been buggy to the point of even crashing my Samsung 20! You would think with all the money they're making hand over fist that they could get an app that doesn't constantly keep crashing. If you really don't want me to buy your stuff than you are succeeding in your goal. Between the crashes and the inability to look at images of most products that is easily done on the website In more annoyed than enticed to purchase most of the time.

The app stopped working about three weeks ago. It opens for a nanosecond and then crashes. Crashes instantly. I tried to delete and reload the app. Still not working. Since the Coronavirus hit us, the app stopped working. I think Amazon is overwhelmed and removing the app feature reduces customer's ability to order items easily. I think this is deliberate otherwise Amazon would have fixed it already by now. Anyone else having the same problem???

I was a huge fan of Amazon for years, but no longer! After I realized that they'd been double billing me for 3 years, would only refund me 9 months back, and now their doing it again! So ya,I have no faith in them anymore. Plus, after over 4hrs on the phone, and 2 links via text, they were still unable to connect my Prime acc to my phone. That being said, I've now had to sign up for Prime a 3rd time and will undoubtedly spend hrs dealing w them today. I NEED Prime due to Covid19 or I'd be done

My last two shopping experiences were pretty horrible! The previous time, I had to talk to customer service twice for 20+(?) minutes to get the free shipping I was led to expect, resulting in a store credit, not an immediate refund! The recent experience was so frustrating I was left hyperventilating for maybe 20 minutes, desperately trying to get my order accepted correctly by the app that was running me around and thwarting me! Even the order confirmation left me uncertain about my order!.

Lately the app has become frustrating ðŸ˜ . Normally when I've made a purchase, I click the continue shopping button at the bottom of the order confirmation screen. Just recently, Amazon has starting putting small banner adds that are timed to pop up right where the Continue Shopping button is located a split second before I click it. It happens almost right before I click, and I inadvertently click the ad instead. As a result, I'm adjusting my habits to close the app after a purchase instead.

I would give the app 3 stars, but it loses 2 stars for extreme intrusiveness. When I grocery shop (a non-Amazon store) it follows me through the aisles and makes Whole Foods suggestions. I find no way to turn that feature off and Amazon ignores inquiries. They evidently feel they have every right to spy on you and don't intend to stop. This is heinous. I have to uninstall to shop or constantly close suggestions to reaccess my shopping list. Every time I want to look at my list.

App is not working properly. It loads pages very slow or not at all. Constantly goes to the error page with "Go to Amazon Home" button. Amazon needs to fix the issues with this APP as soon as possible. Many people need this app to work because they need essential supplies Amazon has in stock. Update: July 2020, This App still sucks, it consistently fails to load pages. There are many complaints of this version of the Amazon App, however Amazon still has not fixed it...WHY NOT???

Great Amazon prime asap shipping, but the usual miserable experience trying to search for anything on Amazon. Can't believe they have still not fixed their awful UX. If I search for something specific, I do not want the billion things that are only VAGUELY related to a single keyword. Just add exact search quote function (ie "this and only this") PLEASE. (This literally makes me regularly shop elsewhere for higher price, just so I don't have to deal with that nightmare!)

When tapping product in app or link to a product outside the app that jumps into the app, product fails to show and frequently a segment of what displays will blink/slide on screen in a stuck loop. Samsung Galaxy S8 with all OTA updates from T-Mobile since I got it used (fmr. Verizon), tried reinstalling then clearing data. Took screen capture video. Will try use the developer feedback info to send it. There's another (inconsistent) bug where switching to the app from a clicked link gets stuck.

After switching from Souq to Amazon, the delivery system is collapsed. The schedule given in accounts are just numbers, they never deliver on time. Prime membership is like a scam, because its same delayed deliveries, to get free deliveries you will have to buy selected expensive alternates for your order, otherwise deliveries are charged. Prime or no prime, return of order is headache as ever. They never collect return or refund back for items untill you follow up several times.

When I purchased my mobile, it came with an Amazon app. Then Amazon stopped supporting that app, forcing me to download this "new" one to continue using its service (the old app just links to the download page of the new one when launched); however, I can't uninstall the old, bloatware app to make room for the new one. The additional kick in the pants was after deleting other apps to fit this new one, it runs worse than the old one! It's consistently loading slower if at all! Absolute garbage.

horrible it opens but is blank. wont open anything. i only switched to this one because the other amazon app said support for it would be ending soon and to switch to this. not helpful when it doesn't work. Update: it worked for a while not I can only view the first page it won't let me move the screen to click next page. Can only view part of the page at that. It doesn't let me swipe over at all.

Why is the app not notifying me when my order is on its way anymore? I've had 3 orders recently that suddenly turned up and the last notification I got was that they had been dispatched but no push notification telling me when it is 8 or less stops away like I used to get. All the notifications are are set on the app and phone. One delivery turned up a day early so it was lucky I was in.

Very disappointed. Can't buy coins for game apps. I get the runaround from customer service. I emailed 2 days ago for help and no email yet then did online help. That's when the runaround started. Cause of it I didn't get a chance to buy a very rare item in game that only comes out every 3 months if lucky. Couldn't even use my $15.00 gift card I won to add to the purple. How difficult is that. They see it. I'm only getting the $42.50 5000 coins package. ðŸ™„ Very sad cause never had any problems

Great when it works. In general, prime is a great deal and Amazon provides decent hassle-free service, but if they mess up your package pretty much the only thing they will do to make it right is offer a refund. The search feature has gone downhill over time and it's currently not possible to exclude irrelevant search results, which makes tasks like searching for cellphone cases a complete waste of time.

I would like to see a night mode. The app is slow and buggy compared to the structure of the website. In a lot of ways the app does make it quicker to check on your orders without having to open your browser but if you're quick with your browser it's worth sticking to the main site. Edit: Getting better. I now only use the app. It's a bit heavy on battery usage and images tend to load slow compared to the website loaded in Chrome. I would still like a darker theme that is easier on the eyes.

I have alot of problems with this app. First Ill get to adding items to your lists: its very difficult to add a item to your list/s without first, clicking the text to 'add to list' several times , than it automatically assumes where I want to put the item in what list so I manually have to reassign it to a different list. Very frustraighting. Another issue; The app runs slow, its not my internet or anything else the app is slow. Last issue; loads images really slow sometimes.

Terrible app for shopping. There aren't enough filters when you search so you're left sifting through way too much stuff. If i want a product between $100-$300 there should be a filter to make that easier, instead i have to sort by highest or lowest price and then go through page by page until i get to the price point i want...ridiculous! The website will show me a product that's eligible for monthly payments, but the app will show that same product but no option for payments!

Basic features don't work - Click a product picture for the gallery, the small previews at the bottom strangely have pick backgrounds (this used to be a legacy thing in old games for transparency- fix it pls). The other thing, Why offer ability to sort by low to high price and it still ends up randomly ordered! Basic and it still doesn't work, christ!

Why is this app so slow? One of the world's largest tech companies that specializes in shopping and this is the worst, most frustrating app I am currently using. Images take more than 7secs to load and then only potato quality, you have to load another image to zoom in on it wasting further time, size and colours are selectable to only be told they're out of stock, scrolling is unresponsive... the list goes on. Sort your app out Bezos!

Last 2 order deliveries were awful and/or non existent. notification says that my package was delivered to a secure location...no picture..so I know it's a lie and the package is nowhere to be found. They don't even want to talk to you about it they keep texting you that it'll be okay. I tried to call and all they do is text you that they'll call you back. Super poor service lately.

Easy app indeed. Amazon wants your money so this app makes it was too simple to click and purchase. It's better than being on the website because you can save your selections quicker, but to filter them does sometimes become an issue. Overall, I use it regularly because of its simplicity and the plethora of choices.

Mixed bag. It's surprisingly good and efficient for searches and general browsing. However once you go a layer or 2 deeper you (I) run into problems. Adding items to wishlist slows the app down almost to the point of unresponsiveness. Similarly it doesn't seem to like removing items from wishlist either - it often gives me error messages when I try to do that. But like I said, good for the basics.

App will occasionally will hang and not open when accessing a product description directly from Google search results, but will still display "Amazon Shopping" bar at top of the window. Tried to sign in on a new device and followed all the prompts to verify the account. When I finished and opened the app, it started the process all over again. I can't actually finish logging in.

A couple of months ago something changed. I loved my app but now it works VERY, VERY slow. It's incredibly frustrating. It used to have a feature where you could hold down an items thumbnail and drag it to the bottom and it would automatically add that item to your wish list and that's gone! I could use my desktop but my phone is much more practical.

Seems to be moving backwards. I have always had problems with opening pictures. Now when you scroll down even the thumbnails go missing. You constantly have to stroke the screen up and down to get them to appear... Just when you get it right they vanish again. For what one would imagine to be the world's highest grossing store front it's a bit pathetic. Even the Banggood app works better for crying out loud.

The app is really easy to navigate. However, I end up having to use the desktop site a lot as there is no option to filter by my own set price range on the app. E.g. if I'm searching for an item that I don't want to pay more than Â£5 for, I can only filter items under Â£15, so 2/3 of the items are useless.

Amazon prime memberships are a waste of money right now. Shipping takes a week. I've been ordering from any other store possible and getting faster shipping, and I don't even have to pay a membership fee for it. Walmart and lowes still have 2 day shipping while Amazon takes over a week even with a $100+ yearly membership. Its ridiculous

Can you PLEASE go back to the original layout?? This way zoomed in only seeing 1 product at a time thing and having to move my screen over left and right is wasting my time and I end up not buying anything because I can't see everything! If there's something I can do to fix it please let me know but it seems I'm not the only one experiencing this problem. It's SUPER annoying! 1 star til it gets fixed

I love using amazon as much as the next person, but the app has been struggling for a while now. I get a lot of "Uh oh, something went wrong" messages, the items aren't as nice to scroll through with added pages, and most recently I found that I can't click on reviews. I know there's a lot to manage so if they can smooth out issues, they'll be back up to 5 stars. I always get my packages at amazing speed and returns are super easy. The company revolutionized shopping in many ways.

Have not been able to access app for the last 2 days. Have restarted my devices numerous times, emailed amazon. The only way to use the app is to turn off my wifi. I have just resorted to book marking my AMAZON acct to my housemates PC. Last time I used my app was on the 26th. Since then, these cutesy little pics of dogs come up with the caption OOPS Something happened on our end. Go to amazon home. Frustrating is just a nice word to use.

Mainly I'm here to complain about the "deals dashboard". I asked for notifications about upcoming deals on PC cases, but if I look at any of the cases while they're "upcoming", they disappear instantly the moment they are supposed to be on sale. They don't even show up as missed deals, they're just gone. Any that I don't click on while they're upcoming, show up as current deals after their "upcoming" timer expires.

After update app, will not open, I haven't liked the Amazon app as far back as the 2 previous updates with the changes that were made especially with having to go from page to page to look for items and constantly resetting your filters, it was much better when you did you item search on a single page with scrolling till you reached the end of items listed "no page turning" to be honest that's why I haven't made any purchases from Amazon in almost 2 years, because the app is user unfriendly

my experience is usually very good. But I have found that a lot of the merchant pricing is becoming equal to or more expensive than what you could purchase that item for on other websites or walking into a retail location. But when I do order from Amazon you get very fast service and they back what they sell and they have made it easier for returns.

With all of the late shipments and back orders, it's hard to determine what is delivered and what is outstanding without scrolling through many orders. IT WOULD BE GREAT if we could filter by ORDER STATUS on the mobile app. Currently, we can only filter by date and limited statuses, like orders, digital orders, and cancelled, but what about back ordered, in transit, running late, or delivered?

Amazon has been a ridiculous mess. Order stuff and it takes 1.5 months just to ship. During an issue like corona it still shouldn't take 1.5 months to ship an order. I have ordered from other companies and everything shipped faster. Will not be ordering from Amazon ever again. I normally spend about $5000 or more a year. Granted it isn't a lot a year but it was good while it lasted.

I used to love this app but recently, it seems to be getting slower and slower. Also there is this strange bug where, if I press back while viewing an item, I'm sent right back to home, losing all my filters. I just look elsewhere to buy when that happens because opening the filters is so slow. I have a very good smartphone, so I don't understand why this app runs so poorly. Amazon please fix this!

I hate the new look. The app updates and the first thing you see eveytime you use the app are ads for Amazon prime video, and music, and audiobooks. I don't want to see that. I want to see recommended items to buy, or the different categories of items. Now I have to scroll all the way to the bottom of the page to see this section which used to be at the top. Please. Don't fix whay isn't broken.

The app is great. The problem I have is I mainly buy vinyl records and find Amazon are usually expensive. A fall out with an Amazon seller last year also muddied the waters. After 10 years I've returned to eBay and have been very impressed with their revamped system. More choice and much cheaper.
