As a result I have bought maybe 2 items from Amazon this year and 90+ from eBay. Buying a high end turntable soon and again eBay wins in both choice and price. As I said though the app works very well.

For years I loved the app, but not so much the past few years. I had to disable it last year because it kept opening and closing. It did this all day without any prompts from me. I received a coupon offer on Amazon's website if I used the app. I thought I'd try again. It keeps crashing. I haven't even been able to sign in. I've talked to other people who have the same problem. The phones range from brand new to old. That told me it's not the phones. Your video and music apps work fine still.

*Update* The app itself is awesome! I've used it for many years now and it just gets better! With COVID it's been a challenge and they've kept moving forward. I'm impressed! With that said.... Verbal communication for customer service should always be an option!!!! I have used the CHAT feature a few times prior to the COVID chaos and it worked well for minor issues but, for more complicated problems you should be able to at least get a call back option. Just good business -- even in the chaos.

So absurdly slow that it makes shopping a pain. I use plenty of other apps, including shopping apps, that all run very fast on my phone. Not Amazon. Trying to pick between colors/options on a product takes several minutes as the pop-up menu loads at a glacial pace. But everything in this app takes an exceptionally long time compared with pretty much every app I use.

Easy to use and simple. Amazon is as expected on here. The wishlists could use some improvement from my experience but I will spend the time fixing mine up so they are how I prefer. I turn off notifications so I don't know about them but it functions well and I haven't had any issues other than the wishlists being a bit difficult compared to how I would like them

This app used to be amazing. Now, it's difficult to view search results. When the results appear, the images are so large and bulky you have to scroll right and down just to view one picture. No other app on my phone does this. It has made it impossible to shop. For the record, I have an android phone.

Due to a couple recent issues that I've been having with my Amazon app, I decided to uninstall it and reinstall the app again to give it a fresh start. But now every time I go to my play store to reinstall the app the status continuously shows that it's waiting for download and never goes any further with the install. Is there a reason or fix for this new issue I'm having??

Every now and then I get a notification telling me that the Amazon app now supports Smile. If I click on it, I get taken to the app, where it gets stuck on a blank page until I get bored and give up. I've tried looking for a setting, but there isn't one. I've tried following instructions on an Amazon support site, but this refers to a non-existent setting. If I was a cynic, I'd think that Amazon would prefer not to donate to the charity of my choice. I checkout out via a web browser!

It works well when you wants to get something when you aren't on the website or pc. But it suffers from bugs and glitches as it usually does. It duplicates the same product you view when you try to add it to your cart or when you take an external link to go to amazon the link doesn't work or it gives the dog pic and says sorry. Recently the most annoying thing is unable to report pricing gouging on the app.

Sometimes it likes to act weird and slow then crashes or restarts itself when I'm looking for things. Searching for items can be a hassle. It will tell me how much is in the search but I don't always get to see that amount. I also see some items over and over again(from the same seller) like it's repeating itself. Leaving a review gets annoying since it won't let me add pictures from my phone's gallery.

Amazon is the ultimate best for shopping!!!!...THEY HAVE EVERYTHING IT SEEMS!!!...& Their prices can't be beat!!! ... I've never really had any issues purchasing & receiving the merchandise that was ordered except a couple of items took a lot longer to ship/receive...it's definitely handy, especially/ during this Coronavirus going on...THANKS AMAZON!!!!...

My app has stopped showing full result for searched items, instead giving me one page with maybe ten or twelve items and that's it. Tried to use customer service chat to report this issue and was passed off to six different people - mid-conversation - none of which seemed to understand that my issue was with the SEARCH RESULTS, not an individual item. I do not believe they will address this issue, so maybe this will help get it fixed. Also seriously bad customer service.

It used to be so easy to download Kindle Unlimited books, but now it's a mess. When you click for the book the screen stays static. Previously it would either take you to a "thank you" screen or to your library if you were at your limit so that you could return one if you needed to. Now, you first have to go into your library to delete one, & then go back & check out the book & even then, the screen stays static. The only way to see if the book downloaded is to check my Kindle. It's awful!

Just completed a buy where it said if i use my Australian debit card to pay, I'll get 10% off the price in cart automatically but nothing happened and it deducted the whole amount from my card. False information and cheating. I've even got screenshots of all to prove. Just waiting for Amazon to look into this matter themselves before i make a complaint.

Awful now that filtering has been crippled. Deleted it and will go back to web version where I can specify the price ranges I want (eg under $10) and filter down several levels within catagories. Clothing-Women is not enough. It is bad enough that even when sorting by relevance the search engine ignores the critical keywords, and also floods the search with the same sponsored items, but crippling the ability to filter results makes it take way to long to find what I need on Amazon .

I dont know when this update happened but basically anytime i search anything the results are in two columns but way too zoomed in to see them both and i cant zoom out. I dont have screen magnifier on or anything like that. Havent bought anything in so long because it makes browsing on the app super annoying. Unless theres a fix im going to cancel prime and use other services.

It is a good app and I would give it a full 5 stars EXCEPT the back button is clunky where it stalls. The app has so many features that it is so easy to use and informative to keep track of past orders and coming purchases. It's just the back button which is a basic function. Just fix that and it is the perfect shopping app.

The latest app update is horrible. When I search an item, the way the results are listed they are hugely magnified and it is very hard to browse because you have to scroll back and forth to see each one. I tried everything possible and wasted way too much time trying to fix the setting. Just give up and shop the smaller online websites. They need the business.

Caution - bait and switch shipping info! Pretty much all orders, you will find an item you want and Amazon will say "get it today by 6pm". Great, you think, but the app will default you to shipping out tomorrow when the order actually goes through. You must be vigilant. You must check and change the delivery options EACH time if you want to get that original delivery offering. So yeah, they can listen to your every word and give you customized ads, but can't get you the product on time.

App has quit working. I uninstalled, re started my phone the re installed the app and it still freezes up when trying to browse departments. This started about two weeks ago. I downloaded whatever version that is on the android app store so it's the latest version available. I can still order and look but has to be done by searching from the search bar not the browse departments section

Constant crashing - "oops, something went wrong" over and over, continuously. Unusable garbage, like much of the trash amazon and google play sells. Zero stars if possible. Update 8/20/20 - they've found a way to make it worse. Pictures do not load in search results and everything is at a snail's pace. Still unusable rubbish and still no one cares. Bezos is terrible also. Update 10/13/20: still garbage. No photos and very slow with crashes.

Amazon app can search product you want, and take orders is all is needed. However, when shopping around interested looking for products on your phone is very frustrating. The app is slow, the filter search is broken, and when trying to find desktop mode or go on website through web browser is difficult as app launches when you boot up its webpage.

The app is really on my nerves as of late! It's been extremely slow and I can't tell you how many times I have to hit "proceed to checkout" in order to checkout! Most of the time I can't even get to the checkout page until I either remove and readd the item I'm trying to purchase from my cart or close out completely and try again! It's very frustrating and time consuming!! The camera and barcode feature also rarely ever pull up what you are looking for. Come on Amazon, you can do better!!

Don't even bother ordering anything through Amazon for a while. I have placed an order well over 2 months ago and still have not received my product. Getting in contact with customer support is absolutely impossible. Then when you do get a hold of someone, they're pretty rude and only offer a refund. When I tell them I don't want a refund, I want my product, they usually just end the chat or stop replying. So you can count on me ordering through FedEx for quite a while.

I use this app all the time, but recently it's started causing my whole phone to freeze up for up to 30 seconds before a popup says the app isn't responding and prompting me to close it. This app is no good to me if it keeps completely locking up my phone. Edit 20May2020: I just noticed that despite still having all of my smile settings in place, it had disabled smile for my account on my phone. I just reenabled it, but warned me it would disable itself after two months. Absolute nonsense.

For the worlds most used online buying service it sure does have a glitchy, slow, buggy app. Back button doesnt work when viewing product images to exit out of image full screen to product page. I press it multiple times to get the back button to exit the images and it takes me all the way back to the first search I did. Time consuming and annoying. Pages and searches load slow. No other app on my phone does this. Interface for scrolling and choosing things is clunky. App needs a revamp bad..

I can and have been ordering products from Amazon for years. It is a convenient way to shop. I never have to leave the comfort of my home to head into a crowded store. Everything ships directly to my front door. I joined prime membership. Shipping is usually free on most items. Prices are very competitive. Also they offer a wide range of products to select from. In my opinion, it is much better than Wal- Mart.

Not as good as it used to be Images jump about, mostly back to the home page. Uninstalling and reinstalling didn't improve matters. Still can't use the app to browse or check on orders or delivery estimates. Still trying and failing to get help from Amazon. At a loss as to what to do. The last time I tried I spoke to a person that didn't understand English, so that didn't work.

Amazon has intentionally designed it's interface to be confusing to consumers, it is very easy to accidentally sign up to Amazon prime, you receive no notification of having done so, and it is difficult to leave again (having to press many buttons to leave). It is also difficult to browse items as there is poor visibility of postage lead times and costs up front. I will be deleting this app and shopping independently from now on.

I love the app. But right now with this update its making everything super zoomed in and I can't zoom out. Almost like its giving me the desktop version. I can't actually shop for anything because I have to scroll over a bunch just to see the full picture of the item. If this gets fixed or I figure out how to fix it the app would be 5 stars for sure.

Filter button has to be pressed 10 times to open!!!!! Every filter you selec closes the filler menu, so you have to press the dang button another 10 times to open it!!!!!!!!!!! Tweaking your search clears all your filters so you have to start again from scratch on your filters if you fix a spelling mistake!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! But seriously, finding a needle in a haystack is both easier and less painful than this.

I've been a prime member for a long time and have used the Amazon shopping app for a while. However lately the "Todays Deals" has been very glitchy. First i can only access the deals page after cleaning out my cache.. Secondly the pictures of the products flicker and then stay blank. Only scrolling up and down it will sorta troubleshoot it and then i can see what each thing is but only for a second. I have to click into each deal to view a picture of the item...

I have been trying to cancel my Amazon account for five days now. They have a new policy that is really hard to find where they decide what is "low" or "high" priority items. They no longer just charge your account and put your order in... Oh no... They will charge and cancel your account at random until they get around to actually shipping your item at which time they will charge your account for it one last time. Unable to get customer service on phone after a week of trying. Never use again

Doesn't work anymore. This update made your app useless. Keeps crashing. Fails to load. Yes, I've tried to delete and reinstall but the app came preloaded on my cell and all I can do is disable, but then it still won't work. Tried turning off my phone also, still won't work. Nice work.

Convenient, but has limitations. The search filters are often poorly designed for web use already, but much more difficult to use in the app. Most annoying thing about the app is that notifications that I actually want to receive only show the first few words and upon clicking it, the app takes me to the home page instead of to the full notification, so I don't actually find out what the notification was for unless I go out of my way to find the notifications within my account through the app.

App barely functions lately. It usually won't let me view my orders, and when it does, I can't see any detail. Also, when looking at a product photo, have to push the back button several times to exit, and it takes me all the way back to the lost of search results rather than just closing the pictures. It's really irritating.

Both the Amazon app and the Amazon music app are not letting me buy new mp3 music. on the Amazon app if I pull up an album and click the drop-down to change format from CD to mp3, as soon as I click the drop-down the screen refreshes and the options to select format are off the edge of the viewable screen so I can't click anything. On the Amazon music app, every time I click an album and click shop for this album, I just get a generic message that says an error has occurred. Tried rebooting, upd

I love Amazon shopping. There's only been one hiccup that I'm hoping will be rectified and remedied as soon as possible; and it's a good bad thing. The good thing is that in case of any potential fraudulent activities or any identity theft, Amazon is really good about keeping you protected. The flipside, is that can be an extensive process when trying to gain reentry to original Amazon, if at all possible, without having to recreate a new profile, if Amazon allows you to. Otherwise awesome!!!!

Broken, horribly designed and the music downloading process is an experience I wouldn't wish on my worst enemy. So where do I start, well, aside from the fact that using this app inexplicably makes my phone hotter than the surface of the sun, I do not understand why every item thumbnail is broken and distorted. Every. Damn. Time. Lastly, if you're trying to entice users into using the services, even to casually download music, then for the love of God don't send them a broken link to do so.

I really hate that if you post any type of negative review on the app it wont be posted and you'll receive an email that it cannot be posted for a variety of possibilities. I tried to leave an honest review for an unpleasant seller that took over a month to ship my items and some of said items were missing. Amazon is handy for quick ordering, but seems like it's not designed so much for the consumer, but for the sellers on the site.

Don't trust expedited shipping. I paid for expedited shipping of 8 am Thursday. The Amazon automated system and customer service provided many estimates for actual delivery; the latest was Saturday. Thursday evening customer service refused to send an expedited replacement. Had to argue with them to get my money back. Very disappointed; I chose that item specifically because it had expedited shipping. Don't make promises that you can't keep.

The drop down menus in the search area don't work at all. When I search for something the results come up on a blown up page that is annoying as heck to look through the items because you have to scroll side to side and up and down. Everything was fine until the last update. Google has been more helpful than Amazon.

The app is generally fine, but PLEASE FIX NOTIFICATIONS SO THEY MAKE SOUND. Notifications for this app always appear in my "Silent" notifications area. I have spent a great deal of time trying to fix this if it has something to do with my device, but after my own experience and the experience of others who have posted about it online, I've come to conclusion that this is the fault of the app developers, either by choice or by error. PLEASE FIX THIS.

Used to be so good.... now it looks like a website that isn't designed for mobile devices. It's hard to browse through items when you can't see half of the screen. Edit: I gave it a lower score before because the app had recently become so uncomfortable to use for browsing items after app updates. But it was probably my fault. I had delayed phone updates for awhile. I finally did it recently and it seems like the amazon app became more usable again. Whoops.

Crashes every 15 minutes if you do more than browse so don't click on a product, zoom into an image, or read reviews! You have to click "see all images" to go through customer images; if you click on an individual image you have to click "back" to go to the main product page, click on the next image, go back to the main review page again, click on the next image, etc. IPhone version of the app has none of these issues. Search history also shows up in random order and some are missing. So weird

The Amazon mobile app is extremely slow and often freezes or crashes, especially when organizing and adding items to shopping lists (while searching/browsing items seem to work OK), making an online-shopping experience extremely painful. Also, please stop the auto pop-up of the Whole Foods in-store QR code each and everything I go back to Whole Foods home section. This is so unnecessary, obnoxious/annoying, especially since there's a link to it right there for when it's actually needed. This app is terrible in terms of layout/organization design as well. (This review is for the app only, not about the operations (fulfillment & delivery, which is great.)

EDIT: 17 November 2020, It's now been almost three months and my app still crashes. 22 October 2020, It's been about three weeks that the app keeps crashing every time I open it. I've had to shop from the website instead. I don't know what's going on lately. I've sent reports since it started happening and thought it would be solved with this new update but no, it's still crashing. It used to be so good.

The app was great until a couple months ago, now when i search for items the list (and only the list) is zoomed in, the menu and everything is normal, just the list, If i can be bothered to get to the bottom and want to go to the next page i have to scroll to the right as the button is no longer on the same screen. I know this isn't a big deal but i do everything on my phone and I may just sto using amazon altogether.

I dont know what happened but the past couple of updates the app has begun acting weird on my phone (galaxy note 10+) I have to Uninstall and re install and every time it has a different problem. For example the search comes in zoomed way in and wont side scroll. Re install the app and my prime switch and filter option are missing. Amazon needs to get their act together.

Slow. Slow.Slow. What started as an option to save time, has quadrupled the amount time I spend getting staples. And it is not only Amazon, the fastest of all. Imagine trying on -or at least looking at color and pattern for - anything you might like to purchase. Now add between 15 seconds to over a minute per item you want to look at. Since Covid, most products are way over normal price, and they do not show what you ask for up front, wasting more of your time. Please stop these tactics!

The app itself is good. You can follow all your orders , shipping and past orders. If it's Prime, It'll be Fast ! Usps is really dropping the ball lately. If you're going to cancel an order, try to get it Done BEFORE it's charged or like anywhere else, you'll have to wait for the funds to be released. If you have Prime , and don't need an item rushed to you, you can get it later and recieve a type of Amazon credit , build it up until you have enough to make a purchase. Nice little option.

The ability to view and purchase new and used items on my lists are non existent, causing me to miss out on any lucrative deals. And this has been going on for at least 2-3 weeks This app or amazon itself still doesn't allow me to select and view dvds/blurays on my wishlist or through just searching Amazon itself. What the hell is wrong? It's now going on over a month with this issue and it's only happening with DVDs and Blurays.

Changing shipping method is frustrating every time. It just spins forever, sometimes finishes sometimes doesn't. Update: so I had a suspicion that Amazon intentionally throttled the app for non prime members. To test, I got Prime for a month and magically all these performance issues disappeared. Nothing else changed yet the app works fine.

Searching and sorting it's terrible compared to the desktop version. Amazon seems hell bent on ONLY showing you want THEY want you to buy in the app's search results. It's tiresome and makes using the app fairly pointless. Update: App still not good. Just use the website and add a shortcut to your home screen.

Really disappointed by the new update. Items are harder to find, and the daily deals seem to have disappeared. Constant Amazon affiliate (Kindle, Audible, Prime, etc.) Ads on the front page instead of actual suggested items I wish to purchase. Really irritating and has definitely cut down on my browsing and buying.

ðŸ˜Ž An Amazing Delivery Company and An Amazing Delivery Application(App)ðŸ˜Ž I never have a problem. Maybe just the app being laggy and i have long loading screens. All of my other apps on my phone are quick. So its not my phone. Not too big of a deal. I Love the tracking system and delivery updates. Sometimes they can get your delivery to you faster without Amazon Prime. I have Amazon Prime now and they overnight my purchases. Thats even more insane. I'll buy something at 8pm and I get it by 8am.

This is an amazing app that makes shopping more easier than expected online especially with books being transferred directly to your Kindle depending on how you order. The app itself has a white-coloured background and has all the features required for a shopping app to have and doesn't require password when entering Credit Card information as long as other information is correct; I would recommend this app for your next usage.

I regularly use amazon, have prime and generally have a good experience but WHY OH WHY have you now got search results in 2 columns with huge item images!! Now I can't conveniently scroll down through a list of results I have scroll to the side to see what I'm missing and because of the huge images I'm sure it displays less results per page! Bring back the convenient list with thumbnails!

I like amazon and the app is ok but I needed to cancel my membership and it was confusing for me. They give 2options set reminder or cancel membership. I payed for month so I didn't want to cancel just yet so i set reminder did this multiple times it never reminded and i forgot. So I finally just said screw I'm canceling in the middle of the month I'm tired of wasting money. To find out I could schedule to cancel the day of renewal.why is that not an main option on the management page.

This app is extremely intrusive, the only thing you can do to stop it is disable it. Force close doesn't work because it will simply restart itself. I've also noticed it will continuously attempt to open connections to the web while it's running even when you're not using it. It's likely listening to you for advertising purposes, etc. I truly enjoy buying stuff on Amazon but the app itself is a testament to the lengths rich men will go to satisfy their greed. Disgusting.

The new version is a terrible shopping tool, and considering that's what's this app is meant to be very disappointed. have had to uninstall and am currently purchasing through Google shopping. .Please remove at least some Amazon extras ads so we can actually see the items we wish to buy .and put back the buying options so we can choose used or new and which supplier .plus work on your recommendations I used to enjoy scrolling through and picking something that I wasn't looking for.

Since the last update it crashes constantly. The option to buy from other sellers is all but completely unselectable, and even if you are able to find the sweet spot where the link responds to touch the app just freezes. It works functionally for most things so I give it 2 stars, but the constant crashing made it hard to give that even.

Awful. The app is so glitchy and difficult to navigate, that I typically end up throwing my phone aside frustrated and pulling out my laptop. It isn't worth spending triple the time to find something that it does using the browser. Only reason I keep the app is so I can check the progress on my orders. That part works fine thankfully.

Lately the app won't let me make any purchases unless I re-enter my full credit card number each time I want to buy something. It makes it ridiculously inconvenient to make a purchase. I don't carry my credit cards everywhere like my phone. The phone is encrypted, and uses biometric authentication. I don't understand what reason to require me to enter the credit card number every time.

Lately I've had a lot of problems with the Amazon app on my phone. When I try to back out of an enlarged pictures of a product, it won't go back until I've hit back button a few times, which then takes me back several screens - but it is the only way to get out of the photo. I also will put in specific search information for an item that I know is available with that information, but will get anything but that item back in my results. This is all very annoying, ESPECIALLY this newest problem

The update sucks! After updating and switching to Amazon smile on phone now I can't find the daily deals, very frustrating. I get maybe you are focusing on the covid-19 pandemic but don't bury the deals so far down nobody can find them. Just suspend daily deals in general if you are going to focus on essential items. But also remember we are all paying $120 a year for prime and still have certain expectations.

World's slowest UI, it seems like every tap requires you to wait at least a couple of seconds for it to register, grab the required data from the servers, and then display that data. Doesn't matter that the phone itself has like 12GB of RAM and is connected to a stable and fast internet connection, the app is just slow.

This app is consistently one of the best; fast, responsive, and with a layout that makes online shopping easy... BUT, good luck trying to remove items from the wish list; everytime I try, it either takes forever, or freezes up the app until it crashes. This may be a small thing, but irritating...

Give me the old app. This one REALLY sucks! I don't want to see music and primd video if I'm shopping. Furthermore, search results come back low resolution. You can't see a reasonable picture until you select one. Don't waste your time or your memory. Use the web. Go back to the drawing board Amazon!!

The latest update is GARBAGE. Once an item is clicked on, you have to click the back button repeatedly for the app to respond. This however will either back you out of the app entirely, or take you to the first page of your search results, or every once in a while it goes back to the homepage. This is beyond frustrating and makes it very difficult to shop. Maybe that's what Amazon wants? In any case, this needs to be fixed.

Hi all! I am updating my review and hoping to report a new suggestion for the Amazon app. I like the new set up of filters on the top bar when shopping because I use certain filters on everything I search to find the best quality items from trusted sellers. However, the "category" filter option is too far over. It should be one of the first shown in the row. In order to filter for only items shipped and sold by Amazon, I must first select the Category. Please move the Category filter over. Thx!â˜º

My experience is based more on Amazon services. I'm a first time user of this app and service and my experience has been the worst. I sent an expensive order through just to be told that I didn't pay enough and certain items wasn't available. How do you steal people money then say....oh, you need to add more. I don't play when it comes to my hard earned money and they could at least have the decency to return the funds for items you don't receive. This is extremely poor customer service.

Wish I hadn't updated the app! Been using it without issues for 2 years and suddenly started becoming sluggish and slow. So I updated. BIG mistake! As now the app randomly quits on me whilst searching or even paying for something! So I'm not at all confident in using the app and gonna stick to the website on my laptop. Pls fix this!! Otherwise I would've given it 5 stars.

This is a Google play store issue I'm assuming...but I can't install this app for some reason! I click install over and over and nothing happens. I have a Pixel 2XL running Android 10 with Feb 2020 patch, fully stock. I've rebooted, cleared cache, etc. This is the only app I've found that won't let me install. Guess I gotta download the apk manually. Nice job Google.

The App itself isn't too bad ...but customer service needs alot of work ! Amazon customer service will not work with you ... terrible experience with membership renewal ! Longtime customer but after this last experience I will be cancelling my membership !!! A complete rip off with Prime ! Better off shopping with Walmart & other businesses direct & it's free most of the time !!

Literally never let's me add anything to my wish list. The button is there, but pressing on it does nothing. Have to use my laptop now. Only use this app when purchasing on the go, not while organizing things I want/intend to buy. It's been super annoying, especially when I see something I really like, and have no way to save it. Ridiculous.

Overall, wonderful services. The app however, has some issues as of late, hence my 4 star rating. I am more than happy and willing to give 5 stars when and if the app's technical issues are resolved and have ceased to cause such stress, confusion, and just utter frustration to be completely honest about it. I am however, still very much a loyal Amazon prime member and have no intention of changing my loyalty to the company, their products, and last but certainly not least, any and all benefits!

It's a good app over all, with good customer service options for the most part (though chat was way better before Covid, when they used to actually have you chat a person as an option instead of it always being a robot). I don't really have issues with the app except that I wish it had a dark mode. At this point it just feels silly not to, with almost every other big name app option having a dark theme choice. I really think Amazon should get on that.

Ordered from us and uk but have to change country to view my orders. Insanely irritating. Why not just put them all in my "my orders" like ebay and other services???? This is really worthless. Why wouldnt i be able to see ALL products and compare shipping, instead of choosing region. I just payed twice the cost in shipping because uk didnt show up, as it does on ebay. Terrible, really terrible.

Buggy, with annoying notifications about "recommendations" for what they call "deals" you cannot remove from the notifications list, no matter how offensive they are. One has to wait several weeks for the notifications to age off the list, which is problematic. The Amazon Web app has a much better recommendation algorithm, that is customizable, therefore I am uninstalling this App from my Galaxy Note 9

This app sucks. One image takes up my entire Samsung S10+ screen. Searching for items when the page is blown up 4+ times bigger than it should be is a joke. Plus the pictures are 2 deep so you have to scroll side ways as well as up and down or go down the middle and not be able to see any of the images fully. I've quit using the app except when absolutely necessary because it's such a pain. I used to love browsing Amazon and now I only use it if I must.

This app won't let me past the sign in, I sign in then it asks me to verify and sends me an email, I approve it through the email which takes me to the approval screen and it says everything is good and I can close the screen but every time I open the app it does the same thing and I can never use the app. It's just way easier to add the page to my home screen from google

Wish there was a way to control app settings like things setting the prime delivery options, or price low to high, when searching for something to change size of image. Or how many items show up on a page. Other than that app is amazing and I love convenience of staying home to shop..packages come right to you and on time :)

HUGE DISSAPPOINTMENT! Apparently you can buy something in just a few minutes, very quickly and conveniently. However the minute after you bought something, if you made a mistake then it's up to you to contact the carrier and solve it yourself, no payment processed, no items shipped yet but they won't help you. IT'S A SCAM and customer service is really rude, they take minutes to come up with the same solution, it's just pathetic. I personally recommend another from of shopping.

If it loads at all, I cant click on things and have them work. I had to click probably 12 times before the damn "add to cart" would do anything. I hope this update does something because Walmart's homepage works a hell of a lot better. Not to mention I haven't noticed the "share" button lately either, which is very inconvenient.

Used to love it...but now it takes minutes to load and another minute to load the photos to scroll. Also when i hit next it opens up a thing to buy it. I used to order several things a week from the amazon app. I havent shopped in over a month because i waist ten minutes searching for one thing. Load the page. Open it...loooooaaaad...cant scroll the photos half the time and another min to load the reviews. Super annoying

I have loved Amazon for years but the Latest update for Android phone has made the search function absolutely useless. You get one screen of results but no next button. Filter options at top of screen don't scroll and drop downs for the ones that do show are worthless. My tablet is still 2 versions back and I'm NOT updating it. Amazon isn't usable without a search function.

I've been using this app for years but for the past couple months, when I go to click on the pictures of the item I am viewing to have a more upclose, clear picture, it doesn't load. its just stuck on the spinning wheel(loading) the whole time. doesn't matter how long i sit there and wait, it just continues to load the picture and I end up not buying whatever it was because I want to see an upclose shot to decide if I like its details or not.

Worst app I have ever used! This thing freezes all the time, especially when I am adding something to my cart. I have to wait forever to get back to the previous screen. Also, trying to delete anything from my cart or from my lists is ridiculous! How ancient is this app? Get with the program Amazon! Amazon site also slow on my laptop. Smh If you're not going to fix this slow app then at least make it so I can delete multiple items from my lists instead of 1 at a slow time. How antiquated!

Poorest customer experience I have ever experienced. Delivered to wrong address and I had to find the address that it was delivered to, and that was based off of a picture of the "delivered" goods. Customer service wouldn't offer any sort of compensation for the inconvenience of searching for my package. And thank the stars that the person which whom it was delivered, was nice and gave it back. Horrible, horrible service. My prime account has been canceled. Bad service altogether.

Thank you!! Everything has been put back in order and I'm back to happy shopping!! I want the original deal of the day and lightening deals back when i open my app. I don't have alexa, kindle, or their tv etc. I'm pretty pssed i can't get what i had, easy shopping! Put it back or at least let ppl choose start their home page is, i pay for prime, but seems what i use it for has been taken away at my expense.

The app has issues on Galaxy S10/Android. I haven't been able to select between shipping options. I have to open the internet browser to do so and complete the purchase... Amazon doesn't not provide a way to report bugs in its app. I don't have any special display setting enabled that could mess up with the app.

I'm giving 3 stars - on one hand, it's convenient on a phone/tablet you usually carry with you, checking on orders not too bad... on the other hand it's so frustratingly slow I usually just use the pc. App is very slow. Example... search for item, too many unrelated items/no reviews/sketchy junk. Need more than 1 filter is ridiculous, only one at a time before it needs to reload everything, waiting again.

Did give 5 star however I'm having problems since update. Everything is zoomed in a lot. Then when I try to view an item it just flickers on and off. Completely unusable when clicking on an item. Can't order anything since subscribed to prime. What...I pay to receive a worse experience?? If this is not fixed I will unsubscribe and uninstall.

Big Enterprise Small Development I've been a prime customer and I am not satisfied with the service that amazon provides. Firstly, their customer support is untraceable via the app. The app has a poor design and looks primitive. The returns/refunds & track shipment section is useless as it keeps you in loop no matter what option you select. There is no live tracking for your ordered goods.

This app worked without issues for year, all the sudden I can't search or view products. Every time I try to view search results or a product I get an error page with message "Uh oh, something went wrong on our end." I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app multiple times. This is causing me to shop elsewhere.

Excellant!!!!;no more eBay.. AMAZON for life!!! Recently changed phones, with a lot more storage, so decided to download the app rather than using through browser. Can't even get passed the sign in stage. This has been going on for months and months and months. The app just isn't right. All of the newer versions error every time i try to look something up. 2 orders lost, after waiting over a month and they compensate me with $9 for the inconvenience! Absolutely ridiculous. Amazon has really went downhill if you ask me. Abslotely disappointing, especially when you're depending on them! I will not be using them after this! And Customer Service lies to you also. That's wonderful! Extremely upsetting!

Absolutely the best there is! Faster shipping than USPS, which says a TON. You can follow the location of the delivery truck when you're expecting something important, which is a HUGE plus?! Between Amazon, Ring, Eufy, or other smart doorbell cameras, the idea of stealing off the front porch will soon be considered a bad idea of the past! Amazon has the best selection, and it has become my number-one stop for anything new or specific. Even in local stores, I use Amazon to compare prices! Yay!

If this app didn't use so much data in the background and grow way out of it's original download size then I would have liked to keep it. Why it stays constantly up and active when the phone is not even doing anything and barely sends you notifications - I'm wondering why it's always active using my unlimited, yes but all the way unlimited - data! And why can't I sleep it, when it turns itself right on and eats my internalSD cards space. Love Amazons products and services, just not that much!

not sure what is going on with amazon lately. I have been a member for a long time. In return, I placed my review/experience using the product to help others as well in deciding. But it seems the app has a glitch and kept deleting or not posting reviews, it keeps freezing too.

I am a prime member and every now and then it seems the two day shipping is not two days. I called them up, irate about a package being a week late, and was issued a refund. As irritating as it was, I very much appreciate the correction. Highly recommended to upgrade to prime if you shop more than once a month. Errors occur, like with everything else, but they try to make up for it. What more could you ask for from a business.

3/15/20: Although Amazon makes life easier and for the most part so does this app the recent changes to the filter menu are horrendous. I just rolled the app back to version 18.8.0.100 because it was the newest version of the app that had the old and better filter menu. I have turned off automatic updates for this app so that I don't get that crappy menu back. 06/28/20 Update: Amazon in there infinite wisdom (morons) decided to remove the filter functionality with older apps

Stopped using the app. Like many others have ordered multiple items no problems. Until now. Completed orders given a delivey date and next day. It's still in basket and not completed at all. In between that bombarded with nag screens for prime. Yeah and look what people think of that! Adverts and intrusive and interfere with the app. I'm done. Uninstalled.

Update! The issue with the crashing has been resolved with newer updates. It works great, just like it used to prior to the issues. I want the old format back! Yo know, the one with the drop down filter menu where you could apply MULTIPLE FILTERS ALL AT ONCE instead of having to REPEATEDLY click the drop down and add your filters ONE AT A TIME. Too many fake reviews, but would greatly appreciate a dark mode. Besides, dark mode would make users want to stay on the app longer, making them more likely to make a purchase. Win win for all.

Where the hell are suggested and related products. I liked amazon well enough but suddenly they get rid of all of the suggested products, related products, and the "what other people bought". Look until those are back, I wont really like this all that much. It's like taking away the option to browse.

Literally the worst app on my phone. It freezes if you click a picture. It freezes if you click a quantity. It freezes pretty much doing anything except scrolling. I've started shopping more on my Walmart app since it actually works better (which isn't saying much). Get your stuff together Amazon. All of your apps are a joke!

Just like many other reviewers said its annoying to search for items. The pictures are far too big like a desktop version. Horrible experience on mobile. Always disappointed me. Poor Description of products. **BEWARE** Make up products are always expired specially from the seller **"CosmeticRus"**. I totally dislike *cosmeticRus* they send expired/broken items and on returns they still deduct delivery charges. Prices too high when compared with other apps. Delivery charges on each product. However delivery is quick and returns are picked up immediately from your adress. But still not sure about the refunds.

New update makes placing filters extremely frustrating.. first, there is a solid 5-8 second delay from when you tap the filter drop down and when it actually appears.. second, it closes when you pick a single filter so you're stuck repeating the whole process for multiple filters.. it's bad enough that I've stopped using it on mobile completely, uninstalling and just shopping on computer from now on.

The "see more" button frequently does not work. I have been having an issue where I just can't tap on listings either. EDIT: had to cut everything else out due to charctr limit, but for some reason I can't select any sizes on anything I've previously bought. Called about it, was asked to try it on the comp and I'd get a $10 gift card and a call back in 30min. It's 9pm and I have recieved neither. Well, looks like if no one will fix my account prime is useless to me. Will be cancelling my sub

Amazon offers a great service. That is until you have to deal with their awful carrier service, which is usually a 50/50 on whether you'll get the package. From my most recent experience the carrier blatantly lied about making the delivery on two separate occasions and as of writing this review my package is lost with a replacement arriving next week, over 10 days from when I was meant to receive the package (And yes, I have prime). So, if an item is being delivered by amzl, dont bother.

Theres no filter for relevance. Im tired of all the featured products. It doesn't matter how specific I am in my search bar, I'll still have to search through multiples of the same things im not looking for. Im looking for colored contacts and all that come up are cases, vampire teeth (for some odd reason) and cleaning solutions. Looked for a blue Santa dress. Only red and green came up. The filters don't help any either.

I've used this app for many years without issue (especially happy to be an early smile adopter) however a recent update has degraded in performance significant, and the my orders page constantly starts at the top when I got back after viewing an order. I have many orders so when I'm trying to track status of a particular one I have to scroll down quite a bit over and over. It makes it difficult to use the app and I often wait until I'm at a computer and then don't end up ordering.

Absolutely love the app and it's very easy to use from your phone! Use it weekly to buy tools and I love it as a contractor that they arrive to my front doorstep! And I can always find stuff cheaper than home Depot! I'd give it a 2 is because Amazon lies in their second day delivery! That was one of my favorite things as a contractor to know that my material or tools would be there the next day!!!

I've been using Amazon for a very long time now but standards have dropped considerably recently. Next day delivery is no long a promise like it use to be. Some items also taking upto three weeks to get to you from UK based companies. Ive spent a great deal of my hard earned cash with Amazon. Compliancy is setting in. Up the standard or you will lose customers very quickly.

The update screwed everything up....now I cannot get the screen to go back to normal size no matter what I do...it's annoying, I have to pan in prder to see an object, little pieces at a time, but not the entire image. I have to pan to read HUMONGOUS letters....i tried uninstalling and reinstalling.. to no avail. It is NOT my phone settings, ONLY THIS APP. I don't even want to.shop Amazon if this is how it's going to be to use the app.

Highly unreliable service with overpriced products. They always have an issue. ALWAYS. In the end, after weeks of constant follow up, they inform me the product is no longer available and they will refund me. This is after inconveniencing the customer constantly. The incompetence is unreal. They once informed me that there was a huge delay in my delivery because of international shipping. I'm in UAE and I had ordered some Al-Ain water. Wonder where they were shipping it from. They are senseless.

Can you please update this app to a 2020 standard? Feels like it's been stuck in 2012 and a mere webview is being used to display Amazon's website. You guys are also super rich, can't you just do that like every other service? Follow the Material Design guidelines, please. The performance of this app is also not optimal: I've been using it on a Google Pixel (1st gen, quite old), and some parts of the UI are just laggy. You have to remember it's just a simple shopping app â€” it MUST NOT do this.

I have been a loyal Amazon Prime member for years. I rely on Amazon because I have lived in multiple places where retail options are scarce. Today I was severely disappointed in this company. They lost my package with 3 items that I need for teaching. They didn't offer the refund/ replacement option for all of my items until I called someone. Why would it not be an automated option to refund/ return EVERY item that your company is responsible for losng? But then upon speaking with two different individuals, they said the only option available to me, if I still wanted my teaching supplies, was a refund and to then use that refund to reorder my items. On items that were "Prime" items, to wait four days for them to actually deem them lost, to then waste a day of speaking with people who ultimately couldn't help me, to then be offered the charity to be able to reorder my own items... I am done. I will go to the trouble that it takes to order from other individual companies from now on to NEVER have to go through that again. This wealthy company will not take a hit when it means doing what is right by its customers when it makes a mistake. That is poor customer service. This is a fine company until something goes wrong, then they show their true colors. Very disappointing.

Disappointed with Amazon. It used to be so good, now I can't even change my delivery option. Doesn't sound like a big thing, but it is so frustrating when you can do anything else but choose the delivery option (happened both on the phone and laptop). Not sure if it's just a bug that happens recently, but I'm hoping for it to get fix soon because I still want to shop in Amazon.

I go on AMAZON every day and now I am hating the update! I can not find the Deals of the Day and there is a weird glitch when I click on name on the search list. If I type in a name for an item and I see it towards the end of the list, it exits me out. I can only click the top two names. Update is terrible! Its hiding my save for later list as well.

The shopping is great but whenever I need to cancel a subscription I've had through the fire stick, it's never there and I end up having to message Amazon to make sure it's cancelled. I'm sick of apps making it so difficult to cancel after a free trial, just hoping you'll forget and they can at least get another month's money from you

I buy almost everything on Amazon I rarely go to stores that anymore... One of the things I pretty much do every day is open the app go to the deals of the day and browse through those, Often buying things from that list. And now is the most recent update they remove this from the app there are no more deals of the day or they're not easily accessible through the app.

Great app, prime as well but I don't see why they can't implement set shipping or arrival dates. For example if you create a registry they should have the option of a send date, the month of or before arrival. They have 2 day shipping but not 3months out, I'd think it would be easier? This is just my displeasure with the company. After speaking with representatives they had no valid point as to why they couldn't do so. They did however let me know notify me of "subscription diaper". Ha Ok

Was working well for a long time then after a few recent updates, things became glitchy. I'm tired of searching hundreds of pages for a specific item for it to get frozen and not go back. Even after pressing back a bunch of times nothing happens and if it does you get closed out of the app. I hope a new update is in order cause I'm frustrated with the last.

Must say amazon has been sucking for a long time now. It's become impossible to find anything, the search features and product pages have been corrupted by the drive to advertise they waste much time of the user and obfuscate information users need to make informed efficient decisions. Not a pleasant shopping experience anymore... feels like advertising hell... moving on to alternatives. All I want to see is "adjustable dumbells", not 467 results of nonsense to sift thru.

Just type in the name of a description of item you want to purchase and hit enter. You will have a lot of items and price ranges for you to pick from. Read other consumers opinions which might guide you in a better direction. Put purchases in cart and check out. You have an opportunity to change information before everything ships. I have never had anything but easy transactions.

Can't stand the message centre. Overall shopping experience is great until you have to return setting and you can't send the seller an image fe to go with your case. I'm not someone who uses a PC or a laptop and I do all work from my phone but it's annoying that I cannot properly send messages to sellers as it comes up with crappy context.

Amazon prices are climbing but you're not asking abou about that. The reason I stay with Amazon? The shipping is usually fast. 2 gallon The app itself is pretty good once you learn how to jump through all the different Hoops to get an order returned!. But you're not asking about that. The app itself is okay but you have to really know how to jump through Hoops to get something returned too many steps + 2 lengthy to describe here

Love amazon. But lately the delivery notifications are all over the place! For example, I got a notification that .y package was the next stop. They were less than a mile away! Then suddenly they went the opposite direction. Then I get a notification saying they had to drop off other things first and my delivery time went from 12:45 pm to 10 pm! And this isn't the first time this has happened.

I have one question: why did they make it harder and harder to make wishlists? The tray was perfect, easily able to switch, updated and its gone. That was fine. They had the hearts, a little harder to switch lists, but fine. Whatever. Updated: Now, I can't *save* ANYTHING! The hearts are gone, trays are gone, wishist button won't even work. Stop. Making. Things. Harder.

It technically works, but it's literally just the website with a shell around it. Images are all lower resolution than a 2001 flip phone. It lags on even the fastest devices. Pages don't fit the screen right so scrolling is weird. And good luck looking through product images without it scrolling down. I hope Amazon lets the devs free from their cages and finds new ones to fix the app.

They were charging me twice for Amazon prime. They wouldn't deal with it. Had to close my bank account. I give them another chance. I get charged an shipped for an order I didnt place and itll take two weeks for a refund for a charge that I never authorized. Hope you don't have problems with them. They are unhelpful and takes forever to resolve even when it's their mistake.

The Amazon service is good, but the app experience is cumbersome and irritating. The filter menu is slow to load and closes each time you select or deselect an item, so selecting multiple filters is painfully time-consuming. The item size and color screens are extremely slow to load. I frequently get kicked to my phone's lock screen when browsing.

Why auto-playing advertising videos?!?! Everyone hates those. App has no forward button. If you accidentally hit the back button twice like I do because my fingers shake then you have to start all over again. I much prefer the web browser even though it is not fully functional. I can't imagine it would take too much effort to add a forward button...

The AMAZON mobile shopping app puts all others to shame. Constantly raises bar such as simple steps for easy returns @Kohls stores. Only concern are some vendors (especially from China). Some advertise brand products but ship inferior products. Many embellish product features and forced to return as quality fails to meet expectations. Some products like batteries may be OLD. Some like Teals Epsom salts are 3x the store price. BUT I love the app and AMAZON so much I invested in the company!

Don't count on delivery dates. Twice in a week Amazon has failed to deliver my order. They claim on one that the labels fell off. The newest one hasn't been explained. They expected me to be there and decline delivery to get a refund. The burden shouldn't be on me. After speaking to 6 CS reps they finally promised to refund my money, but I haven't seen it yet. We'll see in 3-5 hours. I'm ready to cancel my Prime account. Why pay for horrible service when I can get it for free? Amazon sucks.

Normally a must have app.. works seamlessly with desktop/browser. ~since January the app needs some help. Images are regularly not appearing for products. And switching categories has a big lag of about 3-5 seconds. The banners load fine at the top of the app but it's like it takes 2deep breaths. Used to be super snappy. 2 stars until improved.

Its all about service well,. I surely was able to save some money and time wise two out of three items out of three were there in a reasonable time frame the other the third well took a extra two weeks. But all in all it worked out fine. For the price and quality I was over all very satisfied as well as got a ton of compliments on my over all attire and appearance from head to toe thanks to the wide variety of color and styles that were available from Amazon.

I ordered an item I needed quick through prime, it said it would be here in 2 days then they changed it to 1 week later for "my prime day" to save boxes. I didn't click that. I really needed that in time for work. I am so frustrated, the item has to be signed for too, I went out of my way for the day they promised and the changed. I already contacted support they couldn't do anything. If dev sees that, don't tell me to contact you, I already did, it fell on deaf ears.

Looking for pencil cases and Amazon is only showing 1 product. Literally. It was fine a few days ago but everything I search, there's only 1 item that pops up. Not even a page of results. I even looked up something basic, like shirts and still the same issue. Is there something I can fix in the settings?

Incredibly slow. Search for a product, click a product to be taken to product page, proceed to click product image 20 times before it finally shows you the gallery. Same story for adding to basket, clicking reviews (or pretty much anything on the product page) or viewing an item in your basket. I understand that they're probably dealing with insane amounts of traffic, but surely they can do better than this?!

The app itself is functional. Don't like how clearing search history is in account settings along with other strange UI decisions. Amazon service is a hit/miss. Thankfully there's the option for pickup for smaller items but I'd like to see the option exist for bigger products. My apartment has issues with porch pirates and I wish I could control what days a package arrives regardless of how long shipping is.

Perfect except instant add to list. The update before this recent one allowed you to click a heart to instantly add an item to your default list and now the feature is gone again. Please bring it back. Thats the one thing that makes amazon on mobile worth it otherwise its just annoying to go all the way to the product page to add it to a list to then go back to the search page and find your place all over again.

App seems broken as of recently. Clicking item links in messages or emails no longer open in the app properly. The app only partially opens (I can see the title bar, but that's it), and then just hangs until I force close the app. When browsing through items, you can scroll so far and then all the images disappear. Scroll a little more and they are back. Try to scroll back up a little to see the ones that were not there, and they all disappear again. The cycle keeps repeating as you scroll.

This app is unbelievably slow and unresponsive. It makes browsing Amazon an absolute chore. EDIT: Two months later and it's only gotten slower and more unresponsive. It took over five minutes to add two items to my cart. Amazon is clearly not interested in making this app better. They're too busy adding useless features like Alexa support and "donate to your favorite charity."

Horrible experience! Had to cancel my order because Amazon kept "suggesting" 2 day shipping and split my order up into 2 different orders so, I'm paying for 2 day shipping twice. Upon canceling my order, the gift card I used transferred to my balance. I decided to try again and just pay for shipping (without adding my credit card information) and added an additional $16 to my balance to complete the purchase. Immediately after loading the money my account locked for "suspicious activity"

I only gave it 2 stars because they use dogs when my page doesn't load. Since the update I can not use the app it just tells me something went wrong. I've uninstalled and reinstalled. I've changed my password. I've logged off and logged back on. I've even emailed the developers. Nothing. It's way to frustrating I dont even try anymore!

Why would you screw an app up so bad and risk losing business? The update is so irritating, I'm sure I'm not alone in not even wanting to waste my time shopping with Amazon anymore, besides my regular subscribe and save. I now have to scroll to right and left to see results on a page like it's 1997, wasting time. The app needs to be fixed ASAP! There are numerous complaints about the downgrade. Hopefully this is fixed soon!

App was slow to load... I click where I expect something to popin when it finally loads, and instead it starts my amazon prime trial. I don't have time to be using that right now, so now it's wasted. Anything that's for a pay service should have confirmation... and the app being slow is because you were loading the ad in the first place. Bad design.

I've had Amazon Prime for almost 2 years now, if not longer. Every month it tells me I'm going to be charged for the following month. The other day, I was charged without warning and my bank account didn't have enough to cover it. I was charged an overdraft fee of 35 dollars. Upon calling Amazon and explaining the situation, they told me to send a screenshot of the fee. I did, and in two days they paid it back. Their customer service is great and helpful, and packages always on time. Thank you!

Recurring issues with orders. Nothing arrives on time. The app tries to send me to UPS sites to find a package. No one knows where the package is or when it will be delivered. Contacting customer service to talk to a human is not easy. The chat always redirects to a different page on the app. All to avoid the real issue that they can't deliver on their 2-day shipping policy. So then what am I paying for a Prime account? LS:SS/ Amazon is useless middleman. Buy local. Save yourself the stress.

I've been ordering off of Amazon for a few years now and I've got to say that it is an amazing experience. I honestly can't wait for the text message with the little photo of my package delivered, its honestly like a mini Christmas feeling, hahaha. I've had a few problems here and there and customer service was great; albeit it took some time, but none the less all problems solved.

Amazon is slow compared to other sales apps. I forgot that Amazon does not take direct payment the last time i ordered from them and I got a payment revision needed email long after i placed my order with them and since i could not pay them the revision they had asked for i had to cancel the order. I am also waiting on a package that did not come when they said it would. All i got was a running late status and the sad part of this is that i cant track it.

Everyone check your accounts to make sure you're not being charged for unsolicited subscriptions!!! I was recently charged for unlimited Amazon music which I NEVER signed up for it and never even got a notification that I was being signed up for it! Same thing with a kindle subscription, didn't realize I've been getting charged for that for a while now. Amazon, you may be desperate for money but stealing money from unsuspecting people is NEVER okay!!

I pay $120 a year for Amazon Prime. I DO NOT WANT TO SEE ADVERTISING WHEN SHOPPPING VIA APP. Why does the app have ads for items I'm looking for at the top and bottom of the screen. It reduces the number of available results it can show and I'm ALREADY PAYING A PREMIUM for your service. Get rid of the ads!

What can I say Amazon is awesome that's why it's a multi-million dollar company and it has probably billions of people who shop daily. You guys deserve every dollar for everything you do from having everything available to having 24-hour customer service support. Whether you're on the app or on the website it's easy to navigate completely affordable and technical support is always there if you need it. Shipping cost phenomenal delivery time amazing no other company can compare! Two thumbs up!!!

Much better than wish! I used to shop exclusively at wish, then I ordered a few times here, and discovered most of the products are exceptional, but the deliveries are reliable, plus, most of the time the tracking is reliable! Like Amazon actually gives a damn about providing customer service to their customers, and not just taking advantage of them! Thank you Amazon! Now I shop exclusively on Amazon!

The App is constantly bugging when I open the pictures to have a closer look at the products I'm interested in. Either it will load forever and not open the pics, or when you manage to open the pics it won't go out of this mode until you hit the back button like five times and then it takes you back to the home page. Then you have to try for a few minutes to find again the product you were looking at.

Prior to the filter update I would have rated 4-5 stars, but the new filter and "Next Page" outweigh all the good. Somehow they managed to make the filter worse than it was previous. Getting to correct department without quantities visible is going to be even more difficult. It's hard enough trying to figure out where Amazon puts items the way it was, and now it just seems like they want to persuade what people buy.

I've used this app for years. Recently, something has changed and it's so laggy it's unusable at times. Have tried reinstalling tna. Shame, I've been a heavy Amazon shopper since they only sold books. This is making me abandon quite a few shops now. Update: 10 Aug 20. The App seldom works without stopping. Have reinstalled. Now it just exits on startup. Shame as I use Amazon most days. ( Android 10.)

This app absolutely sucks on Android devices. I cannot search for anything. It crashes immediately upon searching for items basic functionality that is performed on the iPad cannot be performed on mynote 10 plus. It is obvious that I have all the current updates and bells and whistles, please fix this immediately.

Pros:Easy to buy things and search for what you need. Cons: When shopping on the app, it is significantly limited compared to what you can see on the Amazon website when using chrome on a desktop. The availability of products on the app seems rigged. Some items may not be available on the app that may be available when visiting the site via chrome without signing into your Amazon account.

For my first thing I bought I was told that it arrived at August 14, checked and it wasn't there. I checked for about a week and it never arrived, told an expert and they said that it was scanned wrong and it would arrive in 1-2 business days, checked in every day for around a week again, wasn't there. Talked with a expert again, and they just gave me a refund and considered it lost. For my first product on Amazon I had a terrible experience. The only good thing about that were the experts.

It could use improvement! I am a loyal and active customer, this is one of my prefured shopping apps, however it upsets me to know I dont have all the options that everyone else gets. I live in a rural area, about 1 hour from a grocery / department store & for that reason; they refuse to ship to my location. ( If )/ when I can find someone on the list of other sellers that ARE willing to ship items out here, I am lucky if the price doesnt double. Subscibed to prime & havent seen a differenceðŸ˜¡

Sometimes it works great but about half the time it won't allow me to select options. There will be multiple options but I can't select anything. Can't update or remove payment options. Won't let me remove an expired credit card or choose to use the card I added a few weeks ago. Now today I noticed it's updated the expiration date on the card.

I use the app all the time. I like shopping with Amazon. I don't care for the way they display products. It would be nice if they either allowed you to pick how many products/page or just show all. As it is, you only see about 10-20 then u have to go to the next page. It's very very annoying!

Overall extremely disappointed by the Prime service. Even before the pandemic, not one of my packets were received within the promised two days of being shipped I paid extra for. Also, it's happened twice that I've been unable to add a product to my cart, then refreshed the app/browser only to see the item was "no longer offered" but the same item with a higher price was available.

The only issue I have with Amazon is that when it says it's being delivered on Sunday, it's really not. It's going to be delivered on Monday or Tuesday. That false advertisement and it gives people false hope that their item will be there before the week starts. It sucks. The app is okay but sometimes it does force quit if it has recently updated.

The developers need to make obvious what option is selected by shading the sodding box, not highlighting the border by increasing the line thickness by one bloody pixel. It's damned hard to tell what option is selected because of this college freshman level design decision that I've now got to go spend my precious and rare free time on returning the wrong size garment. Make your app less stupidly designed, Amazon.

crashes every time I scan a photo that I want to see if the site has that particular item Edit: they falsely advertise "FREE" delivery when the item isn't available for "FREE" delivery. Can't contact customer support as just takes you to the forums and all they said was reset password would be nice if I was able to get access to the email account I provided to Amazon. But I don't have access no more. Uninstalled and will not be back or install

Bugs galore, especially when trying to access your saved lists. Constant crashes. Takes forever to load pages or remove items from lists only to get an error message. Used to be a great app but ever since I've upgraded my phone to a better, faster model, it's been nothing but headache. So frustrating.

App appears to be working just fine for the last 6+ months. There are still issues with what you can and can't do on the app. But those will be a work in progress. It would be nice if companies like Amazon had a "Suggestion Box" type of feature for us end users to make suggestions or submit ideas for the app or for Amazon, itself to run better, more smoothly. But back to the app... No problems from this user in a long time.

Extremely slow whenever view pictures, change options or use filters. Filters are limited and barely useful. Have to make one selection, then back to product, click on filters, make another selection, back to product, rinse and repeat. Ridiculously long wait for filters to re-open. Sort function is entirely useless. Unless sorted by featured, the app eliminates the majority of search hits - from hundreds down to 20 - 30 (or less) when changed to sort by price, etc. Intentional?

Previous version was flawless, never had any bugs, glitches or problems. Now with the latest update my god its terrible! The prime button is in an awkward position & after searching the app deosnt quite settle quick enough so when you tap search you end up tapping address, it just ruins shopping experience. The WORSE thing by far since this update is when your browsing multiple products & you press back to come out of one product it freezes unless you keep tapping back several times crashing

Any time I select an item to view it none of the preview pictures show up, nor do the "add to cart" or "buy now" buttons. It goes straight to "items frequently bought together" and then customer reviews. It is no longer possible for me to make any purchases at all and is frustrating to use. Also the new "next" button is somewhat pointless.

Amazon still has shipping delays but won't offer a discount on Prime memberships. If I pay for Prime I expect to get what I've paid for. Amazon isn't fulfilling this and won't give discounts. However, Amazon can afford to donate millions of dollars in the last month. Something isn't adding up here. The only reason I continue to keep my account is for the Prime movies/TV. I'll continue to support other businesses and stop ordering from Amazon.

It's great but keeps giving me an error after every menu, it's annoying. When I'm looking at products I'll keep getting an error message of something going wrong and I'll have to reload by going back and clicking the product again. It's super annoying especially when it refreshes me back to the homepage and I lose track of my product I was looking at. Can this be fixed for me? I am using a OnePlus6 Pro.

App sucks. The filters and the sorting are the worst thing ever. If you sort the deals of the day by anything other than "featured" the search results are completely messed up. Want to filter something between $10-20, good luck. Looking through gift ideas and want to apply one of the filters, not gonna happen. Their sorting option is as mess no matter if you're in the website or the app. But I still choose the website over the app.

App works well but searching is a nightmare. Both web and app if I'm honest. You can be as specific as you like and it still gives you other results and miss the one your after. You also get different results from 2 people side by side searching the same things. I wish you could search for "must contain" words. I get it Amazon want to show you other similar items but I specifficly need 22mm, why show all other sizes, or searching for cherry vodka also give gin run etc....not relevant.

Great app for quickly getting on Amazon and buying stuff. I mostly browse and buy books on Amazon, but one feature I really wish the developers could add into this app is the ability to preview books. It's really useless browsing through books without being able to see the Table of Contents. Otherwise, the app is still useful for checking your orders, browsing, etc.

The app is okay, but as Amazon doesn't leave anywhere to complain about their shortcomings directly, here we are. The biggest issue with them these days, though? That would be the fact they're still pushing Amazon Prime despite UPS's new "it gets there when it gets there, regardless of what you pay for" mentality. It makes Prime worthless for the "shipping perk". And being that NOBODY I know streams Prime Video, that part is pointless too... Gotta fix their membership so it's useful again.

Great app but has some bugs that need to be fixed! My most recent encounter with a bug is that the recommended size feature has not be available to allow me to input my size information. I've been trying for WEEKS and this feature is still not corrected. I've lost a lot of weight and my information is just set to what I've ordered in the past. I found this feature and I was very excited to use it but unfortunately, I get a "Something Went Wrong" message every time.

I shop Amazon weekly and find it easy to use. The swiping left and right can be annoying. I guess its sensitive to how you actually swipe cause sometimes mine just goes down when i try to swipe left or right. The amazon prime 2 day shipping is a joke. I completely understand that it may take a few days for them to package everything but once its shipped it still takes a week to 2 weeks. One of my orders was just a 45 min drive away then it was sent to Cali. Im in Wyoming. Unnecessary.

I wanted next day delivery and it said prime would be able to do so. I get prime and it tells me that may stuff will be here in a week and that was the previous free delivery option. Terrible company. Absolute scam. No way to get in touch to rectify the issue. Every time I use it I feel stupid for doing so. Next time I'll just go to the shops. I just read some of the positive reviews and they're definitely bots. They just sound like adverts do because that's what they are.

I have never have a problem with the app itself, you can literally find anything you're looking for and it's generally always sold and shipped by more than one company and I love how I can compare pricing on whatever it is I'm on the hunt to buy, shipping prices, shipping dates, warranties vs. no warranties, ect. Keep up the awesome work Amazon Shopping!!! ðŸ’¯ðŸ’–ðŸ¤©ðŸ‘ðŸ’‹

I buy lots of stuff on Amazon. Shopping on Amazon is frustrating if not maddening about half the time, convenient the other half. My primary complaints:1) early on, prices were almost always fair, Today, prices are frequently obscenely higher.than at other retailers, 2) there is very little information about most items which leads to frequent disappointments, 3) explicit descriptions of what you want are redirected to unrelated items, 4) many products are junk, Amazon does not vet quality.

I had an order delayed for 2 weeks without a reason or message from the seller that they had changed the delivery date. I then had the order cancelled again with no explanation and no contact either through the app or email. When I tried to contact Amazon I was told it had been cancelled and the price had now gone up nearly Â£100. However I could not find anything in my account history regarding the order and nothing to say it that my order had been cancelled. Avoid.

The new update is not easy to navigate with all the ads on the home page.
