Also since most people shop and take pictures with their phones it seems silly not to be able to add pics to reviews from the phone app. I like to review products but if I have to log into my computer to do it, it makes the process cumbersome and annoying.

I HATE your new filter. It's slow. It's Not intuitive. It's medevil. It doesn't produce results any better than if i did it on my own. Your search results typically are not even relevant to what I'm looking for. I could pay the neighbor kid five bucks to walk to the store and buy what I need faster. I used to spend 75% of my shopping budget with Amazon but now, I don't even spend 10%. Not the Amazon cares because they aren't responding or doing anything to change.

Please bring back the option to where we can see the prices before clicking on the item. Before it would show the item prices from the cheapest to most expensive available. It would say for example 19.99 - 50.00 and you would go click on it and select the item you wanted to see the price. Now it just shows you ONE price at the start and you have to click to go see because you know that price is always FAKE.

Make shopping easy as well as finding good deals. With prime free shipping or free shipping over a certain dollar amount. You can make different lists. Compare similar items how are you guys doing so you know which deal is the best. As well as the seller and their reputation. With my experience anytime there has been an issue it is been corrected and resolved in a timely fashion to my satisfaction. I highly recommend this app

One missing functionality took this app from 4 stars to 1. When I moved from my old apartment I tried to remove my old address but apparently it was a default for something that I couldn't change on the app. Naturally this led to me accidentally sending an order to my old address... Surely changing/removing addresses is an easy app feature to add?? It took 2 clicks on my laptop when I finally remembered to do it.

Not gonna lie I expected more from you Amazon... The apps feels clunky and weird. It looks like the app someone would make after a year of programming classes. It is literally disgusting to navigate. Also, too many weird bugs. They should have made it like their website. It gets the job done but jeez it's not optimized worth anything. Everything seems rectangle shaped and looks like it's made with freaking html boxes. Please update to make it better and fix these problems

I love this app, because Amazon have everythings I can thought, but the main screen when you search somethings became very unconfortable: first I have all my result in a neat row, but now all my result was on the left and on the right of the screen, i'm so frustated about this because i can't see all the offers in the screen, i can't see if something can be interesting .. please resolve that because I won't buy anything with this horrible app.

List and orders??? I upgraded to prime, but since I have all my lists and orders has disappeared, I was charged twice after the initial free trail, and I'm getting charged for stuff out of my bank which I can't check in my orders tab. I canceled prime but it's still giving me access to prime free video, and none of my lists and orders have returned. Confusing!!! Really frustrating and annoying.

For the most part I've had good experiences with Amazon. Now & then I get something that's not as discribed. I miss the one day delivery, but maybe that shouldn't have been that way. I've read some negative ads about some parts of Amazon. I hope thing's get better in all of their locations.

I'm giving this 4 stars because all of a sudden, I can no longer tap the heart on listings and save them directly to my shopping list. That's a big part of how I shop on Amazon. Now I have to do it like I used to. Scroll down and actually click on the add to list link. I've tried logging out and back in, uninstalling and reinstalling, and clearing my cashe, and force stopping. I don't know what happened overnight but it's a pain in the tail.

Best I can say is it launches without error. It used to be a great app, but a lot of features are now missing.. todays deals, lightning deals, suggested items. It now just shows other digital services they provide and nothing I may want. Add on top that when you try to view categories manually it seems I consistent for displayed ui! (I.e. sometimes I have additional filters sometimes just products)

After years of successfully using this app, it stopped working efficiently. Took forever for anything to load. I finally uninstalled it with the idea of a fresh install possibly solving the problem. Nope! Now it won't even install. All the other apps on my phone are working perfectly, by the way.

The application moves slower than dial-up and when you go through the application to try to get to customer service they make you wait longer than Verizon or AT&T to get to customer service. And then the people that do answer the customer service on chat they never read the previous messages and they always ask you the same question back you ask them!!

Amazon has become the biggest rip off. Charges to my credit card for 3 months that nobody authorized and they won't give me my money back. My own fault for not checking. Then once I removed the option to renew my membership they removed the 2 day option for shipping even though the membership runs until the end of the month. Plus all the overpriced items that you get at the store cheaper and not to mention the knock offs! DONE WITH AMAZON

It seems as though this app isn't as compatible with cellphones as it is with laptops and iPads. It is very slow and doesn't recognize when I touch a button the first time. Usually I have to touch the button 2 or 3 times then I have to wait on the app to complete the action. I hate using this app on my phone but the previous version is now obsolete and not recognized.

I expect more from a company as large as Amazon. I recognize the successful development of UI, meta-data, and overall infrastructure of anything Amazon is a difficult collaboration for multiple computer scientists, engineers, and designers. But, Amazon should be a lot further along in this realm. Most recently, updated the app and now it doesn't work. Most likely a problem with my phone being over 2 yrs old- but still something Amazon should have been aware of

Not intuitive at all. If your card expires and you update it, it doesn't cross all of your subscriptions. 1-click settings disappear. Even if you update it, you have to in another unrelated section-good luck finding it. My fire tv is now absolute trash. Even w updating my settings in the app, I lost my subscriptions. I'll change the review if Amazon restores my purchases. Seriously debating completely getting rid of prime and everything associated and paying more somewhere else for less stress

Unable to click next to view the other pages for my search. Also, there are problems with how the searched items are shown, most of the time you have to swipe down, left to right, then down to swipe left to right again. The app is not useful for Amazon shopping.

I started having serious problems on Amazon via browser on my phone so downloaded this app this morning and can already tell, it is PERFECT! Everything is laid out for easy access including Q&As, reviews, returning to description, cart, lists, everything. It has turned product search as well as view from the nightmare it recently became to an absolute joy. Whoever designed this app for Amazon... kudos! And thank you so much. Love it!

The app has just become more and more unusable and is very poorly designed. I can't even sign in because of the stupid phone number authentication which sends you a link via text, yet the link doesn't always work and once it EVENTUALLY does, you can't reopen the Amazon app at the stage you left it previously, meaning that you are forced to go through the sign in process from the start - the sign in process that you can't even complete! ðŸ˜‚

This app sucks. It is soooo not intuitive. I can never find what i am looking for, but always plenty of ads for all kinds of Amazon stuff. In the latest version I cannot even find the stupid QR code I need when I go shopping at Whole Foods. Used to pop up when I open the app. Now I don't even know where to look. it is almost as bad as the website which has soooo many links I don't even know where to start when I am trying to find something. Their tech team needs to learn the meaning of the word "STREAMLINED".

The latest update is absolutely terrible and frustrating. The amazon deals section is completely gone and has been replaced with irrelevant ads. Please correct your new update, its complete garbage. Every time I go into the app now, I just leave and look at other store apps. Whoever decided it was a great idea to change the home page to a bunch of ads should be demoted.

What on earth are the techs doing with this app? The UI is so bad im on the verge of deleting the app & purely using the standard desktop website! Utterly horrific stuff, filters for searches next to zero, listings in general are outright farcical, pretty much unusable all round if you decide to browse for something. Fine if you're typing a search to purchase something specific. Would rate this as 0 stars if i could. Few years ago it was tremendous

It's always insanely slow, and has been for over a year. Especially if i want to add an item to a list or select another color/size option. I use it, but I hate it. I've even uninstalled the app and re-installed it in case it was because the app was old on my phone, but that made it worse, and now it crashes and closes.

Used to be good until recently. Now, all it shows when you open it up is books and movies and such. It's almost like they are discouraging you to buy other products. Not to mention, I'm a paid prime member and no longer get 2 day shipping. I understand that we are prioritizing due to the pandemic, but why should I still pay for a service that is no longer available? Please at least bring my old feed back, I used to enjoy browsing.

It is a mess. It is way more complicated than the website. Because I was trying to figure out how it works the checkout, I lost a flash deal. It seems you have 15min to proceed with the checkout before the deal expires. My first time dealing with prime day, the app and the flash deals. Overall it was a horrible experience. Better buy from others instead from Amazon.

Back in February, I pre-ordered ff7r and a few other things. It kept saying not enough on the card when we called them, it was enough. I let some items go but kept the game and a movie. I ordered some more things, now it's saying the same thing and there is 80+ money on the damn card!!! The order was 66 dollars!! I've had enough. What's the damn deal? I've had enough. 0 stars if I could.

The app has gotten buggier with time rather than more stable, and the way the order history page scrolls itself back up when you go in and out of an order is extremely annoying when you're digging in and out of multiple orders... Who thought sending you back to the top repeatedly was a good idea?? Would almost rather use the mobile site at this point...

The app has gone downhill recently and I don't know why. Whenever I try to search for something I can only see part of the screen and cannot get to the next button without changing my phone to landscape. I also cannot scroll at the top to change the various filters. I love shopping on Amazon, but there have been several times that I have given up looking for something because of how the app is set up and bought it from somewhere else.

App is pretty straight forward but even after like 6 years using it I yet can't figure out how to message sellers. I've done it on PC but can't figure it out on mobil. Also in my area there is no one that can scan and print a return label that amazon is now using it. Making returns nearly impossible. Be nice if Amazon would fix that. Until then its a 1 star because this needs to be brought to their attention.

The filters feature has been improved and is much faster!!! Enough to make me immediately come and adjust my review. So far images have been actually loading for a bigger preview when I tap them as well, the only noticable delays I'm seeing at a glance are page changes like going back to the home page or selecting a new style/ model of the same item. Thank you for this update! S9+ User

This app is sooo slow! The original was lightning fast. The latency between touches is seriously seconds. I can use it to browse slowly but other than that useless. Don't open any menus either or you'll be waiting for ages as it loads. Poorly optimized and probably raking all my phone data. Just use a PC avoid this app.

Good shopping app, but recently when I search any item, the results zoom in so each item cannot fit on my screen, instead of looking at 2-3 items at a time as I scroll its 1/2 and item, and I have to continue to scroll just to get to one other option. Makes me look at other shopping apps! Please fix the search bar!

App barely works for me. There's usually a 5-10second wait after every tap (I counted), cart won't update, buy with one click doesn't always work. Every so often the app is usuable but for the most part it's unuseable and constantly freezing. I've been hoping they'd update and fix whatever's causeing the issue but since I got this phone 3 or 4 years ago I don't think it's wide spread enough of a problem for then to care/know about.

What's going on? I finish viewing a product and press back to go back to viewing the other items and it takes me straight back to the main menu instead. I have to press next a thousand times to get back to the page I was last viewing. So annoying. I've had this app for years. First time I've found it frustrating!

The recent changes to search filtering are GREAT! Individual search filters for the most frequently used (I'm guessing) with less used grouped under 'more filters' Great job Amazon! The changes to search filters has made the app unusable for me for the reasons many others have previously stated. I've uninstalled the app for now but may try it again later. I've also started using other options including brick and mortar instead of Amazon. I hope Amazon is listening to these recent reviews.

Every time I open the app it gives me a full screen nag to pay for prime with a big yellow "yes" button and a tiny little "oh maybe later button". This would be bad enough if I didn't already have household prime, so they're just trying to trick me into paying twice for something I already have. Nice try.

Have never had any issues ordering off from amazon, and I've order several times over the last 13 years. Absolutely love Amazon and most of their prices. Like with any app or ordering through any apps or online, do your homework first and make sure the vendor your ordering through is highly rated to avoid any issues!!! Amazon tries to be very thorough with what vendors they allow but can not know somes exact intentions, so do your homework and report any issues immediately!

Overcharged/ scammed I cancelled my subscription and days later was charged again for monthly membership and instead of my membership ending the end of the month it was immediately cut once they took money out. And that's not even the best part, there noone that you can direct your complaint to just trouble shooted avenues. I'm sooo done with Amazon!

I make purchases on Amazon almost weekly, and I haven't been disappointed until now. This update is definitely a step backwards, and I only did the update because whatever recent changes were made to the app made it difficult to use. I had hoped the update would fix the issues I was having, but it didn't. My advice, if the app is working on your particular device then don't do the update. If it's not working, don't be too optimistic that the update will fix it.

Do not pay for prime. I've had it for many years and it does nothing anymore. You have to wait weeks for your products to ship. You can order it elsewhere and get it way faster. When you try to leave a negative review about shipping times they deny it and won't let you review that product ever again. It's a scam. Why pay for 2 day shipping when it never ever even leaves the place in 2 weeks let alone 2 days.

Before I tell you the reason why I'm giving three stars; let me express that I love Amazon! they have so many things to offer on their website. But, logistically they are flawed. There's major inconsistency on how & where your packages are delivered, there is no way to compromise in a manner to meet them to receive a package, or go even to the warehouses to pick up the package. Yes, C.S. will request immediate expedition of the package, but they'll avow to say that's all they can do for you!

This is the worst experience I have ever had. I've been a prime member for at least 15yrs. I ordered over $300 dollars in merchandise. half my order ($160) was sent back, because there weren't any empty lockers in the Amazon lockers. Instead of sending some kind of communication for me to pick it up instead. So now I have to wait 3 to 5 days for a refund just to reorder it. They could have gave me a credit so I could reorder instead of me waiting when they didn't have to wait for my payment.

The app itself is fine, one can find anything. Delivery is horrible. Twice I have received messages that the item was delivered and twice ot was not. I live in an apartment building with over 200 apartments, today the message was that my item was handed to a resident. Which resident? They have no idea and offer $5 credit, stick the credit, I want a refund, now they are making me wait. Never shopping here again, Walmart is cheaper and ebay has better deals.

Everytime.e I get to that promo code screen it doesn't let me pass through even though I have the right amount of money. It's not letting me purchase my items. If you could help that would be great. I was having this trouble for awhile now and no matter how many times I try it never works. Even when I selected 'use 50$ Amazon giftcard' even if I added promo codes or the code again. So please help me or fix this problem it's absolutely frustrating and I hate it.

Prime memeber since 2016. All failed transactions were taken cared of promptly by amazon. The customer reviews and prices are very competetive with locally available items, but with amazon, you get more options and sometimes, if you are patient and lucky, you may stumble upon a greater deal. they warehouse deals are also very under rated department of amazon that provides buyers VERY cheap options at very honest quality and conditions.

Always very slow to respond. Pages reload every time, navigation is horrible, adding to your cart is a navigation nightmare and some product pages auto load cart others do not, try continue shopping, I don't want 50 damn page loads and having to wait for the site just to get back to where I was at why it would not have add to cart, go back to search list, or go to cart, options ya right that's too easy. Searching is ridiculously inaccurate. Quick view a product ha get ready to throw your phone.

This app freezes constantly! Freezes my entire phone forcing me to restart phone constantly! I would do most of my shopping from Amazon if it wasn't so dang frustrating trying to use this app- I know it isn't my devices as I have the same issue regardless of device being used. Of the thousands of dollars I spend monthly this would be the primary source of my shopping if this app allowed for a smooth enjoyable experience. Hoping for change or a competitor to provide what Amazon promises!

Edit 11-17-20 Raised back to 4 stars, many improvements lately but still not happy about prior issue of trying to force an AR app download just to update the app. It's an optional feature to see items in my room or whatever and one that isn't required, should never have been a forced download of another app just to update this one. My new device/phone has it preloaded so it's no longer an issue but the point remains the same...

The app does exactly as it says and it delivers amazing products. However 1the shipping is the let time. I have prime and the time changes constantly for the orders. I know this isnt amazon's fault but it's annoying. I have ordered something and it is getting delivered soon but earlier it said it would be delivered from 1:15 to 3:15 but now it says 4:00 to 6:00. It can be irritating because the time isn't accurate and is constantly changing.

I shop at amazon regularly, however the last app update has made the app un-usable. Immediately after updating every item appears huge. I can only see a small portion of the image for each item and have to scroll around to even find out what I'm looking at. I hope they fix this app soon but as of 9/5/20 I am on the most current version and on my phone the app is not usable.

Recently added "recommendations" which get sent as push notifications and cannot be separately disabled from settings (confirmed by contact with Amazon customer support) have made this app unusable for me. I do want the order status updates, but those recommendations are extremely annoying. The only option was to disable all notifications from the app, but then it's no different from the website. So they soured the single feature which made this app more useful than a web browser ... removed it.

The new update broke the filter system. Whenever I filter the page, it only shows a single page with a greyed out "previous" button, despite it being the first page. I now have to go through every single item to find something I want, for the price I want. It just made the app completely unusable.

I really dislike the changes to the search function. Results are now paged, and selecting a filter immediately re-loads the search and boots you out of the filter menu [edit: and now backing out of the filter menu without making changes boots you out of the search entirely]. It's clunky as hell for anything beyond a really simple search.

Unfortunately the simple process of signing into my account caused me enough headache to delete the app within an hour. Once I entered my sign in details I would get sent a text with a link. I would click on this link and it would send me back to the start and I would have to sign in again and sent another text etc (never ending circle of fun). When I tried to access customer support I was automatically directed to sign in again. So unable to sign in and unable to access customer support.

Probably one of the worst apps I have ever used. They should take some CoViD profits and completely redo the app. I always find myself going back to the desktop page to purchase. Why can't they make an app that does most of the functions of the desktop. I like being able to sort. I do not like the way the search results come up. Too many people have found ways to game the system and manipulate the search results. Amazon has gone down hill. Forget the app and just use the desktop version.

Update 10/2/20.. We're right back to the constant crashing. And I do mean constant. I've once again removed the app for the third time. It seems like every 2 to 3 months they update it and it just crashes. Constantly. Even if I don't open the app. So I uninstall it. Wait a month or two. Then try again. And same thing. Over and over. I'll just stick to the website from now on. The app is useless.

Amazon have installed a handy 'glitch' that means they automatically select expensive delivery options when you have qualified for free delivery. When you attempt to change the option to free delivery the app 'freezes' and won't let you make the purchase. Repeatedly. Sort it out Amazon, I'd rather go elsewhere than get ripped off Â£5 for delivery I don't have to pay

ABSOLUTE WORST ONLINE SHOPPING EXPERIENCE IN MY LIFE. First, Amazon couldn't recognize the fact that payment went through and the app was asking me to update payment method endlessly. Then, support was useless and was unable to fix the issue in a timely manner or escalate to someone who could. And when I bought some more stuff, my account was locked and is still locked 24 hours after submitting billing details form. Oh, by the way the form won't allow to attach bank statement too. Great job ðŸ‘

You guys RUINED the shopping app! Before the update I was able to easily view my lists, shopping history, categories and find stuff I wanted to buy. Now scrolling down all I see are books.. ads.. magazines.. music.. more books.. more ads.. kindle stuff... more music.. more magazines.. movies.. WHERE THE HELL IS THE SHOPPING IN THE SHOPPING APP?!? The PRIME tab is USELESS!! As are the Alexa lists, Video and Music! This app should be Relevant to Shopping. Add tabs for History, My Lists, and Orders

Don't know where 3rd party sellers are shipping from without asking via email. Unknowingly purchased items shipping from China a few times. Had to wait 2 months for arrival. And Amazon cannot step in and cancel if item is from 3rd party seller. Even unknowingly purchased from a drop shipper based out of China and item still took unusually long. Amazon should require such sellers to state where item is coming from and where seller is located. Other than that, Amazon app is decent. Not great.

IT'S BROKEN It refuses to even install on any of my devices now so way to go Amazon. Your shopping experience has been declining to now leaving a lot to be desired, but at least that won't be an issue for me anymore as access has now been cut right down from 4 mobile devices to having to fire up my PC. That's just too much like hard work. Here's an idea....just go back to selling "just books" you useless cvnts as you certainly can't do anything else right. Amazon?......... I'm done with you.

Very poor showing for Prime Day 2020. When you try and scroll through a list of Prime Day deals, if you are looking at the catalog as a grid of items, the images for the items will disappear while you are scrolling. Suddenly, they'll decide to magically reappear again. This bug was consistently reproduceable by me using a Pixel 4a. I certainly did not want to shop for Prime Deals if I didn't know what I was looking at. Rest of the site was fine tho.

Amazon has almost any item you could want, and probably at a good price. It is really tedious to find specific items though. I type in a brand name and the correct nomenclature for an item that I know they sell, hit search and get another brand of a similar product,(sometimes) and by the third or fourth item on the searched list it's baby mobiles or car parts.

My app stopped sorting searches today. I called customer service who told me to reinstall. When i did i discovered that the update no longer supports dragging and dropping items into shopping lists. Im pretty unhappy about this since i use lists to select items im considering for purchase, comparing them and selecting the one i want to buy from this list. The update is inconvenient and aggravating because ive lost a great shopping feature, an unimprovement! Its harder to shop now.

Won't allow me to log in, says it needs to send an email for security, then when I click the link in the email it shuts the app down and opens Amazon in Chrome. Then if I try to sign in on the app again, it does exactly the same again. Deleted and redownloaded after speaking to an Amazon representative on the phone, but didn't resolve the issue!

One of the worst auto chat systems through customer service I've ever dealt with. You can't ask a question about an order. You have multiple choice subjects and all you get is the status of the item. If you choose the selection of having a problem with an order, you can't explain the problem, all you get is the status of the item. You can't even chat with a live person without going through the useless automated system and even then, you're lucky if you can get someone or get the help you need.

The mobile version is so annoying because when you try to purchase, it won't load when you go to select an address. IF it loads, it will then continue to load when you go to select free shipping. I've tried 8 times to purchase on the app and on mobile browser but it does the same thing. Definitely needs to be fixed if you want someone to actually purchase your product.

Since new update there appears to be no option for list view. Grid view is so large now only displays one item at a time, meaning have to scroll right or down to see another item. Makes it very difficult to use and spoils what was a really good app before. Obviously not been tested. Phone is very popular make so not as if it's not used by loads of people. Very disappointing and frustrating. Shame as rated it 5 stars before this update.

Something has happened with this app. It was really great for many years, but the past month or so the search feature hasn't been working. Anytime I do a search now, I get an error message saying "UH OH something went wrong on our end". But when I login to Amazon on a browser and do my search there, it's totally fine.

Not sure...cant find lightning deals, deals of the day. Have to go to a web page and click on a link, the app opens to deals of the day. Odd. Another oddity, this app is not being advertised on Amazon's app store. Another strange thing is, when scrolling through the deals, item pics disappear. Then scroll some more, pics appear. Thinking about 2 1/2 stars...

For some reason after the last update I can no longer use this app on WiFi. I have to turn off the wireless on my phone to get it to load the page. Otherwise it works as expected. Just frustrating to have to turn off wireless and then go back to click a link again if I was trying to look at something specific.

Amazon is the fast food of shopping. It's cheap and convenient. But you're hardly satisfied with what you get. I ordered something small from them through a third party seller recently. Apparently even though they handle the shipping they're not responsible for packages not getting to your door. I ended up having to eat the charge. Trust it will happen to you every now and then too. I'd rather just order directly from a source that I can hold accountable now.

New update is terrible and very hard to search for specific items. No way to change the settings either to where you can view items in a row, instead it spaces them all out to where I'm having to move my screen view all over as if I'm zoomed way in. This is terrible. Amazon, who are you letting change your apps? They don't care about your profit! Whoever is updating these apps needs to be fired!

I wish I could give review ZERO. The worst online shopping app I've ever used. I made an order with next day delivery (2TB hard drive), then I received late after 2 days. The delivered item was wrong as it was (1TB only). Finally when I talked to customer service to replace the item with the right one, the answer was "it's not available". Just you have to return the item or accept 50 Dirhams as a price difference (and the actual price difference between both items 100 Dirhams on the app)

Not being given an option to not see pantry or fresh options is super annoying because these programs defeat the purpose of having a prime membership. I paid to be able to get "free" shipping on small orders for my convenience but now I have to scroll through all these results that demand I pay or make a large order even when I filter by prime.

Products no longer display correctly on the amazon app and on the store accessed through the browser on Android version 10 using a Samsung A40. Product images do not show/or are completely misaligned all over the page. Some images do not load at all, showing an "x" where the image should be. Haven't been able to purchase products because of this.

*Edit:Amazon Smile - is now in settings* ... Finding specific settings to adjust is very difficult in general; there should be a site map or table of contents or something. Going through each sublink seems the only way to stumble upon new ways to personalize your account or experience. It would be nice to implement an advanced-search (of products) option as well, instead of going through each filter systematically.

The app is horrendous if you just want to browse. Looking for a dress but you have to "search" for it because of their suggestions are only for small people with a very expensive budget. Tried searching for plus size dresses and it shown me socks, sports bras and dresses that only go up to a 16/18. Try to sort by size but thats not an option. Even searching for household items that I know the exact name/brand that amazon sells it as and it won't even be listed on the first page.

Exceptional quality and amazing products, I personally prefer Amazon for home renovations, I almost always find what I like for an affordable price. The only mishap of shopping through Amazon is when the product you want is somehow out of stock, or isn't sold through their company. If that product isn't sold through this company then I ll go through esty, or wayfair. Personal observation, dont purchase a product through wish, too many instances where my purchase is never sent.

I love used to love Amazon more. Scrolling through has gotten too difficult. If there are thousands of products and I have to push next, I stop shopping. I want to easily see all options not just 10 in 30 minutes. I have bought less because it is too difficult to shop and scroll to find what I am looking for.

Easy ordering. Usually prompt delivery. There is one caviat. Make sure you check to see where your order is being shipped from. My daughter ordered a trampoline for my granddaughter's birthday. She ordered it a couple of months before, and it was never received it was shipped from China, and all the tracking information would say is either it was on its way or there was a delay in shipment. We finally did get a refund, but it was just a disappointing experience.

I would be careful with this app. Amazon has been taking my money. I have a card I only use for online purchasing So when I made my order the full amount was taken out in different small amounts. So a few days later Amazon was trying to take out more money when they already took out the full amount of my order. I've never received any item And there's No one to speak with Amazon because of the Corona virus.

Love the app, but it needs some big improvements. Why do we not have a dark mode yet? It's ridiculous and annoying to get blinded in the evenings and at night. By far the most frustrating thing I've encountered is that this app has no way to share a link to a product. Yes, you can share it through a different app, but that's clunky and time consuming. There's no way to just copy/paste a link. This is absolutely unacceptable. I've never used a single app that didn't offer proper link sharing.

Catastrophic! Metro sent me a a gift so, I decided to partake. I follow there instructions. When I get to the finalize order page its mysteriously stuck. I try to re-enter the promotional code, it's says it's been redeemed. I try to track the order. There is none showing. It did however manage to ad prime to my account. I try to reach customer service. It's says I need the app. I load the app. The app sends me through an email verification. I verify. Go back to the app. It ask me to verify again

Terrible customer communication on orders. 3 items were supposed to be delivered today and I was never told or contacted that there were any issues. That is until the very day they're supposed to arrive, when I get notified that one order was canceled and apparently completely erased from my account, and the other two would be delayed for over a month. Would've been nice to know that sooner, wouldn't you agree?

It's Amazon. You buy things, they Send you things you've Bought and Paid for, Everybody's Happy ! The difference between the Site and the App ? The App stores A Lot of Data on your Fone/Tablet ! Some will say that's OK if it means the App - with their 'Basket' of items loads more quickly. Other folks may say they don't have the 'Space' on their Fone/Tablet for storage of their 'Baskets', but like the Speed of the App & its better functionality. I'm a on/off shopper, so I prefer the App !

I want the old shopping app back. The new app is just a constant stream of Amazon ads for the services that I do not use and have no intention of using (for example Kindle Children's eBooks, Prime Reading and Kindle devices are the first three things I have to scroll through and I've never once bought any of these things). I just want to see the lightning specials and items related to recent shopping searches.

I have been a prime customer with amazon for years and regularly buy from them. However the latest update to this app has made searching for specific items nearly impossible without clicking through a hundred different windows. Its so difficult to use now that I won't be using the app, such a shame as the previous platform worked well enough

Searching for items returns ads that don't deliver to my address, or ads that look like they do till I get to check out. Waste of 30 minutes and still not a single item I could buy listed. Then the "suggestions" act like I don't know what I want. Any slightly obscure item returns more popular search results. Amazon might be a giant in the USA able to injure its workers, stop them using the bathroom etc. But in Australia and Thailand is is a second rate P.O.S.

Like everything else Amazon, it's so bloated and overflowing with ads it's nearly impossible to use. Every page would rather show you 40 other items, videos, and paid sponsored suggestions for irrelevant import garbage than focus on the item itself. I would say skip it and just use the site in a browser so you can filter out some of the garbage content, but they harass you to switch back to the app nonstop. Amazon is the worst.

I wanted the app so I could move from Facebook to looking at what was advertised. However then when I went to the real website to shop it forces me to use the app even when I do not want to. I don't like apps set up and perfer the website for browsing. So I'm deleting the app and I just wont move from Facebook to Amazon to check out the cool gadgets.

I updated the app around June and since then it has been horrible. I used to be able to use the drop down filter and select all filters i wanted at once. Now you have to select one filter at a time, because every time you click something the app refreshes instantly, and you have to keep clicking your filter choices one by one, and wait for amazon to apply selection one by one. Also you can't drag the items to the bottom tray wish list anymore. All these little things = pain to shop with the app

I have had a prime subscription for 4yrs and I have been trying to communicate with [Amazon] for over a year about the fact that my reviews are disabled. Never showed how I behaved to be suspended from reviewing. And, they have never gotten back to me about why. I have reached out to them on 10+ occasions. I have recieved NO RESPONSE from Amazon in a year of email attempts. They have low quality in every aspect of business. Except delivery, they abuse outsource delivery services to achieve that.

Amazon collate various editions of the same book into one item but on the app you cannot view all of these. You can only view one hardcover and one paperback edition (all the other hardback and paperback editions are hidden). You have to visit the Amazon website on a desktop computer to view all of these. This makes the app unusable for purchasing books (especially second hand). Please fix this and I'll delete my review. Thank you.

It appears the person that screwed up the Amazon music app you now allowed to screw up the Amazon shopping app. one of the obvious bugs is when you click the microphone for voice to text it just immediately turns back off. This is been a problem with the Amazon music app for as long as I remember. Now it's totally screwed on the Amazon shopping app. And for someone like me with severe dyslexia this is a major problem.

Amazon is amazing! I should've been ordering from them a long time ago! Products are perfect and in excellent condition! Plus fast delivery service! I've ordered from many different companies since COVID-19 hit this horrible country, and Amazon has surpassed my expectations! Walmart seems to have a decent delivery time but still nothing compared to Amazon!

Excellent, awesome, amazing. Really happy with my new phone from Trading Shenzhen. I was a little nervous at first but their communication was great. I ordered the phone on October 3, it shipped on October 13 (delay due to festival in China which was clearly indicated on their website), and arrived October 26 to Canada with Global priority. Was packed incredibly well, would be very hard to damage while being shipped. Will be buying from them again if I need a new China gadget.

Downloaded the app and it suddenly started glitching. The screen would be all white or all black then return to the page that I was on. Then the app crashed. When I tried to open it again it would immediately close. This went on for a few minutes. I just don't have the time or patience to go through this. I would expect more from a big company.

This is a really good app, I have never used the website as I was a late adopter to the amazon club due to a really bad experience the first time I used it years before. But this app is fantastic, the only thing I would LOVE to see it the ability to manually mark products as received! Right at this moment I have 4 items that I have received, but still showing up as awaiting delivery. Which happens all the time.

This app is very easy to navigate & has never failed me. Customer service is excellent at Amazon... Only Exception was during the lockdown when you could not get to a real person through customer service & had to use email. The 1 thing that drives me bonkers is in the Subscribe & save section if a product is not being delivered especially if you have had it on a monthly basis for over a year , there is no way to communicate with anyone in subscribe & save to address your issues.

Baddest after sale service possible I got severals orders canceled without any explanations by emails or within the app. I order something with my workinf card no problem anywhere with it and it's keep canceling the orders whereas everything's fine with the payment as Amazon says. When trying to reach their service desk, it's impossible to have someone on call. The only wait is waiting for them to call you but you never receive the call and you don't even have a clock saying how long you wait.

Was pretty great until they decide to make items on the list really big and you have to not only scroll up and down, but side to side to veiw items. I dont really mind that it got bigger.... but having to view it side to side (as well as up and down) on the phone is horrendous and annoying. I just want to scroll up and down when searching for items. Please fix this and I'll edit my review

Very useful app for shopping, as long as you are able to avoid the crooked sellers. Unfortunately, Amazon has been little help with purchases when the seller never sends the ordered product or when the seller sends a product that does not match the description of the ordered product. The customer service is often unavailable and the automated assistant has very limited help options.

I shop on here and plan a lot of things on here. This is so hard to do when the app lags so hard and takes forever to complete any task be it, adding things to a list, searching for items, and ESPECIALLY when I remove things from lists. Please fix this :( its really hard to get things done when the app takes ages to load.

Clunky app. Buttons randomly don't work. The app is pretty slow. This is on an s9+. Incredible that Amazon can't even get an Amazon shopping app right. Like how?? Edit: It is 2020 and this app is still awful. How is Amazon the literal most profitable company on Earth and yet its app is worse than YouTube music. I can't believe it sometimes.

Ok so April 19, 20 I received my order from Amazon today I found it sitting on my porch. When I took it in the house I noticed it had been opened and the packing material and oder slip was missing. What I had ordered was in there but I'm 100% sure it's only because it was some cheap a** $25 head phones. Had it been worth more I can bet it would have came up missing. And how convenient it happens when no one seems to be around at Amazon to answer the phone to hear my concerns. Get it together or

Constantly freezing and crashing when I try to look at options for an item. Tried to get a filter and it crashed. I used to be able to use it just fine, but now it's terrible. Although I can still purchase items just fine, kinda hard to do if you can't cluck on something without ot crashing

Initially gave a four star rating but after buying things through Amazon for a while now I've lost all faith I had in them. The vast majority of products I've bought have had 4-5 star ratings yet many have arrived broken or have broken down within weeks of owning them. Those products with instruction manuals are always written in terrible English ranging from blatant spelling mistakes throughout to being completely incomprehensible. It's the flea market of the internet.

The functionality of the app is terrible. There's no filtration system for what you looking for specifically, all the comparisons in the world but if you can't edit what comparisons you looking for don't feel too down what you're looking for it's kind of pointless. Not being able to filter your results when you search is terrible. And user interface being optionable to what you see as a user and what you like is user I mean 90% of the other apps that they have this function why doesn't you

Aweful. Just aweful. EVERYTIME I "give amazon another try" it's aweful i was charged a total of the orders but then also charged individual items and my orders all say that there is a payment issue. So I got charged twice for items to say I didnt even pay for them at all and when asking support for help a Ruby was rude and couldnt help at all saying that it was an issue to take up with my bank and not amazon that it wasnt an "orders issue it was a payment issue" so no refund or item for me

For many months now whenever I atempt to get into Amazon via this app within seconds I receive a new screen saying something went wrong on our end. Same thing when I try to get in via a link from another site or an email. Customer support first attempted so.e 3-4 months was completely lame, ineffective, with 0 follow up from Amazon. They are losing a lot of my business.

I love this app, it's so easy to go down the rabbit hole here, so much to choose from.. The layout and navigation is awesome which makes it easy to search for a particular item. If you have a bad experience, they help to try to fix the issue. I didn't realize how many days had gone by and I hadn't received my product. Amazon sent me a message and drew my attention to it. Great app!

Love Amazon, but the app is not good anymore. I used to be able to go to my Amazon app, type what I'm looking for, put in a couple of filters, and find what I want. The filters are useless now. There are no filters for basics anymore. For clothes or shoes I need Size, Color, Material, and Price. Those filters are gone now. The filters that are there are horizontal across the screen, but they run off the edge and they don't scroll. Useless! Just let me search and buy quickly

The one star is less for the app and more for Amazon in general. I did the trial of prime and their shipping was slower than ever. I had no intentions of keeping it past the free trial, but I could not remember when the renewal was. They charged my account today with no warning that it was coming due. So I paid for a month of late deliveries. Not happy with Amazon as a whole lately. The app itself does not have the full features as the website, so I'd still give the app only 2 or 3 stars.

Had to uninstall it after it repeatedly logged me out over and over. Real problem was it kept on logging me out of the kindle app as well and everytime I lost all saved data on the kindle app. It did it at least 5 times ina row back to back before I uninstalled this and could stay logged in. Ridiculous, and feels so intrusive that it can access my other amazon apps. Also messed up my amazon music app and un-downloaded all the music there. Terrible.

So far I can't order. My order is being put on hold over and over again because it wouldn't go into the confirmation process of my credit card. In germany credit card payments have a high level of security how come amazon doesn't open the API with my bank and let me proceed but rather just accepts the order and gives me an error later that is hard to discover. Can't rate more than one star because the single most important core functionality doesn't work like expected.

Filter list sucks. I have no options to shorten my choices to something I'm looking for specifically and it makes it hard to find stuff....I hear a lot of good things about amazon but i prefer ebay's filter setup. One day amazon will get there....just like one day apple will do something that android has never done before. I highly doubt it but one day...

It doesn't work, I tried to buy something, it didn't charge my CC, and it didn't see it in my orders, so I tried again and it comes up a message that this is a duplicated order. And third, their shipping is extremely long, like very long, like 40 day's.

Used Amazon for years. Tired of it. Prime member. Ive had alot of issues over the years with shipping and amazon but now it seems pointless. Recently my orders have become "undeliverable". You don't get your money unless you go through customer service. Whats the point if my orders are undeliverable by amazon. I recieve packages, late but I recieve them. But undeliverable takes the cake. Amazon sucks. Good luck with tracking your items as well as finding out why. And no they won't reroute them.

Amazon Sub-prime. Everything takes eight days or more to get now even though you pay a premium price for Prime. They have a huge selection of course but Prime used to mean fast. Now it means slower and more expensive. Unfortunately Walmart is cheaper and faster now. If you message Amazon Prime customer service chat they will probably give you a 15% membership refund because their service quality has slowed so much. I hope that helps

The app used to make shopping so much easier until the update. I wish i never updated it. EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING.

For over 7 months now, this app has been unusable. When I search anything, it says there's been an error under a photo of a dog. I've tried uninstalling it, updating it, and every online solution you can find on google. The only reason I won't delete it is because I CAN'T because my Note9 physically will not allow me to delete this app. If I would, I would've done it 7 months ago.

Amazon has such a terrible support system in terms of amazon specialists. Generally works well but I would say for the last couple of months there been lots of glitches with this app. Hangs up frequently, in fact to the extent that I have uninstalled it and I'm going to try a reinstall and hope that takes care of the problem. Amazon, you make too much money to not have a top-notch app.

Absolutely horrible. I have made over 40 orders in the past 60 days and I pay for prime. Poor quality thumbnails no infinate scroll and the filters! suck this is yet another app going backwards with endless updates come on Amazon sort this out. Best option for now is to roll back to v18.8.0.100 edit 19/05/2020 seems filters are now non functional in this older version app have now uninstalled as obviously Amazon and their development teams are just not taking any notice of the overwhelmingly negative reviews in the last 6 months

Nothing but issues on their end, and customer gets the shaft every time. Promotional deals are a scam just to get you to add a card to your account and then they come up with a reason why they can't give you the promotion after being on the phone with them for days because they messed something up. Very bad customer service, have an excuse for everything they mess up and turn it around on the customer. Do tons of business with them and get shafted time and time again

Today the cart page quit showing anything but the price; the rest of the line is blank. The same problem in the saved for later page. If I push hard enough on a line it will take me back to the original page that the item is displayed. After re-booting my phone & then re-installing the app with zero results ("My lists" page is fine) I called Amazon. They were are about as unhelpful as it can get. I guess if it works @ some point that's good. But they aren't going to email or respond in any way.

I don't use amazon to often to buy items. I guess I'm a little "Old School" I like brick-and-mortar stores over Amazon. But when I do use Amazon to buy items it is super easy and fast. Also, with free shipping on Amazon Prime items and how fast they ship your order I can't complain. Whenever stores like walmart or target doesnt have what I'm looking for I jump Amazon to buy it. good price and they ship the items the next day. Easy and Fast. 5 Stars.

I can never change the search result views in my phone. I get these super large tiles I have to scroll to see the entire product and trying to look at the products I searched I have to scroll back and forth a lot and sometimes lose the search. Super annoying and I cannot change the view. What's odd is that my partners app shows normal size tiles side by side and we use the same account and the same phones.

Not all the reviews are correct, I have noticed that if you are buying a product that has different models like indoor grow lights the reviews tend to be the same no matter what power the light is. Very misleading. Also I wanted to buy some rare vinus flytraps they was ment to be blue but doing a little research revealed that they do not exist. Very disappointing.

Most of the products are missing significant data in the descriptions. The weight/volume/sizing units are interspersed, using metric, imperial and US customary measurement systems making price comparison a complete nightmare! Many times I have simply stopped looking and gone to Ebay and other online stores. With simple standards in place, it would be so much easier to buy. I win, Amazon wins, the vendors/suppliers win. The more convoluted the shopping experience becomes, the faster I walk away.

ORDERS LIST! There is NO reason I should have to scroll past 20 items that have been delivered to get info on things that haven't shipped yet. I filter "open orders" it gives me 1 already delivered and 1 shipping in Nov. What about the FIVE other items that I'm waiting on?! BTW many of the items I'm waiting on are Amazon devices purchased on Prime Day.. those items are now the same price EVERYWHERE and are 2 day shipping. I've been bamboozled! & HEY AMAZON Read the BAD REVIEWS. They ACCURATE af!

Search is useless. Tells me there's thousands of matches yet the first page includes unrelated items. If I specify a size or colour I don't want other sizes or colours. If I specify a particular material I don't want other materials. I don't want a business account, yet every listing has a full page ad for it before the item description. As for special deals - I was offered Â£30 off an item I was considering purchasing but found it Â£70 cheaper than the offer price elsewhere...

poor customer service...got a gift for xmas that i needed to return. customer service told me i would have a credit to my account for the price of the item in 24 to 48 hours. i contacted them after 48 hours after not receiving the credit to my account and now have to wait 7 days for it. They also wanted information from the purchasers account that was irrelevant since i was returning it as i got it as a gift. I am beyond PISSED with Amazon!!!!

I love everything about Amazon. I am impressed with the variety of merchandise available. I love the reviews; they are so helpful to making decisions. Shipping is top notch; love the text notices keeping me informed of shipments. The 2 returns I had to make were easy peasy & credit given as soon as item was checked in for return. Amazon is Amazing.

I tried to login on my phone but it wouldn't let me sign into my account until I confirmed the account belonged to me via email. Thing is everytime you leave the Amazon app to open your email Amazon closes and resets the entire process. In other words you'll need to different devices just to confirm via email that the account belongs to you. This is a really inconvenient process and it seems extremely unprofessional to release an app with such a broken sign in process.

Viewing the items are waaaaay to large, cannot minimize the items to view. I thought it was just me but after reading other reviews, I see that's ita the actual app itself. Can you guys please fix this. I can only view one item at a time abd have to scroll over to see the next item, it stupid. This needs to be fixed. Vieqing one item takes up my entire phone screen and my phone is screen is not small. Please.please please fix this issue.

There's an issue when you try to back up to the previous page after viewing the product photos/info. It seems to get stuck and the only way to get out is to hit the back button several times which then backs you out completely to the previous search page. It's so annoying that I exit the app and shop on the ebay or target app. Please fix this.

Update on 28 July: The app is less crashing now but the viewing size; and NEXT button to see the next page is terrible. The viewing completely is out of proportion if your phone is viewed vertically. Horizontally you can see the next button but things with BACK button looking awkward. I'm really frustrated, just give us back the good old working app.

Thanks Amazon. Using the Subscribe function they let me know the day it's supposed ship that they are out. I've been subscribed to these items for years. Shouldn't a company the size, scope, and experience of Amazon store items that are non perishable and and under subscription to their regular customers? Nope. Should I continue using Amazon and their app? Nope.

omg! How hard should it be to log into a service that you pay good money for, ludicrous, 1st enter password, 2nd 2nter illegible text in the box and then 3rd enter your OTP that's text to you, I'm beginning to wonder if Amazon is worth it, Amazon need to take a good long look at the over the top log in method as people will just not bother, 1st time I tried to log in I left it until later as I just couldn't be bothered, I have had eyesight and jumping through hoops is just further discrimination

Lots of selections to choose from. You can do all your shopping needs with Amazon. Name brand items some are way to expensive but some are better. I think everyone should try shopping with Amazon at least one time in there life to see just how good the experience is , I'm sure once you do you will be back with this app you can have it all I just love that this app is available for users to enjoy shopping.

66% good with 33% to work on. The good; quick searches, alerts, tracking notifications, instant chat etc. The work on; my Android phone the app wants to update with each use. App goes straight to Playstore each time the app is opened, regardless of whether an update is there or not.

Again, these guys are getting expensive and greedy too, prices on a lot of items is too high and it isn't always cuz you have better products when I am seeing the exact same photos of an item on the other two providers - same product, just vastly marked up, delivery fee is way too high which is why I don't even look at Amazon products anymore.

I absolutely love Amazon!! Everything I have order has been free shipping and come within 2 day!! I have only had to return one item because my son no longer needed it. That experience was surprisingly easy also. I just took it to Kohl's and they packaged it and returned it free of charge. I highly recommend Amazon shopping to anyone who had never used it!!

Great app and experience overall - but one really annoying issue is the fact the the delivery driver can drive right past your home just because there are more stops left - I'm assuming this is software based and its a list but this should be altered and mixed in with proximity this will save both energy and make delivery for some users quicker.

My experience with this app is quite unpleasant because it's overly complicated for such simple services. An incredibly thoughtful, considerate gesture but, sadly more inconvenient than it should be with that in mind. Thank you so much for trying to help families and individuals who do use SNAP EBT. However I got dizzy trying to grasp which foods were EBT eligible and what I could not purchase with it. You SHOULD link the Amazon Prime app with Wholefoods shopping lists making it easier.

Since the last update, this app just takes forever to load a product page. It was slow already and now it's way slower. As a Prime member, I use the app more than the website and its sad how even the Amazon website slow it is. The same goes to the business prime; there's no difference. New phone Samsung Note 10+, fast processor and 12Gb of ram. $300 Router w/WiFi 6. Internet 100 MB. No excuses

Every time I open the app, it's signed me out, & I have 2 sign in again (which is annoying trying 2 remember my password every time). Very glitchy and unreliable. Used to get notifications in good time, I knew when things are arriving and such. I love this app!! Easy to shop got needed items, (sometimes too easy, haha)! This app is easy to navigate and use. Great companion app is the Amazon store card app! BTW; the customer reviews are very helpful whelm making descisions on what products to choose!

Why does these big company apps give me soo much stress! I want to now delete all 3 Amazon apps and never use again! Am Sure I will find another music app, movie app and ebay!! I absolutely love Amazon! As a prime member I'm still discovering more and more things included with my prime membership I wasn't aware of. It makes no sense to me why you can only choose 1 filter option at a time. AMAZON CHANGE IT BACK!!!! Sincerely a long time loyal customer

Search options terrible. Can't filter at all since last update. I will see what I want for $30 but sort by price and the cheapest is $40 lol. Can't search by size anymore so I have to click every listing to check sizes. Tried to set the garage door up with service and just get bounced back and forth between both apps (Q). 9/30/20 update seems to have stability issues. My install started starting/stopping continuously, then would immediately stop after starting. Solution was to clear the cache. Follow these steps from the droid guy. Froma Home screen, navigate: Settings > Apps. Tap App Manager. Locate then tap Amazon Shopping. Tap Storage. Tap CLEAR CACHE. might help to reboot, or to delete data as well, but I didn't need to

I dont know whats wrong with the app, but is the only app on my phone that is extremely slow. Sometimes it gets almost useless. I tried in 5 different android phones and it still going slow. And is to damn much when u got 8 GB of RAM, 2.6Ghz cpu with 8 cores, and 200 mbps internet speed.

Prime subscription since 2011 and very dissatisfied with how you decided to prioritize shipments during the pandemic. If you're overwhelmed with orders, that makes sense but, instead, you say you're prioritizing essential items. Ordered items on the 1st and today it was due here. Saw homes up and down my street receive packages and nothing here. Fed ex and ups can deliver perfectly fine but you seem to not be able to. What's the point of being a prime member? I have bought lots of things from Amazon and also have subscribe and save which I get goods I use on a regular basis. I love this site as I am housebound and at least I can be in charge of something and the deliveries are spot on. I give it four stars. I would like the delivery of heavier goods to be brought inside the house and not just the front door.

Ok, I dont usually write reviews, but this really makes me mad: When you open the app, the first screen is a button which, with one accidental click, signs you up for a subscription to Amazon prime. poorly designd. search and product result pages are not at all intuitive. does not give an option to set price range for filtering. relies on an antiquated "next page system" as opposed to numbered page results whjch would allow one to skip through results faster (since the app doesn't allow custom price range filtering). skip this app, just use the website.

I stopped my amazon prime and they still charging me for prime, I don't recommend this shopping app to anyone!!! They taking my money away!!! The UI for the android app has somehow ended up being what is essentially the desktop website (full size, so yes, horizontal scrolling) inside the mobile app window. So, yes, there's two nav bars. Slow?!?! Using a note 8 and an s10e. This app lags, slow, imo garbage app for a billion dollar compamy. Stop being cheap Amazon and help your customers buy stuff faster. Disgusting, they'll advertise an item at a "sale" price showing the "actual" price which is often a random higher price to persuade you it's a good deal, just had a new phone recommended, the sale price was the price i saw it advertised for yesterday, the non sale price was Â£100 more. The recent changes in app search logic make app searches extremely inefficient.  The automatic department characterization makes it very difficult to find the product. The old filter system was much better. Now, I often find, that I avoid going to Amazon unless I am around a computer.

I use the app quite a bit. I also use the website on my PC. The app lacks several features of the website, particularly the settings, the filters and search options. I've also notice search results are not the same as the website, usually much fewer results and somehow more narrow than I get on the web.

I HATE the fact that the product images are too big for the screen and you miss half of your options if you didn't remember to also scroll to the right. There is NO setting to change this, and it is so frustrating. Love Amazon. HATE whatever update did this!

Was good, then became unusable all together. I would suggest looking for other delivery options till they get everything sorted. Especially if you are stuck at home. I can't wait 2 months for delivery while paying a prime membership for essentials. Then told not available in your area at checkout after being a member for years. Its really good and functions perfectly. Just one thing that could be good to add is being able to move more than one item to a different list at once. Well, a great app and grear platform. However it was quite annoying to find out yhat they started charging me full price for the prime membership even though I'm a student. I don't know what happened to the Amazon app, but it used to work just fine. Was good but now it's scrappy. The words get jumbled up and images fail to appear. Am now uninstalling the app. Downloaded again and found now working perfectly. Long time customer, spend way more on amazon than I'm willing to put a dollar amount on. Used to have no issues at all, which is why I spend so much. This app didn't even TRY to give me a chance to MAYBE like it before it earned my wrath... all over ONE stupid little oversight: they made it impossible to properly "sign-out" out of your account! I have amazon prime and it doesnt always seem worth while to pay extra per month when shipping is almost always free anyway and I haven't been able to capitalize on 1 or 2 day shipping. This app is a life saver for me. Being disabled and unable to go shopping in a store alone is impossible for me. This app allows me to browse and buy with great ease. I love this app! I was able to shop without being around people and read all the ratings which really helped me decide whether or not to buy something I never bought before. There were always good and bad reviews on everything so they weren't just showing the good reviews. If I couldn't find something in the stores, I could almost always find it on Amazon. If I could only have 3 apps. on my phone, Amazon would be one of them. I also love all the movies I can choose from and many free ones with Amazon prime.

Constantly glitches and throws me out of what i was doing. Terrible. If there's a filtering system on the search function, for brands for example, it's not obvious. Every search I make on the app is pointless - whatever the type of product - and more often than not go back to the desktop version. Just tried browsing for rucksacks and gave up.

I like a lot about Amazon app but I used to really like the way that they had the wishlist where you could drag what you were looking at into a list for later but now they made it really hard to put things into a wishlist so when I'm browsing it takes like three extra steps 2 put something into a wishlist and now I don't shop on Amazon as much as I used to because of it. Amazon stole endless money from me for an account that was deleted with my card number! I was charged monthly for a subscription I didnt even have. For the past few months, the images are too large for my phone and I can't do a proper search in the app. It's very frustrating! Also, I can no longer scroll endlessly on a search. 1. Every time you change something in 'filter', it takes you back to the list, instead of letting you continue until you've finished setting all the filters. 2. The app is great. I can easily navigate it to place, edit, and track orders. I just wish there was a dark mode for me to continue browsing at night. Dimming the backlight and setting the blue light filter to max just ain't working anymore.

The latest version is awful! The filters are now singular and complicated, and when getting to the bottom of a search, there is no 'next' option for further pages and goods, just a 'previous' which is redundant because there is only one page available anyway. Awful app now.

Amazon is a great app especially with 2 day delivery. My issue is their delivery people. I've complained multiple times and they still deliver to the wrong address, even with instructions. Please update your messages area. This is a powered hub but one of the best hubs I've ever owned. It has a fast power USB port for fast power-ups and 7 other hubs that work very well. Seriously, how long are they going to roll out updates that do nothing to fix the search result issue? It's magnified so I can only see one item of a two item wide list. I have to move the results around just to see everything. Back and forth. Back and forth. TERRIBLE UX.

Although the app itself is pretty good and mayby deserves like a 3 or 4 star review the actual shipping and you know getting it to your house has problems like in order to ship your product a day or two earlier you have to pay like 4 dollars more which in itself is fine so i paid for the shipping only for it to be "running late" and make me wait two more days which completely undermines the fact that I paid more for quicker shipping. I feel as there should be some sort of discount or something.

This was a good but not great app, but since the 16 September 2019 update it crashes seconds after opening. The problem may be Android's 1 September 2019 security patch, which my Nokia phone installed on 16 September 2019. I should add that this bug was squashed within a week and Amazon Shopping went back to being a good but not great app. I appreciate the convenience of shopping with a dedicated app, but finding things to buy is just easier with a web browser.

Absoluetly useless. If you have customers and their order doesn't go through then make sure they can rebuy it because it saves instead of having to research it and the same thing happen. I go to my order and it says you have 0 orders if the order didn't go through then it should say so on the actual website not just on your email. Cancelled my prime because I am paying for no reason. Love amazon. Not the app so much now after latest update. When you search for an item to buy, it either magnifies the screen by ~200%. It is as if it doesn't apply fit to screen anymore. Super annoying. You can't even see the entire item you are buying without scrolling up/down/left/right.

I don't know what happened to this app, but it has been awful to navigate lately. It's not letting me use the little prime switch on top of page, to navigate between pages is horrible because for some reason the page is not fitting on my phone screen. It is terrible. Needs to be fixed.

I've used prime for about a year. I've never had a problem with shipping or my profucts!! The visual layout after a search is terrible. Instead of being able to scroll up and down, I now have to scroll left and right also just to see the rest of the product decription or other items listed. It's like going to the website on a mobile device. Totally defeats the purpose of using the app.

Awful lately...won't load any pages and a message appears from Amazon that something went wrong at their end, ywt claim there is no problem with the App??? Wow! So as many people have commented, there's been a major bug with the app affecting the view you see when you perform a search making it impossible to really navigate. Annoying af. You have to scroll to the side and then down. Back and forth and back and forth and theres no option to change it. I'm so disappointed with Amazon. I deleted your app and I will not be expanding my subscription with music service either.  Thank goodness for Apple and Walmart. You guys suck.

Very disappointed, I will not recommend to anyone. Great app for finding pretty good deals on pretty much anything you need not to mention delivery is usually pretty quick depending on time of year and what not especially since they typically utilize their own vehicles for most deliveries which not only takes load off regular postage but typically eliminates unnecessary transfers and facilities making it quicker.

This app has had its upside and downs but the predictive text for the searches is seriously broken i am constantly having my text changed even after I push search so frustrating olight is a brand and ever time I search it changes it to just light that company even has a amazon store and the broken search function can't get it right. Every time! This app is nearly perfect. The UI is intuitive. The performance is consistently smooth. The push notifications are actually useful, but infrequent enough that they don't ever annoy me. The developers have done an excellent job and it's been this good since the day I started using this app.

This app is amazing. I have an Amazon prime account that I use every day. 99% of the shopping that I do is on here instead of in store. Over the past few months I've noticed that this app has become very laggy and unresponsive. I will have to uninstall it and only shop when I'm at a computer = Shopping less. I love having subscriptions for stuff I know I'll buy over and over again like cleaning supplies and dietary supplements -the things I forget to put on my grocery lists anyway. Amazon, stop with trying to trick us into monthly or bi-monthly purchases of items. You make it very easy to click that orange button "setup now". Aren't you a large enough money machine? If people want ongoing purchases, put that option off to the side somewhere. I hate that kind of trickery.

I don't like the fact that emailing Amazon can only now be done through the app to try to force us to use it.
