Some tracking number don't even work. "We are sorry your parcel is late" Well that is why we pay for prime membership to have our package expedited and it's NOT LATE.

Overall I've been pleased with the app itself. Most of my items arrive on time however I've also not received some packages or have received the wrong size. The worst thing that's happened just the other day somehow my account was hacked and someone deleted my recent orders and then ordered some game system to be delivered at his name and address this person changed my phone number and my back up email option. I called Amazon and didn't get much help. Only changed my password. So be careful.

I 100% depend on Amazon. With the dangers of Covid I can count on Amazon to deliver what ever I order on time, never more than 2 days, and with prime the shipping is always free! With the world in such a state of confusion its so nice to have a consistent service with great prices and everything I need with just 1 click! There is always something to watch on Prime Video that is also included with my membership. They offer discounts on membership for students and food stamp recipients as well.

I have had and used this app for a long time, but this last update will not allow the app to be opened and keeps force closing it. I have uninstalled and then reinstalled...nothing. Ive also restarted my phone....still nothing. What can i do? Its very helpful to have the app. Otherwise would be a 5 star! Update: problem was fixed.

Browsing and buying stuff works ok. However, whenever I need to cancel some subscription (prime, audible etc) the whole app seems to be designed to make me lose the patience with all the greyed out fields and cumbersome navigation. I will still cancel these subscriptions, just will also get annoyed.

It has really slowed down on me in the past few months. Images and style options take forevee to load - an item I'm looking at right now has been loading for 30 seconds. It would be great if they could make some adjustments so that items load faster.

I just updated my application on Aug.26 2020 and I hated this update !!! It's not compatible with my cellphone screen at all !! I have to scroll right and left to bw able to see one single listing and listings appear side by side not a single listing per row as it was before !!! Please bring back the previous interface

What an awesome service, I've been purchasing variety of items. Each time amazon has met with my expectations, amazon is genuinely care about customer satisfaction and will provide you an instant assistance if you face any problems. I truly recommend amazon for every individual who wants to experience an quick delivery. I got an instant replace order, after my package has been lost. I did not need wait more than 5 minutes to communicate with an agent. Great experience with amazon so far.

Amazon was once my favorite online shopping place, well not anymore, I have had a couple issues with the app, crashes too often and the customer service is not the same as before. I canceled my prime membership and decided to use other alternatives, free ones that I don't have to pay for a membership like bestbuy, walmart, ebay and etc...

I order Amazon alot. I'm a very faithful prime member. However there are a few things I'm really sick of. First they use to guarantee 1 day shipping to members but out of nowhere without warning that turned to 5 or 6 days. Then they owe regular customers that keep them in biz such as my family some type of reward program. Especially considering good luck ever using a coupon cuz they do not put any out unless you're new. Loyalty counts for nothing I guess. Last this app is CONSTANTLY crashing!!!

Wth? New update sucks! If you hit the back button (like if you want to go back and look at a product you were interested in) you have to start from scratch in the search bar. Frustrating enough to not even use Amazon. I should be able to go back to the previous page and see the items I had already scrolled through. Why make it harder to shop? Who ever did this is a complete idiot. I would rather shop elsewhere than have to start all over just to find an item that caught my eye.

The interface color change and getting rid of lightning deals is somewhat annoying. I enjoyed the randomness of it. Now it feels much more search oriented. Which I suppose is good for most. Dispite those minor annoyences, it's still the best place to shop online for everything!

Unnecessary Notifications. Unable to use Amazon Smile when purchasing on the app as it forces you to have all notifications switched on to use it. I now only use this app for shipment notifications (the only notifications I wanted to receive) and have switched all others off. Will not be ordering anything off of the app and only using desktop or mobile sites for Amazon Smile in the future. It's just annoying and unnecessary

They took my money for an amazon exclusive preordered figure kept selling the figure for the next 3 months, and then the day after if should have already arrived they canceled the order due to lack of inventory. This is not the first time they have done this as I found out after from other collectors. Amazon should not be allowed to carry exclusives until they understand how to do a proper preorder and avoid overselling.

Hate this!! Their NO LONGER MOBILE FRIENDLY Website has cost them a lot of money! I cannot stand the app. So I shop a LOT LESS, and cancelled Prime membership. I USED to shop Amazon from my mobile phone constantly, now I either cannot find what I'm looking for in the app, or I can no longer SEE it in the micro version of desktop on my mobile browser.

This app is slower than the website on mobile. Unfortunately, you have to have the app installed in order to chat with customer service. Once you are inside the app, it looks like the mobile site, it's just slower, but the same screens, same menus. I'm going to unbroken uninstall.

The app actually works great I don't have issues. Great suggestions and availability. However over the past year the service has gone downhill and became less and less reliable, even before Covid-19. Great idea but execution is not so great anymore. Now my orders are just being held by postal service even though delivery address is simple and couldn't be more straight forward. Hope it gets better in the future. I'm not impressed at the moment.

The app is great, but they need to optimize the display so that images and text are not cut off. It's very inconvenient to compare items using the app for this reason. Amazon support advised uninstall/reinstall which I have done twice with no improvement. I hope it will be resolved at some point, at which time I'll revise my rating.

It's okay, but freezes quite a bit. For months now yall keep sending out updates but the updates are NOT FIXING ANY ISSUES!!!!! This is too easy to use. The reason I say that is I spend way too much on this app at this site. Seriously, there is one issue I have so I went back and removed one star. 3 stars for 2 reasons: I can find no way to sort by (relevance, price, rating, etc) in app, and the continue to allow price gouging on needed items. Fir example, the cheapest Lysol Disinfectant Wipes I could find were $14.99 for an 80 count, plus $15 shipping. Unacceptable

Very slow, repeatedly fails to load pages (about every 3rd click). When it locks up it requires rebooting app to regain any functionality before the next 3 clicks. Full phone reboots do nothing. Browsing through mobile browsers (Firefox, Chrome, Samsung) do not have these issues. Samsung S10+

The new update is garbage im seriously considering getting rid of prime and do my shopping elsewhere. It's just great, you want it you put it in your cart it comes the next day. No shipping and handling. You also get the prime videos, with all these really great series and movies. 2020: New feature that shows items that dropped prices in your saved for later group. Makes it easier to add items back to cart when dropped to the desired price. 2019: App no longer has clipboard option on android 10. Makes it really inconvenient to share things like before.
